translation.medium: The league plays a leading role in promoting ice hockey among Beijing's youth, fueling the enthusiasm for Olympic ice hockey and laying the foundation for the development of Beijing's ice hockey sports in the post-Olympic era.
translation.reference: The league has promoted Ice Hockey among teenagers in Beijing, fueled the enthusiasm for Ice Hockey in Winter Olympics and laid a basis for the development of Ice Hockey in Beijing for the post Winter Olympics period.

translation.zh: 女孩当箭靶为姐姐募捐 : " 想到是皮肉伤也就还好 " - 新华网
translation.en: Girl raises donations for elder sister by acting a target, saying “It’s ok since they are only flesh wounds” - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 女孩当箭靶为姐姐募捐 : " 想到是皮肉伤也就还好 " - 新华网
translation.medium: Girl becomes target for arrow to raise funds for sister: "Thinking it's just a flesh wound makes it bearable" - Xinhua News
translation.reference: Girl raises donations for elder sister by acting a target, saying “It’s ok since they are only flesh wounds” - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样。
translation.en: A girl stood in front of a big plank, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou.
translation.source: 杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样。
translation.medium: A girl stood in front of a large wooden board in Hangzhou's Wulin Square, with the words "Human Target, Ten Yuan per Arrow" written on it.
translation.reference: A girl stood in front of a big plank, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou.

translation.zh: 昨日上午，一则“杭州女孩甘当‘箭靶’为姐募捐”的照片刷爆朋友圈。
translation.en: Yesterday morning, a picture of “a girl in Hangzhou raises donation for her elder sister by acting as a target” went viral all over WeChat.
translation.source: 昨日上午，一则“杭州女孩甘当‘箭靶’为姐募捐”的照片刷爆朋友圈。
translation.medium: Yesterday morning, a photo titled "Hangzhou girl willingly becomes a 'human target' to raise funds for her sister" went viral on WeChat Moments.
translation.reference: Yesterday morning, a picture of “a girl in Hangzhou raises donation for her elder sister by acting as a target” went viral all over WeChat.

translation.zh: 照片显示，杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块比人略高的大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样，示意路人付款后可使用弓箭射击。
translation.en: A picture shows a girl standing in front of a plank slightly higher than a person, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, indicating that people can shoot with a bow and arrows after making the payment.
translation.source: 照片显示，杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块比人略高的大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样，示意路人付款后可使用弓箭射击。
translation.medium: The photo shows a girl standing in front of a wooden board slightly taller than a person at Hangzhou's Wulin Square, with the words “Human Target, 10 Yuan per Arrow” written on it, indicating that passersby can pay to shoot arrows at the target.
translation.reference: A picture shows a girl standing in front of a plank slightly higher than a person, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, indicating that people can shoot with a bow and arrows after making the payment.

translation.zh: 该行为引发网友热议。
translation.en: The behavior was discussed heatedly by people on the Internet.
translation.source: 该行为引发网友热议。
translation.medium: The behavior sparked heated discussions among netizens.
translation.reference: The behavior was discussed heatedly by people on the Internet.

translation.zh: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。
translation.en: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that it was confirmed by the police that the girl did this in order to raise donations for her elder sister; however, this behavior should not be advocated, and the girl left from the local police station yesterday after being warned.
translation.source: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。
translation.medium: Last night, the publicity officer of the Xiacheng District branch of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the Beijing News reporter that the police have verified that the girl engaged in such radical actions to raise donations for her sister. However, such behavior is not encouraged. After being admonished, the girl left the local police station yesterday.
translation.reference: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that it was confirmed by the police that the girl did this in order to raise donations for her elder sister; however, this behavior should not be advocated, and the girl left from the local police station yesterday after being warned.

translation.zh: 女孩街头“箭靶”募捐被告诫
translation.en: The girl who raised donations by acting as a target on the street was warned
translation.source: 女孩街头“箭靶”募捐被告诫
translation.medium: The girl was warned for soliciting donations as a "target" on the street.
translation.reference: The girl who raised donations by acting as a target on the street was warned

translation.zh: 网传图片中，一位长发女孩呈“个”字型站在一块大木板前，木板上用黑色墨水写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”的字样，她身前另一块木板上写有其银行账号与微信、支付宝账号等。
translation.en: In the picture appeared on the Internet, a girl with long hair was standing with her arms spread out in front of a big plank which writes human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” in black ink at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, and there was another plank in front of her which has the bank account, WeChat account and Alipay account on it.
translation.source: 网传图片中，一位长发女孩呈“个”字型站在一块大木板前，木板上用黑色墨水写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”的字样，她身前另一块木板上写有其银行账号与微信、支付宝账号等。
translation.medium: In the viral photo, a long-haired girl is seen standing in a "human-shaped" posture in front of a large wooden board. On the board, inscribed with black ink are the words "Human Target, 10 Yuan per Arrow". In front of her, another board displays her bank account details along with WeChat and Alipay account information.
translation.reference: In the picture appeared on the Internet, a girl with long hair was standing with her arms spread out in front of a big plank which writes human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” in black ink at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, and there was another plank in front of her which has the bank account, WeChat account and Alipay account on it.

translation.zh: 该图片上网后引发争议。
translation.en: The picture was discussed heatedly after it was posted on the Internet.
translation.source: 该图片上网后引发争议。
translation.medium: The image went viral online and sparked controversy.
translation.reference: The picture was discussed heatedly after it was posted on the Internet.

translation.zh: 有网友认为，此举系“博眼球的乞讨行为 ” ， 也有不少网友对此表示同情。
translation.en: According to some netizens, this behavior is “begging behavior which aims to grab attention”, but many others show sympathy to her.
translation.source: 有网友认为，此举系“博眼球的乞讨行为 ” ， 也有不少网友对此表示同情。
translation.medium: Some netizens believe that this is an "attention-seeking begging behavior," while many also express sympathy for it.
translation.reference: According to some netizens, this behavior is “begging behavior which aims to grab attention”, but many others show sympathy to her.

translation.zh: “我们是23日上午10点左右巡逻到广场旁的时候发现的情况，当时围观群众已经不少了 。 ”
translation.en: “We found her at about 10:00 am on the 23rd when we went on the patrol around the square, and there were already lots of onlookers.”
translation.source: “我们是23日上午10点左右巡逻到广场旁的时候发现的情况，当时围观群众已经不少了 。 ”
translation.medium: "We discovered the situation around 10 a.m. on the 23rd when we were patrolling next to the square, and by that time there were already quite a few onlookers."
translation.reference: “We found her at about 10:00 am on the 23rd when we went on the patrol around the square, and there were already lots of onlookers.”

translation.zh: 事发地附近的天水派出所民警接受当地媒体采访时称，摆摊的女孩子共有两名，均为20岁左右，打扮得青春靓丽。
translation.en: According to what the police officer of the Tianshui Police Station near the site told the local media, there were two young and beautiful girls in early 20s who set up a stall.
translation.source: 事发地附近的天水派出所民警接受当地媒体采访时称，摆摊的女孩子共有两名，均为20岁左右，打扮得青春靓丽。
translation.medium: The police from Tianshui police station near the scene of the incident said in an interview with the local media that there were two girls at the stall, both about 20 years old, dressed youthfully and beautifully.
translation.reference: According to what the police officer of the Tianshui Police Station near the site told the local media, there were two young and beautiful girls in early 20s who set up a stall.

translation.zh: 其中，做“人肉靶子”的女孩一直在哭，求路人玩一下这个游戏；另一女孩在边上帮着吆喝，说自己这个朋友的姐姐得了白血病，现在急需手术费，请大家帮忙。
translation.en: The girl acting as the “human target” kept crying, begging onlookers to play this game; the other girl was calling for attention on the side, saying that the elder sister of her friend suffered from leukemia and is in urgent need of operation fee, and asking onlookers to help her friend.
translation.source: 其中，做“人肉靶子”的女孩一直在哭，求路人玩一下这个游戏；另一女孩在边上帮着吆喝，说自己这个朋友的姐姐得了白血病，现在急需手术费，请大家帮忙。
translation.medium: Among them, the girl acting as a "human target" kept crying, pleading with passersby to play the game; another girl was shouting from the side, saying that her friend's sister has leukemia and urgently needs money for surgery, asking everyone to help out.
translation.reference: The girl acting as the “human target” kept crying, begging onlookers to play this game; the other girl was calling for attention on the side, saying that the elder sister of her friend suffered from leukemia and is in urgent need of operation fee, and asking onlookers to help her friend.

translation.zh: “我们与贵州当地警方取得联系，了解到该女孩是在为姐姐白血病治疗募捐 。 ”
translation.en: “We have gained contact with the police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was raising donations for her elder sister who suffered from leukemia.”
translation.source: “我们与贵州当地警方取得联系，了解到该女孩是在为姐姐白血病治疗募捐 。 ”
translation.medium: We have made contact with the local police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was fundraising for her sister's leukemia treatment.
translation.reference: “We have gained contact with the police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was raising donations for her elder sister who suffered from leukemia.”

translation.zh: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为吉佳丽，为姐姐吉佳艳募捐。
translation.en: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that this girl is named Ji Jiali, and she was raising donations for Ji Jiayan, her elder sister.
translation.source: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为吉佳丽，为姐姐吉佳艳募捐。
translation.medium: Last night, the spokesperson for the Public Security Bureau of Xiacheng District, Hangzhou, told The Beijing News reporter that the girl's name is Ji Jiali, fundraising for her elder sister Ji Jiayan.
translation.reference: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that this girl is named Ji Jiali, and she was raising donations for Ji Jiayan, her elder sister.

translation.zh: 但由于治疗仍需要30余万费用，一时想不到好的办法募捐，才做出了这种行为。
translation.en: Since more than 300 thousand yuan was still required for treatment, Ji Jiali did this because she had no better way.
translation.source: 但由于治疗仍需要30余万费用，一时想不到好的办法募捐，才做出了这种行为。
translation.medium: But because the treatment still requires more than 300,000 yuan in expenses, and no good fundraising methods could be thought of at the moment, this course of action was taken.
translation.reference: Since more than 300 thousand yuan was still required for treatment, Ji Jiali did this because she had no better way.

translation.zh: 他说，全过程中，两个女孩一个当靶子，一个负责打下手，但并未参与其中，全过程中未发现有人射箭，只是有人围观并拍了照片发到了微博上。
translation.en: He told the journalist that one of the two girls acted as human target, and the other girl acted as an assistant and was not involved; nobody was found to have shot arrows during the whole process, and some onlookers only took pictures and posted them on Weibo.
translation.source: 他说，全过程中，两个女孩一个当靶子，一个负责打下手，但并未参与其中，全过程中未发现有人射箭，只是有人围观并拍了照片发到了微博上。
translation.medium: He said that throughout the process, one girl acted as the target while the other assisted, but did not participate. No one was found to be shooting arrows during the entire process; there were only onlookers who took photos and posted them on Weibo.
translation.reference: He told the journalist that one of the two girls acted as human target, and the other girl acted as an assistant and was not involved; nobody was found to have shot arrows during the whole process, and some onlookers only took pictures and posted them on Weibo.

translation.zh: 后警方经治安部门鉴定，使用的弓箭不属管制范畴。
translation.en: Later, the police sent it to the public security department and identified that the bows and arrows used were not under control.
translation.source: 后警方经治安部门鉴定，使用的弓箭不属管制范畴。
translation.medium: After appraisal by the public security department, the bow and arrow used were determined to be outside the scope of controlled items.
translation.reference: Later, the police sent it to the public security department and identified that the bows and arrows used were not under control.

translation.zh: 该负责人表示 ， “ 不提倡采取这种博眼球募捐方式 ” 。
translation.en: According to the person in charge, “raising donations by grabbing attention is not advocated”.
translation.source: 该负责人表示 ， “ 不提倡采取这种博眼球募捐方式 ” 。
translation.medium: The person in charge said, "We do not advocate using this type of sensationalism to raise donations."
translation.reference: According to the person in charge, “raising donations by grabbing attention is not advocated”.

translation.zh: 经派出所民警告诫后，她已经离开派出所。
translation.en: She left from the police station after being warned by the police.
translation.source: 经派出所民警告诫后，她已经离开派出所。
translation.medium: After being cautioned by the police at the local police station, she has left the station.
translation.reference: She left from the police station after being warned by the police.

translation.zh: 散热效果：好 轻薄程度：方便 外观材质：满意 宏碁一直性价比很高。
translation.en: Heat dissipation: good; lightness: convenient; appearance and material: satisfactory; Acer has always been cost-effective.
translation.source: 散热效果：好 轻薄程度：方便 外观材质：满意 宏碁一直性价比很高。
translation.medium: Cooling effect: Good Slimness: Convenient Appearance and material: Satisfied Acer has always had a great price-to-performance ratio.
translation.reference: Heat dissipation: good; lightness: convenient; appearance and material: satisfactory; Acer has always been cost-effective.

translation.zh: 新机器非常好。
translation.en: The new laptop is very good.
translation.source: 新机器非常好。
translation.medium: The new machine is very good.
translation.reference: The new laptop is very good.

translation.zh: 性能稳定，四个出风口散热没问题，值得推荐
translation.en: The function is stable, and the heat dissipation of the four air outlets has no problem; it is worth recommending.
translation.source: 性能稳定，四个出风口散热没问题，值得推荐
translation.medium: Performance is stable, with four vents for cooling, no problems there, worth recommending.
translation.reference: The function is stable, and the heat dissipation of the four air outlets has no problem; it is worth recommending.

translation.zh: 这款宏碁暗影骑士龙游戏本挺好的，做工用料足,放心品牌！
translation.en: This Acer shadow knight dragon game laptop is pretty good with sufficient materials; it is a brand you can trust!
translation.source: 这款宏碁暗影骑士龙游戏本挺好的，做工用料足,放心品牌！
translation.medium: This Acer Predator Helios gaming laptop is pretty good, with solid craftsmanship and materials, a reliable brand!
translation.reference: This Acer shadow knight dragon game laptop is pretty good with sufficient materials; it is a brand you can trust!

translation.zh: 宏碁暗影骑士龙价格方面还是不算贵的。
translation.en: Acer shadow knight dragon is not expensive.
translation.source: 宏碁暗影骑士龙价格方面还是不算贵的。
translation.medium: Acer Predator Helios is not considered expensive in terms of price.
translation.reference: Acer shadow knight dragon is not expensive.

translation.zh: 个人觉得宏碁暗影骑士龙真的好的，游戏效果：游戏效果舒爽，可以畅玩大多数游戏，我的吃鸡全高**帧率稳定，非常的流畅，lol更是不在话下，CSgo也是轻松胜任，大多数三a游戏都能玩
translation.en: Personally, I think Acer shadow knight dragon is really good; game effect: playing games on it feels nice, you can play most games without any problem, and my high frame rate PUBG game was stable and smooth, and LOL was no problem at all; it can also let you play CSgo without any trouble and you can play most Three A games on it.
translation.source: 个人觉得宏碁暗影骑士龙真的好的，游戏效果：游戏效果舒爽，可以畅玩大多数游戏，我的吃鸡全高**帧率稳定，非常的流畅，lol更是不在话下，CSgo也是轻松胜任，大多数三a游戏都能玩
translation.medium: I personally think the Acer Predator Helios is really good. Gaming performance: The gaming experience is comfortable, and I can enjoy playing most games smoothly. My PUBG runs with high frame rates steadily, which is very smooth. LoL is even less of an issue, and CS:GO is also easily handled. Most triple-A games can be played.
translation.reference: Personally, I think Acer shadow knight dragon is really good; game effect: playing games on it feels nice, you can play most games without any problem, and my high frame rate PUBG game was stable and smooth, and LOL was no problem at all; it can also let you play CSgo without any trouble and you can play most Three A games on it.

translation.zh: 散热效果:散热效果不错，风扇很给力，工作用挺安静，游戏效果全开风扇还是不小的。
translation.en: Heat dissipation: nice, the fan works well, it is quiet when you work on it, and it is louder with all the fans are working when you play games.
translation.source: 散热效果:散热效果不错，风扇很给力，工作用挺安静，游戏效果全开风扇还是不小的。
translation.medium: Cooling effect: The cooling performance is good, the fan is powerful, and it operates quietly for work. When gaming with all effects on, the fan is still quite noticeable.
translation.reference: Heat dissipation: nice, the fan works well, it is quiet when you work on it, and it is louder with all the fans are working when you play games.

translation.zh: 外观材质:外观挺酷炫，游戏本就的拉风 显示效果:屏幕很清晰，玩游戏1080足够了
translation.en: Appearance and material: the appearance looks cool; game laptops are eye catching; display effect: the screen is clear and 1080 is enough for playing games.
translation.source: 外观材质:外观挺酷炫，游戏本就的拉风 显示效果:屏幕很清晰，玩游戏1080足够了
translation.medium: Exterior Material: The appearance is pretty cool, just what a gaming laptop should be like. Display Effect: The screen is very clear, and 1080 is enough for gaming.
translation.reference: Appearance and material: the appearance looks cool; game laptops are eye catching; display effect: the screen is clear and 1080 is enough for playing games.

translation.zh: 买笔记本觉得还行真的很不错啊，主要是用来做设计的，性价比很高，比想象中的轻，也比想象中要好看，屁股上的红是个非常好看的葡萄酒的颜色，没有那么艳俗，整体都比期待值高出很多，挺值的购买的，女生也挺适合的。
translation.en: I think it is pretty good; I mainly used it to do design and it is very cost-effective, lighter and prettier than I thought; the red on its rear side is a beautiful wine color, not garish at all; it far exceeded my expectation overall and is worth purchasing, suitable for girls as well.
translation.source: 买笔记本觉得还行真的很不错啊，主要是用来做设计的，性价比很高，比想象中的轻，也比想象中要好看，屁股上的红是个非常好看的葡萄酒的颜色，没有那么艳俗，整体都比期待值高出很多，挺值的购买的，女生也挺适合的。
translation.medium: Buying the notebook feels quite alright, it's really nice. It's mainly used for design work, and its cost-performance ratio is very high. It's lighter than I imagined and also looks better than I expected. The red on the back is a very nice wine color, not too garish. Overall, it far exceeds my expectations; it's quite worth the purchase and also quite suitable for girls.
translation.reference: I think it is pretty good; I mainly used it to do design and it is very cost-effective, lighter and prettier than I thought; the red on its rear side is a beautiful wine color, not garish at all; it far exceeded my expectation overall and is worth purchasing, suitable for girls as well.

translation.zh: 2年前开始接触宏基暗夜骑士，用了两年下来，性价比比较高，质量过硬！
translation.en: Two years ago, I gained contact with Acer shadow knight, and I think it is cost-effective and has great quality after the two years use.
translation.source: 2年前开始接触宏基暗夜骑士，用了两年下来，性价比比较高，质量过硬！
translation.medium: Two years ago, I started using the Acer Aspire Nitro and over the course of two years, its cost-performance ratio was quite high and its quality was solid!
translation.reference: Two years ago, I gained contact with Acer shadow knight, and I think it is cost-effective and has great quality after the two years use.

translation.zh: 身边的朋友我也都推荐他们购买这款产品！
translation.en: I also recommended my friends to buy this product!
translation.source: 身边的朋友我也都推荐他们购买这款产品！
translation.medium: I also recommend to my friends to buy this product!
translation.reference: I also recommended my friends to buy this product!

translation.zh: 目前已经购买了这个系列3款机器！
translation.en: I have bought three laptops of this series!
translation.source: 目前已经购买了这个系列3款机器！
translation.medium: Currently, I have purchased three models of this series!
translation.reference: I have bought three laptops of this series!

translation.zh: 外观漂亮好看，配置也很好
translation.en: It looks beautiful and has good configurations.
translation.source: 外观漂亮好看，配置也很好
translation.medium: The appearance is beautiful and good-looking, and the configuration is also very good.
translation.reference: It looks beautiful and has good configurations.

translation.zh: 给外甥买的，本想等418银行活动，结果他急用，所以就提前买了，所以没赶上银行大活动，有点遗憾。
translation.en: I bought it for my nephew; I thought I would wait for the 418 bank sale, but he needed it urgently and I just bought it earlier, so it was a pity that I wasn’t able to participate in the big bank sale.
translation.source: 给外甥买的，本想等418银行活动，结果他急用，所以就提前买了，所以没赶上银行大活动，有点遗憾。
translation.medium: I bought it for my nephew, originally planning to wait for the April 18th bank promotion, but he needed it urgently, so I made the purchase early and missed the big bank event, which is a bit regrettable.
translation.reference: I bought it for my nephew; I thought I would wait for the 418 bank sale, but he needed it urgently and I just bought it earlier, so it was a pity that I wasn’t able to participate in the big bank sale.

translation.zh: 不过性价比挺高的，物流也挺快的，用一段时间再来追评吧
translation.en: But it was cost-effective and shipping was fast; I’ll make a follow-up review after using it for some time.
translation.source: 不过性价比挺高的，物流也挺快的，用一段时间再来追评吧
translation.medium: However, the cost performance is quite high, and the logistics is also quite fast. I'll give additional feedback after using it for a while.
translation.reference: But it was cost-effective and shipping was fast; I’ll make a follow-up review after using it for some time.

translation.zh: 全新原装，性价比超高的一款游戏笔记本电脑，设计风格很不错已经安装了windows11和office2019
translation.en: Brand new in original packaging, highly cost-effective game laptop; design style is good and windows 11 and office 2019 have already been installed.
translation.source: 全新原装，性价比超高的一款游戏笔记本电脑，设计风格很不错已经安装了windows11和office2019
translation.medium: Brand new and original, this gaming laptop offers an excellent cost-performance ratio and features a stylish design, already equipped with Windows 11 and Office 2019.
translation.reference: Brand new in original packaging, highly cost-effective game laptop; design style is good and windows 11 and office 2019 have already been installed.

translation.zh: 显示效果：买了小孩做3D渲染用的,软件己装,小孩说可以使用没问题,这款电脑做3D设计工作性能可以.
translation.en: Display effect: I bought it for my child to do 3D rendering; the software has been installed and my child said it worked fine; this laptop works OK for 3D design.
translation.source: 显示效果：买了小孩做3D渲染用的,软件己装,小孩说可以使用没问题,这款电脑做3D设计工作性能可以.
translation.medium: Display effect: Bought it for the child for 3D rendering, the software is already installed, the child says it can be used without any problem, this computer's performance for 3D design work is satisfactory.
translation.reference: Display effect: I bought it for my child to do 3D rendering; the software has been installed and my child said it worked fine; this laptop works OK for 3D design.

translation.zh: 买给儿子的，他说很好。
translation.en: I bought it for my son, and he said it’s pretty good.
translation.source: 买给儿子的，他说很好。
translation.medium: Bought it for my son, he said it's very good.
translation.reference: I bought it for my son, and he said it’s pretty good.

translation.zh: 电脑挺好的，尤其是客服态度很好，不懂的问就好，推荐购买
translation.en: The laptop is good; the customer service staff is really nice; just ask them if you have any question; recommended.
translation.source: 电脑挺好的，尤其是客服态度很好，不懂的问就好，推荐购买
translation.medium: The computer is quite good, especially the customer service attitude is very good. Just ask if you don't understand, I recommend buying it.
translation.reference: The laptop is good; the customer service staff is really nice; just ask them if you have any question; recommended.

translation.zh: 还不错，玩游戏的画质是真的香
translation.en: Not bad, the image quality for playing games is really nice.
translation.source: 还不错，玩游戏的画质是真的香
translation.medium: Not bad, the graphics quality for gaming is really awesome.
translation.reference: Not bad, the image quality for playing games is really nice.

translation.zh: 2021年什么最火？
translation.en: What is the hottest thing in 2021?
translation.source: 2021年什么最火？
translation.medium: What was the hottest trend in 2021?
translation.reference: What is the hottest thing in 2021?

translation.zh: 无疑是东京奥运会。
translation.en: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.source: 无疑是东京奥运会。
translation.medium: Undoubtedly, it's the Tokyo Olympic Games.
translation.reference: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.

translation.zh: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
translation.en: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
translation.source: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
translation.medium: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win medals?
translation.reference: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?

translation.zh: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
translation.en: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.
translation.source: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
translation.medium: The article "Look! Project Managers Can Tackle Gold-Medal Olympic Events" was trending recently, stating that project managers definitely take the lead in many projects, unmatched by peers: moving bricks, business trips, and working overnight are part of the daily routine for project managers, while firefighting, shouldering blame, and apologizing are all in a day's work.
translation.reference: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.

translation.zh: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
translation.en: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.
translation.source: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
translation.medium: An article that appears to be jokingly teasing actually speaks to the daily hardships of project managers, representing the helplessness they feel towards the current state of project management work.
translation.reference: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.

translation.zh: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
translation.en: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.
translation.source: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
translation.medium: People engaged in project management are also gradually choosing to take some actions to extricate themselves from difficulties in their work.
translation.reference: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.

translation.zh: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
translation.en: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.
translation.source: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
translation.medium: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (Project Management Professional with international certification) applicants each year, more and more project management practitioners are improving their project management skills through learning.
translation.reference: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.

translation.zh: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
translation.en: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.
translation.source: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
translation.medium: According to the "Twenty Years Development Report of Project Management in China (1999-2019)", as of September 2019, the cumulative number of PMP® exam registrants in the country is nearly 600,000, the number of people who have passed the PMP® certification is about 420,000, and the number of valid certificate holders is about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the global total of PMP® certificate holders.
translation.reference: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.

translation.zh: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
translation.en: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.
translation.source: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
translation.medium: Over the past 10 years, the number of PMP (Project Management Professional) certificate holders has been increasing year by year. This indicates that more and more project managers realize that it is no longer advisable to rely solely on copying the "old experience" of the past. The rapidly changing work environment makes us aware that one must learn to explore the path forward by standing on the shoulders of scientific giants.
translation.reference: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.

translation.zh: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
translation.en: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?
translation.source: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
translation.medium: However, can passing the PMP ensure that project management work will proceed smoothly without any hindrance?
translation.reference: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?

translation.zh: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
translation.en: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.
translation.source: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
translation.medium: Many project management beginners indicate that by studying courses like PMP/IPMP, they can systematically grasp the ten knowledge areas and the five process groups related to project management, but when it actually comes to managing a project, they still feel completely at sea.
translation.reference: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.

translation.zh: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
translation.en: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...
translation.source: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
translation.medium: Many project managers often report the following issues: Inadequate understanding of project management, reliance solely on personal experience, possessing theoretical knowledge of project management without knowing how to put it into practice; lacking systematic project management processes and institutional support, resulting in an inability to implement in the work environment, inaccurate project estimations, poor control and sensitivity, leading to repeated project delays; unclear division of tasks among members, the team's "old hands" are at a loss on how to deal with situation. Cross-departmental assistance and communication are not smooth, making it difficult to advance the project...
translation.reference: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...

translation.zh: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
translation.en: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.
translation.source: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
translation.medium: Therefore, having focused on product innovation and R&D management for over a decade, Zhongtian Huaxia Consulting, which has helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and has been awarded the honor of "China's Enterprise R&D Management Talent Training Demonstration Base," has brought the "R&D Project Manager Boot Camp" online course.
translation.reference: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.

translation.zh: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
translation.en: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.
translation.source: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
translation.medium: "R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp" online course. This is an online fragmented learning method, combining practical cases, tools, and methods from numerous R&D-oriented enterprises to help you master the essential knowledge and standard actions of a project manager, leading you on the path to advanced project management.
translation.reference: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.

translation.zh: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
translation.en: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.
translation.source: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
translation.medium: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers with lower costs and less input, bringing about efficient operational results for the enterprises.
translation.reference: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.

translation.zh: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
translation.en: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.
translation.source: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
translation.medium: Words alone are no proof, you can first look at how other students evaluate this course: The course is delivered by the Zhongtian Huaxia expert team (originally from Huawei's R&D management team), and combines international advanced project management methodologies with numerous real business scenarios from well-known companies, to provide a thorough yet accessible professional explanation of the course content.
translation.reference: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.

translation.zh: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
translation.en: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.
translation.source: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
translation.medium: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods, as well as a wealth of template forms to help students apply what they have learned to their specific work after class.
translation.reference: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.

translation.zh: 一个虾饺订单只有一个？
translation.en: Is there only one shrimp dumpling in the order?
translation.source: 一个虾饺订单只有一个？
translation.medium: One order of shrimp dumplings only comes with one?
translation.reference: Is there only one shrimp dumpling in the order?

translation.zh: 为什么抄手有 6 个？
translation.en: Why are there six wontons？
translation.source: 为什么抄手有 6 个？
translation.medium: Why are there 6 wontons?
translation.reference: Why are there six wontons？

translation.zh: 捷信“双十二”前夕向消费者倡导理性消费 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
translation.en: Home Credit advocated rational consumption to consumers before the “Double Twelve” sale - Economic Observer - a professional financial news website
translation.source: 捷信“双十二”前夕向消费者倡导理性消费 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
translation.medium: Just before "Double Twelve," Home Credit advocates rational consumption to consumers - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website
translation.reference: Home Credit advocated rational consumption to consumers before the “Double Twelve” sale - Economic Observer - a professional financial news website

translation.zh: 今年“双十一”狂欢节全国网络支付业务交易金额达到1.77万亿元，相较往年再创新高。
translation.en: During the “Double Eleven” festival this year, the amount of national online payment business transaction reached 1.77 trillion yuan, creating a new high when compared with that of previous years.
translation.source: 今年“双十一”狂欢节全国网络支付业务交易金额达到1.77万亿元，相较往年再创新高。
translation.medium: This year's "Double Eleven" shopping festival reached a transaction volume of 1.77 trillion yuan in nationwide online payment services, setting a new record compared to previous years.
translation.reference: During the “Double Eleven” festival this year, the amount of national online payment business transaction reached 1.77 trillion yuan, creating a new high when compared with that of previous years.

translation.zh: 花样繁多的满减红包，抓人眼球的直播带货再一次让消费者大呼获益，这股消费热潮一方面让人感叹国民消费力愈发强劲，另一方面也不得不冷静下来思考消费主义对社会以及当代主流消费群体的影响。
translation.en: Various kinds of coupons and the eye-catching live-streaming sales once again make consumers feel they’ve gained benefits; this spending spree makes people feel amazed at the increasingly strong spending power of citizens; on the other hand, people need to calm down and think about the influences of consumerism on society and modern mainstream consumer groups.
translation.source: 花样繁多的满减红包，抓人眼球的直播带货再一次让消费者大呼获益，这股消费热潮一方面让人感叹国民消费力愈发强劲，另一方面也不得不冷静下来思考消费主义对社会以及当代主流消费群体的影响。
translation.medium: A variety of full discount red envelopes and attention-grabbing live commerce have once again led consumers to exclaim their benefits. This consumption craze, on one hand, makes one marvel at the increasingly strong spending power of the population. On the other hand, it also necessitates a sober reflection on the impact of consumerism on society and the contemporary mainstream consumer groups.
translation.reference: Various kinds of coupons and the eye-catching live-streaming sales once again make consumers feel they’ve gained benefits; this spending spree makes people feel amazed at the increasingly strong spending power of citizens; on the other hand, people need to calm down and think about the influences of consumerism on society and modern mainstream consumer groups.

translation.zh: 在“双十二”到来前夕，捷信消费金融有限公司（以下简称“捷信 ” ） 发出理性消费倡导，提醒广大用户尤其是年轻人树立良好的消费意识与消费习惯，拒绝盲目消费与过度消费。
translation.en: Before the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit B.V. (hereinafter referred to as “Home Credit”) advocated rational consumption, reminding its users, especially young users, to develop good consumption awareness and habits, and reject blind and excessive consumption.
translation.source: 在“双十二”到来前夕，捷信消费金融有限公司（以下简称“捷信 ” ） 发出理性消费倡导，提醒广大用户尤其是年轻人树立良好的消费意识与消费习惯，拒绝盲目消费与过度消费。
translation.medium: Ahead of the "Double 12" shopping event, Home Credit Consumer Finance Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Home Credit") issued a call for rational consumption, reminding consumers, especially young people, to establish good consumption awareness and habits, and to reject blind and excessive consumption.
translation.reference: Before the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit B.V. (hereinafter referred to as “Home Credit”) advocated rational consumption, reminding its users, especially young users, to develop good consumption awareness and habits, and reject blind and excessive consumption.

translation.zh: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。
translation.en: According to the Report of Survey Analysis on Financial Literacy of Consumers published by People’s Bank of China this year, the financial literacy index of national consumers is 66.81, increased by 2.04 compared with that of 2019.
translation.source: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。
translation.medium: According to the "Consumer Financial Literacy Survey and Analysis Report" released by the People's Bank of China this year, the national consumer financial literacy index stands at 66.81, an increase of 2.04 compared to 2019.
translation.reference: According to the Report of Survey Analysis on Financial Literacy of Consumers published by People’s Bank of China this year, the financial literacy index of national consumers is 66.81, increased by 2.04 compared with that of 2019.

translation.zh: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。
translation.en: Generally speaking, citizens in our country have good performance on financial consumption; however, there are big differences in various aspects of financial behaviors and skills, and further improvement of popularization of basic financial knowledge shall be made.
translation.source: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。
translation.medium: Overall, residents in our country perform well in terms of financial consumption, but there are significant differences in various aspects of financial behavior and skills, and there is still a need for further improvement in the level of basic financial knowledge.
translation.reference: Generally speaking, citizens in our country have good performance on financial consumption; however, there are big differences in various aspects of financial behaviors and skills, and further improvement of popularization of basic financial knowledge shall be made.

translation.zh: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。
translation.en: Level of financial literacy of senior citizens and young people is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects of financial education; according to the Report on Debt Status of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation has huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important means of consumption upgrading; 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half of them have no debt buildup; although there is a relatively rational consumption trend among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label of “excessive squander” put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption and consumption by following the trend, leading to excessive financial pressure and debt risks, and even resulting in increasing social problems; financial enterprises shall shoulder their social responsibilities and guide young consumers in a positive way.
translation.source: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。
translation.medium: The financial literacy levels of the elderly and youth are relatively low, and the "old and young" will continue to be the key target audiences for financial education; Nielsen's "China Young People's Debt Situation Report" and CCTV Finance's "2019-2020 China Youth Consumption Report" show that the younger generation has tremendous consumption potential, with credit consumption becoming an important avenue for consumption upgrades. 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half are not accumulating debt. Although the younger generation as a whole tends to consume rationally, which is quite different from the label of "overspending" that is often attached to them externally, some young people do indeed engage in excessive consumption and trend-following buying behavior, thereby creating significant financial pressure and debt risk, and even leading to a gradual increase in social problems. Financial enterprises should bravely take on social responsibility and provide positive guidance.
translation.reference: Level of financial literacy of senior citizens and young people is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects of financial education; according to the Report on Debt Status of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation has huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important means of consumption upgrading; 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half of them have no debt buildup; although there is a relatively rational consumption trend among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label of “excessive squander” put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption and consumption by following the trend, leading to excessive financial pressure and debt risks, and even resulting in increasing social problems; financial enterprises shall shoulder their social responsibilities and guide young consumers in a positive way.

translation.zh: 作为持牌消费金融机构，捷信一直致力于以优质、贴心的服务助力百姓构建自己的幸福生活，倡导消费者树立良好正确的消费观，并积极响应监管号召，以实际行动提升消费者尤其是年轻群体的理性消费意识。
translation.en: As a licensed consumer finance institution, Home Credit has always been engaged in helping citizens construct their own happy lives with high-quality and thoughtful services, advocating consumers to establish correct consumption view, and actively responding to the call of the supervision units so as to improve the rational consumption awareness of consumers, especially young consumers, with practical actions.
translation.source: 作为持牌消费金融机构，捷信一直致力于以优质、贴心的服务助力百姓构建自己的幸福生活，倡导消费者树立良好正确的消费观，并积极响应监管号召，以实际行动提升消费者尤其是年轻群体的理性消费意识。
translation.medium: As a licensed consumer finance institution, Home Credit has always been committed to assisting people in building their own happy lives with high-quality, thoughtful services, advocating for consumers to establish a positive and correct view of consumption, and actively responding to regulatory calls to enhance consumer awareness of rational consumption, especially among the young demographic.
translation.reference: As a licensed consumer finance institution, Home Credit has always been engaged in helping citizens construct their own happy lives with high-quality and thoughtful services, advocating consumers to establish correct consumption view, and actively responding to the call of the supervision units so as to improve the rational consumption awareness of consumers, especially young consumers, with practical actions.

translation.zh: 在过去多年间，捷信不断针对包含大学生在内的青年群体开展全方位、多样化的金融知识普及活动，并通过与国内顶级院校合作发动创新实践大赛等多种形式潜移默化对年轻群体的消费需求进行合理引导,帮助其树立理性消费观念,合理规划消费需求,进而为其累积人生财富助力。
translation.en: In the past years, Home Credit has been holding comprehensive and diversified financial knowledge popularization activities aiming at young people, including university students; in addition, it has unconsciously offered reasonable guidance on the consumption demands of young groups by means such as cooperating with top universities in the country to host innovative practice competitions, so as to help students establish rational consumption concept and plan for consumption demands reasonably, and to assist them in accumulating life fortunes.
translation.source: 在过去多年间，捷信不断针对包含大学生在内的青年群体开展全方位、多样化的金融知识普及活动，并通过与国内顶级院校合作发动创新实践大赛等多种形式潜移默化对年轻群体的消费需求进行合理引导,帮助其树立理性消费观念,合理规划消费需求,进而为其累积人生财富助力。
translation.medium: Over the past years, Home Credit has been carrying out comprehensive and diversified financial literacy activities aimed at young people, including university students, and has subtly influenced the consumption needs of this group through reasonable guidance by launching innovative practice competitions in cooperation with top domestic universities, helping them establish rational consumption concepts, plan their consumer demands reasonably, and thereby contributing to the accumulation of their lifetime wealth.
translation.reference: In the past years, Home Credit has been holding comprehensive and diversified financial knowledge popularization activities aiming at young people, including university students; in addition, it has unconsciously offered reasonable guidance on the consumption demands of young groups by means such as cooperating with top universities in the country to host innovative practice competitions, so as to help students establish rational consumption concept and plan for consumption demands reasonably, and to assist them in accumulating life fortunes.

translation.zh: 双十二到来之际，捷信提醒所有消费者朋友树立合理的消费意识和正确的金钱观，抵制盲目消费和过度消费，规避消费借贷误区，以免影响个人征信以及今后的经济生活。
translation.en: Upon the arriving of the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit reminds all consumers to establish rational consumption awareness and correct concept of money, resist blind and excessive consumption, and avoid forming misunderstanding of loan for consumption, in case it will impact personal credit investigation and economic life in the future.
translation.source: 双十二到来之际，捷信提醒所有消费者朋友树立合理的消费意识和正确的金钱观，抵制盲目消费和过度消费，规避消费借贷误区，以免影响个人征信以及今后的经济生活。
translation.medium: As Double 12 arrives, Home Credit reminds all consumer friends to establish a reasonable consumption awareness and correct view of money, to resist blind and excessive consumption, and to avoid misconceptions about consumer lending, so as not to affect personal credit and future financial life.
translation.reference: Upon the arriving of the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit reminds all consumers to establish rational consumption awareness and correct concept of money, resist blind and excessive consumption, and avoid forming misunderstanding of loan for consumption, in case it will impact personal credit investigation and economic life in the future.

translation.zh: 消费时一定要提前规划，量力而为按时还款。
translation.en: Be sure to plan in advance when making consumption, live beneath your means, and make repayment as schedule.
translation.source: 消费时一定要提前规划，量力而为按时还款。
translation.medium: When spending, be sure to plan ahead, live within your means, and repay on time.
translation.reference: Be sure to plan in advance when making consumption, live beneath your means, and make repayment as schedule.

translation.zh: 如果逾期，逾期记录将记录到个人信用报告中，可能会对日后买车、购房等经济生活造成不良影响。
translation.en: If it’s overdue, related overdue behavior will be recorded in personal credit report, which may lead to adverse influences on economic life such as buying a car or a house in the future.
translation.source: 如果逾期，逾期记录将记录到个人信用报告中，可能会对日后买车、购房等经济生活造成不良影响。
translation.medium: If overdue, the overdue record will be recorded in the individual credit report and may adversely affect economic activities such as buying a car or purchasing a house in the future.
translation.reference: If it’s overdue, related overdue behavior will be recorded in personal credit report, which may lead to adverse influences on economic life such as buying a car or a house in the future.

translation.zh: 与此同时，在享受金融产品和服务时，还应选择正规机构及渠道，并注意查验相关机构是否具备经营资质。
translation.en: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, be sure to choose authorized institutions and channels and check if related institutions have the qualification for operation.
translation.source: 与此同时，在享受金融产品和服务时，还应选择正规机构及渠道，并注意查验相关机构是否具备经营资质。
translation.medium: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, one should also choose formal institutions and channels, and pay attention to verify whether the relevant institutions have the qualifications to operate.
translation.reference: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, be sure to choose authorized institutions and channels and check if related institutions have the qualification for operation.

translation.zh: 未来，捷信将一如既往凭借其成熟、可靠的消费金融体系和不断更新迭代的金融产品，为消费者带来更贴合需求和多元化的服务，不断助力大众提升金融知识水平，帮助消费者培养理性消费、适度借贷的理念，做消费者终生可信赖的消费金融伙伴。
translation.en: In the future, Home Credit will continue to provide consumers with diversified services fitting their demands with mature and reliable consumption finance systems and constantly upgraded financial products, so as to improve the public’s financial knowledge level and help consumers develop the concepts of rational consumption and taking out loans in moderation, and be a consumption finance partner which consumers can trust for a lifetime.
translation.source: 未来，捷信将一如既往凭借其成熟、可靠的消费金融体系和不断更新迭代的金融产品，为消费者带来更贴合需求和多元化的服务，不断助力大众提升金融知识水平，帮助消费者培养理性消费、适度借贷的理念，做消费者终生可信赖的消费金融伙伴。
translation.medium: In the future, Home Credit will continue to leverage its mature and reliable consumer finance system, along with its constantly updated financial products, to provide consumers with services that are more tailored to their needs and diversified. It will persistently help the public to improve their financial literacy, and assist consumers in developing concepts of rational consumption and moderate borrowing, striving to be a lifelong, trustworthy consumer finance partner for consumers.
translation.reference: In the future, Home Credit will continue to provide consumers with diversified services fitting their demands with mature and reliable consumption finance systems and constantly upgraded financial products, so as to improve the public’s financial knowledge level and help consumers develop the concepts of rational consumption and taking out loans in moderation, and be a consumption finance partner which consumers can trust for a lifetime.

translation.zh: 我不会去
translation.en: I won’t go.
translation.source: 我不会去
translation.medium: I will not go.
translation.reference: I won’t go.

translation.zh: 我是按送单
translation.en: I placed a delivery order.
translation.source: 我是按送单
translation.medium: I am a delivery man.
translation.reference: I placed a delivery order.

translation.zh: 这 1 个小时从没有人联系我，这根本是网上诈骗
translation.en: No one contacted me during this one hour, and this is online fraud.
translation.source: 这 1 个小时从没有人联系我，这根本是网上诈骗
translation.medium: For this one hour, no one has contacted me, this is simply an online scam.
translation.reference: No one contacted me during this one hour, and this is online fraud.

translation.zh: 你以为我第一次叫外卖？
translation.en: You think this is the first time that I have ordered food?
translation.source: 你以为我第一次叫外卖？
translation.medium: Do you think this is the first time I've ordered takeout?
translation.reference: You think this is the first time that I have ordered food?

translation.zh: 调查完，你就也是这么说的！我下单前，都 check 了地址好几次，才下的单
translation.en: You said that after the investigation! I checked the address multiple times before placing the order.
translation.source: 调查完，你就也是这么说的！我下单前，都 check 了地址好几次，才下的单
translation.medium: After the investigation, you'll say the same thing! Before I placed the order, I checked the address several times.
translation.reference: You said that after the investigation! I checked the address multiple times before placing the order.

translation.zh: 好的，谢谢！那是多少天？
translation.en: Okay, thank you! How many days?
translation.source: 好的，谢谢！那是多少天？
translation.medium: Sure, thank you! How many days is that?
translation.reference: Okay, thank you! How many days?

translation.zh: 越南人民报网 - 海湾合作委员会应对共同挑战
translation.en: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website - Gulf Cooperation Council tackle common challenges
translation.source: 越南人民报网 - 海湾合作委员会应对共同挑战
translation.medium: Vietnam People's Daily Online - Gulf Cooperation Council addresses common challenges
translation.reference: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website - Gulf Cooperation Council tackle common challenges

translation.zh: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
translation.en: The locations where Mohammed Bin Salman, the Saudi Arabia’s prince stayed include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait.
translation.source: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
translation.medium: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's stops include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain, and Kuwait.
translation.reference: The locations where Mohammed Bin Salman, the Saudi Arabia’s prince stayed include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait.

translation.zh: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
translation.en: It’s worth noting that it was the first time for Mohammed to visit Qatar since Saudi Arabia and the Arabian alliances imposed an embargo on Qatar in the middle of the year 2017 and led to the Gulf Diplomatic Crisis.
translation.source: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
translation.medium: It is noteworthy that this is the first visit of Crown Prince Mohammed to Qatar since the imposition of an embargo on Qatar by Saudi Arabia and its Arab allies in mid-2017, which led to the Gulf diplomatic crisis.
translation.reference: It’s worth noting that it was the first time for Mohammed to visit Qatar since Saudi Arabia and the Arabian alliances imposed an embargo on Qatar in the middle of the year 2017 and led to the Gulf Diplomatic Crisis.

translation.zh: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
translation.en: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain and Egypt severed the diplomatic relations with Qatar and implemented a full embargo; they blamed Qatar for supporting terrorist organizations and keeping close relations with Iran.
translation.source: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
translation.medium: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Bahrain, and Egypt severed diplomatic relations with Qatar and imposed a comprehensive embargo, accusing Qatar of supporting terrorist organizations and having close ties with Iran.
translation.reference: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain and Egypt severed the diplomatic relations with Qatar and implemented a full embargo; they blamed Qatar for supporting terrorist organizations and keeping close relations with Iran.

translation.zh: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
translation.en: Diplomatic tensions had a serious impact on the internal unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council, exerting a negative influence on economy of the countries and regions in that region.
translation.source: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
translation.medium: Diplomatic tensions have seriously affected the internal unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council, having a negative impact on the economy of the countries in the region.
translation.reference: Diplomatic tensions had a serious impact on the internal unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council, exerting a negative influence on economy of the countries and regions in that region.

translation.zh: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
translation.en: The four Arabian countries blocked the land, sea and air routes to Qatar.
translation.source: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
translation.medium: Four Arab countries have blockaded the land, sea, and air routes to Qatar.
translation.reference: The four Arabian countries blocked the land, sea and air routes to Qatar.

translation.zh: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
translation.en: The crisis was only solved at the Gulf Cooperation Council Summit in January, 2021, when the gulf countries signed an agreement for “unity and stabilization” with the mediation by the U.S. and Kuwait.
translation.source: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
translation.medium: This crisis was resolved only at the Gulf Cooperation Council summit in January 2021, where the Gulf nations signed an agreement mediated by the United States and Kuwait aimed at "unity and stability."
translation.reference: The crisis was only solved at the Gulf Cooperation Council Summit in January, 2021, when the gulf countries signed an agreement for “unity and stabilization” with the mediation by the U.S. and Kuwait.

translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
translation.en: Saudi Arabia has reopened its boundary with Qatar.
translation.source: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
translation.medium: Saudi Arabia has reopened its borders with Qatar.
translation.reference: Saudi Arabia has reopened its boundary with Qatar.

translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
translation.en: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are taking the lead in recovering the relations with Qatar by appointing new ambassadors in Qatar.
translation.source: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
translation.medium: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are making efforts to restore relations with Qatar by appointing new ambassadors to Qatar as a first step.
translation.reference: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are taking the lead in recovering the relations with Qatar by appointing new ambassadors in Qatar.

translation.zh: 海湾阿拉伯国家化解分歧，以恢复与卡塔尔的关系出自于为各国的利益和地区稳定而必须团结起来的要求，旨在应对共同挑战。
translation.en: Arab countries in the gulf aimed to resolve divergence; and restoring relations with Qatar originates from the need to unite for the interests of all countries and regional stability, so as to cope with common challenges.
translation.source: 海湾阿拉伯国家化解分歧，以恢复与卡塔尔的关系出自于为各国的利益和地区稳定而必须团结起来的要求，旨在应对共同挑战。
translation.medium: Gulf Arab states resolve differences to restore relations with Qatar, stemming from the need to unite for the benefit of all countries and regional stability, and to address common challenges.
translation.reference: Arab countries in the gulf aimed to resolve divergence; and restoring relations with Qatar originates from the need to unite for the interests of all countries and regional stability, so as to cope with common challenges.

translation.zh: 此次沙特王储访问阿曼期间，双方同意开通了两个海湾邻国间第一条直接陆路通道。
translation.en: During the period when the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia visited Oman, both parties agreed to open the first direct land road passage between the two neighboring countries in the gulf.
translation.source: 此次沙特王储访问阿曼期间，双方同意开通了两个海湾邻国间第一条直接陆路通道。
translation.medium: During the Saudi Crown Prince's visit to Oman, both parties agreed to open the first direct land passageway between the two Gulf neighbors.
translation.reference: During the period when the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia visited Oman, both parties agreed to open the first direct land road passage between the two neighboring countries in the gulf.

translation.zh: 连接两国长达725公里长的通道将为两国公民的出行和整合供应链提供便利条件。
translation.en: A passage of 725km connecting the two countries will provide convenience for the travel of citizens and integration of the supply chain of the two countries.
translation.source: 连接两国长达725公里长的通道将为两国公民的出行和整合供应链提供便利条件。
translation.medium: The corridor, spanning 725 kilometers between the two countries, will provide convenient conditions for the travel of citizens of both nations and the integration of supply chains.
translation.reference: A passage of 725km connecting the two countries will provide convenience for the travel of citizens and integration of the supply chain of the two countries.

translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 (PIF)将在阿曼投入50亿美元，两国企业签署了价值为300亿美元的13份合作谅解备忘录。
translation.en: The Public Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia (PIF) will invest 5 billion USD in Oman, and enterprises of the two countries have signed 13 memorandums of understanding of cooperation worth 30 billion USD.
translation.source: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 (PIF)将在阿曼投入50亿美元，两国企业签署了价值为300亿美元的13份合作谅解备忘录。
translation.medium: The Saudi Public Investment Fund (PIF) will invest 5 billion US dollars in Oman, and enterprises from the two countries have signed 13 Memoranda of Understanding (MoUs) with a value of 30 billion US dollars.
translation.reference: The Public Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia (PIF) will invest 5 billion USD in Oman, and enterprises of the two countries have signed 13 memorandums of understanding of cooperation worth 30 billion USD.

translation.zh: 沙特王储对海湾国家访问之行恰逢伊朗与世界各大国就挽救名为《联合全面行动计划 》 （ JCPOA）的伊朗核协议 — — 一项海湾阿拉伯国家因认为无法解决与伊朗导弹问题而谴责的协议进行谈判。
translation.en: The travel of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia to gulf countries happened as the negotiation was ongoing between Iran and major countries about saving a nuclear deal named Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), an agreement condemned by the Arab Gulf countries as it’s believed it cannot solve the missile issue with Iran.
translation.source: 沙特王储对海湾国家访问之行恰逢伊朗与世界各大国就挽救名为《联合全面行动计划 》 （ JCPOA）的伊朗核协议 — — 一项海湾阿拉伯国家因认为无法解决与伊朗导弹问题而谴责的协议进行谈判。
translation.medium: The visit of the Saudi Crown Prince to the Gulf countries coincides with negotiations between Iran and major world powers to save the so-called "Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action" (JCPOA), an Iranian nuclear agreement condemned by Gulf Arab states for failing to address the issue of Iranian missiles.
translation.reference: The travel of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia to gulf countries happened as the negotiation was ongoing between Iran and major countries about saving a nuclear deal named Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), an agreement condemned by the Arab Gulf countries as it’s believed it cannot solve the missile issue with Iran.

translation.zh: 各海湾国家一直将伊朗视为长期的“竞争对手 ” ， 并将伊朗的核计划视为对地区安全的“威胁 ” 。
translation.en: All gulf countries have always regarded Iran as the long-term “competitor” and regarded the nuclear program of Iran as a “threat” to regional security.
translation.source: 各海湾国家一直将伊朗视为长期的“竞争对手 ” ， 并将伊朗的核计划视为对地区安全的“威胁 ” 。
translation.medium: The Gulf countries have always regarded Iran as a long-term "competitor" and see Iran’s nuclear program as a "threat" to regional security.
translation.reference: All gulf countries have always regarded Iran as the long-term “competitor” and regarded the nuclear program of Iran as a “threat” to regional security.

translation.zh: 各海湾国家认为，不解决伊朗导弹问题，不采取行动来遏制伊朗在该地区的活动是有缺陷的。
translation.en: According to the gulf countries, it is defective not to solve the problem of the guided missiles of Iran or not to take actions to curb the activities of Iran in this region.
translation.source: 各海湾国家认为，不解决伊朗导弹问题，不采取行动来遏制伊朗在该地区的活动是有缺陷的。
translation.medium: The Gulf states believe that it is flawed not to resolve the Iranian missile issue and not to take action to contain Iran's activities in the region.
translation.reference: According to the gulf countries, it is defective not to solve the problem of the guided missiles of Iran or not to take actions to curb the activities of Iran in this region.

translation.zh: 在各大国与伊朗核谈判未能满足各海湾国家愿望的背景下，沙特阿拉伯与伊朗进行了直接谈判。
translation.en: Under the backdrop where the nuclear negotiation between major countries and Iran was not able to meet the demand of the gulf countries, Saudi Arabia and Iran conducted a direct negotiation.
translation.source: 在各大国与伊朗核谈判未能满足各海湾国家愿望的背景下，沙特阿拉伯与伊朗进行了直接谈判。
translation.medium: Direct negotiations between Saudi Arabia and Iran took place against the backdrop of the major powers failing to meet the expectations of the Gulf countries in the nuclear talks with Iran.
translation.reference: Under the backdrop where the nuclear negotiation between major countries and Iran was not able to meet the demand of the gulf countries, Saudi Arabia and Iran conducted a direct negotiation.

translation.zh: 其目标是遏制该地区紧张局势的升级。
translation.en: The objective was to restrain the upgrading of the tense situations in this region.
translation.source: 其目标是遏制该地区紧张局势的升级。
translation.medium: Its goal is to curb the escalation of tensions in the region.
translation.reference: The objective was to restrain the upgrading of the tense situations in this region.

translation.zh: 这是减缓海湾合作委员会国家经济增长的因素之一。
translation.en: This is one of the factors that slow down the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
translation.source: 这是减缓海湾合作委员会国家经济增长的因素之一。
translation.medium: This is one of the factors that slow down the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
translation.reference: This is one of the factors that slow down the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.

translation.zh: 即将举行的海合会峰会将是自从一些成员国与卡塔尔的争议结束以来海合会国家的首次峰会。
translation.en: The summit of the Gulf Cooperation Council to be held soon will be the first summit for countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council since the end of the dispute between some member countries and Qatar.
translation.source: 即将举行的海合会峰会将是自从一些成员国与卡塔尔的争议结束以来海合会国家的首次峰会。
translation.medium: The upcoming GCC summit will be the first summit for the GCC countries since the resolution of disputes with Qatar by some member states.
translation.reference: The summit of the Gulf Cooperation Council to be held soon will be the first summit for countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council since the end of the dispute between some member countries and Qatar.

translation.zh: 这是海湾合作委员会重新评估为促进恢复海合会统一作出贡献的外交成果的机会，同时提出各项措施，使其成员国充分合作，以应对共同挑战，为海湾国家的稳定与发展作出贡献。
translation.en: This is the opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to reassess the diplomatic achievements that have contributed to the restoration of the unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council; at the same time, various measures are being proposed to make the member countries cooperate sufficiently, so as to cope with common challenges and make contributions to stabilization and development of the gulf countries.
translation.source: 这是海湾合作委员会重新评估为促进恢复海合会统一作出贡献的外交成果的机会，同时提出各项措施，使其成员国充分合作，以应对共同挑战，为海湾国家的稳定与发展作出贡献。
translation.medium: This is an opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to reassess diplomatic achievements that have contributed to the promotion of restoring unity within the GCC, while proposing various measures that ensure full cooperation among its member states to address common challenges, contributing to the stability and development of the Gulf nations.
translation.reference: This is the opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to reassess the diplomatic achievements that have contributed to the restoration of the unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council; at the same time, various measures are being proposed to make the member countries cooperate sufficiently, so as to cope with common challenges and make contributions to stabilization and development of the gulf countries.

translation.zh: 从 7 点到现在 9:30 都还没有送到，必须要退还订金及取消订单
translation.en: It hasn’t arrived since 7 o’clock and now it’s 9:30, and you must refund the deposit and cancel the order.
translation.source: 从 7 点到现在 9:30 都还没有送到，必须要退还订金及取消订单
translation.medium: From 7 o'clock to now 9:30, it still hasn't been delivered, the deposit must be refunded and the order cancelled.
translation.reference: It hasn’t arrived since 7 o’clock and now it’s 9:30, and you must refund the deposit and cancel the order.

translation.zh: 好的
translation.en: OK.
translation.source: 好的
translation.medium: Sure
translation.reference: OK.

translation.zh: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
translation.en: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!
translation.source: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
translation.medium: Known for having the loudest supercar exhaust sound in the Xinshan District!
translation.reference: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!

translation.zh: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
translation.en: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!
translation.source: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
translation.medium: This time, our team brings everyone this car, which is the dream of many men!
translation.reference: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!

translation.zh: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
translation.en: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!
translation.source: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
translation.medium: It is Lamborghini's flagship supercar, the successor to the Murcielago — the Aventador LP700-4!
translation.reference: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!

translation.zh: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
translation.en: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?
translation.source: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
translation.medium: Asking for nearly two million ringgit, the annual road tax is over ten thousand ringgit, all-wheel drive, why is it called LP700?
translation.reference: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?

translation.zh: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
translation.en: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?
translation.source: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
