translation.medium: With 700 horsepower, can you imagine how fast that is?
translation.reference: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?

translation.zh: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
translation.en: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.
translation.source: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
translation.medium: Well, forget it. Even the editor doesn't know. The data says it only takes 2.9 seconds to accelerate from 0-100km/h, which is probably about the time it takes for the editor's Myvi to reach 30km/h, others have already hit 100km/h, hm.
translation.reference: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.

translation.zh: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
translation.en: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.
translation.source: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
translation.medium: A low-profile body, ostentatious scissor doors, massive air intakes all around, and a 6.5 V12 engine in full view beneath the glass, perfectly encapsulate the style of Lamborghini.
translation.reference: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.

translation.zh: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
translation.en: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!
translation.source: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
translation.medium: There's no need to go into too much detail about the car models, just Google it for yourself. The editor has compiled some explanations that Google might not provide!
translation.reference: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!

translation.zh: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)
translation.en: It is too eye-catching; people look at it everywhere you go; it is uncomfortable! (It is actually sweet.)
translation.source: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)
translation.medium: Too much attention is focused on me; wherever I go, everyone is watching, which makes me quite uncomfortable! (Actually, it's kind of cool)
translation.reference: It is too eye-catching; people look at it everywhere you go; it is uncomfortable! (It is actually sweet.)

translation.zh: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)
translation.en: Gas is around RM1 for 1km (the owner wouldn’t even care)
translation.source: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)
translation.medium: 1km fuel cost is about RM1 (car owners basically don't care)
translation.reference: Gas is around RM1 for 1km (the owner wouldn’t even care)

translation.zh: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
translation.en: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).
translation.source: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
translation.medium: Practice getting in and out of the car to avoid embarrassment, otherwise, you might get stuck halfway out because you can't climb out of the compartment.
translation.reference: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).

translation.zh: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
translation.en: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)
translation.source: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
translation.medium: The engine noise is so loud that you'll go momentarily deaf after getting out of the car. (But it's still thrilling.)
translation.reference: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)

translation.zh: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
translation.en: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!
translation.source: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
translation.medium: The car body is too large, and parking in a regular parking space would be very tight. I'm really afraid of getting hit by the doors of the adjacent car when they open!
translation.reference: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!

translation.zh: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)
translation.en: You may get lonely because there is no rivalry on the road (I made it up; it has nothing to do with the car owners, haha.)
translation.source: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)
translation.medium: A bit lonely, because there's no rival on the road (That's what the editor says, it has nothing to do with the car owner, haha)
translation.reference: You may get lonely because there is no rivalry on the road (I made it up; it has nothing to do with the car owners, haha.)

translation.zh: 大家不要误会，这视频的超跑并没有要出售，抱歉！
translation.en: Don’t get me wrong; the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!
translation.source: 大家不要误会，这视频的超跑并没有要出售，抱歉！
translation.medium: Everyone, please don't misunderstand, the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!
translation.reference: Don’t get me wrong; the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!

translation.zh: 想要为你的爱车拍摄视频的朋友，欢迎联系我们！
translation.en: Please contact us if you want to take a video for your car!
translation.source: 想要为你的爱车拍摄视频的朋友，欢迎联系我们！
translation.medium: Friends who want to shoot videos for your beloved car, welcome to contact us!
translation.reference: Please contact us if you want to take a video for your car!

translation.zh: 更多你不知道的汽车资讯，就在 The Car Guide / 人民汽车志
translation.en: Know more about cars, come to The Car Guide.
translation.source: 更多你不知道的汽车资讯，就在 The Car Guide / 人民汽车志
translation.medium: More automotive information you don't know can be found at The Car Guide / People's Car Log.
translation.reference: Know more about cars, come to The Car Guide.

translation.zh: 牽扯到价值千万的车祸！
translation.en: A car crash involving tens of millions!
translation.source: 牽扯到价值千万的车祸！
translation.medium: Involved in a car accident worth millions!
translation.reference: A car crash involving tens of millions!

translation.zh: Bugatti Chiron 与 Porsche 911 相信车友们都认识，Chiron 是全球最贵超跑之一，而 Porsche 911 的车价也是百万等级！
translation.en: I believe car fans all know Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911; Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the price of Porsche 911 is also over a million!
translation.source: Bugatti Chiron 与 Porsche 911 相信车友们都认识，Chiron 是全球最贵超跑之一，而 Porsche 911 的车价也是百万等级！
translation.medium: Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911 are both well-known to car enthusiasts. The Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, while the Porsche 911 also boasts a price tag of a million!
translation.reference: I believe car fans all know Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911; Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the price of Porsche 911 is also over a million!

translation.zh: 那日前，国外就在短短几分钟内撞掉了百万跑车 911 还有千万超跑 Chiron！
translation.en: Recently, a car crashed into a million-level sports car 911 and a tens-of-millions level super car Chiron in just a few minutes in a foreign country!
translation.source: 那日前，国外就在短短几分钟内撞掉了百万跑车 911 还有千万超跑 Chiron！
translation.medium: Before that day, a foreigner crashed a million-dollar sports car, a 911, and a ten-million-dollar supercar, a Chiron, in just a few minutes!
translation.reference: Recently, a car crashed into a million-level sports car 911 and a tens-of-millions level super car Chiron in just a few minutes in a foreign country!

translation.zh: 看结果，贵是有道理的！
translation.en: It seems from the result that there’s a reason why it is so expensive!
translation.source: 看结果，贵是有道理的！
translation.medium: Seeing the outcome, it seems you were justified!
translation.reference: It seems from the result that there’s a reason why it is so expensive!

translation.zh: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
translation.en: Let university spirit resonate with spirit of the times - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
translation.medium: Let the spirit of the university resonate with the spirit of the times - Xinhua News Agency
translation.reference: Let university spirit resonate with spirit of the times - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
translation.en: University spirit refers to a series of educational philosophy and pursuit of values an university accumulates in its long-term development; it is the soul of the university.
translation.source: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
translation.medium: The so-called spirit of a university refers to a series of educational philosophies and value pursuits that are long-term accumulations formed during the development process of a university; it is the soul of the university.
translation.reference: University spirit refers to a series of educational philosophy and pursuit of values an university accumulates in its long-term development; it is the soul of the university.

translation.zh: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
translation.en: Since ancient times, university spirit is indispensable in the development of politics, economy, culture, technology and society, as well as in the progress of a nation.
translation.source: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
translation.medium: From ancient times to the present, the spirit of the university has been of vital importance to the development of politics, economy, culture, technology, and society, as well as to the progress of a nation.
translation.reference: Since ancient times, university spirit is indispensable in the development of politics, economy, culture, technology and society, as well as in the progress of a nation.

translation.zh: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
translation.en: Since the establishment of the first real university in the world, universities shoulder unique missions which are different from other social organizations; universities in our country emerged in times of national crisis; its spirit is heavily influenced by traditional culture and the change of times; it advocates the values of “benefiting the world with virtue, and governing the country with integrity” and the patriotic responsibility of “building a strong country by studying”.
translation.source: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
translation.medium: Since the birth of the world's first university in the modern sense, universities have shouldered a unique mission different from other social organizations. For our country's universities, which emerged during the national crisis, their spirit is deeply influenced by traditional culture and the changes of the times, advocating the value concept of "cultivating moral integrity and benefitting the world, fostering personal virtue and governing in peace" and the patriotic responsibility of "promoting education to strengthen the nation."
translation.reference: Since the establishment of the first real university in the world, universities shoulder unique missions which are different from other social organizations; universities in our country emerged in times of national crisis; its spirit is heavily influenced by traditional culture and the change of times; it advocates the values of “benefiting the world with virtue, and governing the country with integrity” and the patriotic responsibility of “building a strong country by studying”.

translation.zh: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
translation.en: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.
translation.source: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
translation.medium: Currently, the trends of informatization and internationalization in higher education are becoming increasingly apparent. The global competition in education, science and technology, and talent continues to intensify. As an important "supply side," the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.
translation.reference: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.

translation.zh: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
translation.en: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.
translation.source: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
translation.medium: The introduction of the "Overall Plan for Coordinating the Advancement of World-Class Universities and First-Class Disciplines" not only demonstrates our country's confidence and determination to transition from a major higher education country to a powerful higher education nation but also sets forth higher and newer requirements for the development of universities.
translation.reference: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.

translation.zh: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
translation.en: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?
translation.source: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
translation.medium: How can we strive to become a world-class entity in a relatively short period of time and hasten the establishment of several world-class universities and a number of world-class disciplines on the basis of still having certain gaps, and realize the "overtaking on a curve"?
translation.reference: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?

translation.zh: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
translation.en: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.
translation.source: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
translation.medium: In addition to firm confidence in goals, paths, and abilities, universities should also fully leverage three advantages: first, the latecomer advantage, by continuously introducing outstanding academic talent from overseas, learning from the advanced experiences of world-class universities, to achieve significant improvements in academic standards and education quality; second, the cultural advantage, inheriting the wisdom accumulated over five thousand years of Chinese civilization, promoting and developing the excellent traditional culture to gather strengths, shape the brand, and enhance the image; third, the institutional advantage, utilizing the superiorities of the socialist country’s system, strengthening goal-driven efforts, building consensus, optimizing resource allocation, providing a sustainable and solid guarantee for schools to rapidly catch up with and surpass world advanced levels.
translation.reference: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.

translation.zh: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
translation.en: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.
translation.source: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
translation.medium: It is particularly important to realize that building world-class universities cannot be a one-size-fits-all approach; each institution must not only play to its strengths but also highlight its unique character and features.
translation.reference: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.

translation.zh: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
translation.en: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.
translation.source: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
translation.medium: The characteristics of school management should not only have the common Chinese characteristics, but also reflect their own unique goal orientation, educational traditions, and resource endowments.
translation.reference: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.

translation.zh: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
translation.en: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
translation.medium: Regarding Zhejiang University, we focus on highlighting three aspects in running the school: First is the emphasis on the cultivation of innovative and entrepreneurial talents, building an integrated educational environment that combines science and education with school-enterprise collaboration, forming a full-chain entrepreneurial education ecosystem; second is the emphasis on the characteristics of interdisciplinary convergence, promoting the optimization and adjustment of the discipline system, creating an institutional environment for interdisciplinary interaction, and actively nurturing new emerging interdisciplinary fields and landmark interdisciplinary achievements; third is the emphasis on the characteristics of the education system and social services, conducting in-depth international exchange and cooperation, and accelerating the formation of a comprehensive Zhejiang University-industry-research collaboration system.
translation.reference: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.

translation.zh: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
translation.en: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.
translation.source: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
translation.medium: In this process, it is particularly important to always adhere to the spirit of the university, allowing the spirit of the university to resonate with the spirit of the times.
translation.reference: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.

translation.zh: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
translation.en: For Zhejiang University, the university motto of “seeking truth and making innovation”, the common values of “study diligently, cultivate morality, foster discernment, advocate honesty” and the principles of “harboring generosity like the ocean, seeking the truth while upholding morality, being brave enough to keep exploring, and building our country” constitute the newest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
translation.medium: For Zhejiang University, the motto "Seeking Truth and Innovation," the common values of "Diligence, Morality, Discernment, and Trustworthiness," along with the ideals of "Embracing Diversity, Fostering Integrity, Leading Innovation, and Serving the Nation" together form the latest expression of the Zhejiang University spirit.
translation.reference: For Zhejiang University, the university motto of “seeking truth and making innovation”, the common values of “study diligently, cultivate morality, foster discernment, advocate honesty” and the principles of “harboring generosity like the ocean, seeking the truth while upholding morality, being brave enough to keep exploring, and building our country” constitute the newest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.

translation.zh: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
translation.en: The university insists on the correct direction of running an university, continuously accumulates the altitude of culture and the important support by condensing the power of spirit; it has profound connotations and far-reaching significance.
translation.source: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
translation.medium: This is an important guarantee for the school to adhere to the correct direction of running the school, continuously accumulate cultural height, and gather spiritual strength, which is rich in connotation and profound in meaning.
translation.reference: The university insists on the correct direction of running an university, continuously accumulates the altitude of culture and the important support by condensing the power of spirit; it has profound connotations and far-reaching significance.

translation.zh: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
translation.en: In which, “harboring generosity like the ocean” emphasizes the spirit of inclusiveness, reflecting the mindset of “inviting all talents”, which is manifested as absorbing the premium concepts of university operation and talent training of world famous universities; “seeking the truth while upholding morality” lays emphasis on the spirit of the pursuit for truth and kindheartedness, meaning that universities shall accept the cultivation of virtue and the tempering of personality while pursuing for truth; “being brave enough to keep exploring” reflects the spirit of reform and innovation, including innovation in knowledge and science and technology, as well as reform, development and innovation; “building our country”stresses the spirit of patriotism and dedication, meaning that universities shall always share the glory and disgrace with the destiny of the country.
translation.source: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
translation.medium: Among them, "Embracing Rivers and Seas" emphasizes the spirit of openness and inclusiveness, reflecting the breadth of embracing talents from all over the world and is manifested in the adoption of high-quality educational concepts from world-renowned universities; "Cultivating True Virtue" emphasizes the spirit of seeking truth and utmost goodness, referring to the university's pursuit of truth while also fostering virtue and honing character; "Pioneering and Enlightening" reflects the spirit of reform and innovation, which includes the pursuit of new knowledge, scientific research, and innovations, as well as reflecting reform and development, and the transformation of the old for the new; "Building Our Nation" emphasizes the spirit of patriotic dedication, stating that universities should always share the honor and disgrace with the nation's fate.
translation.reference: In which, “harboring generosity like the ocean” emphasizes the spirit of inclusiveness, reflecting the mindset of “inviting all talents”, which is manifested as absorbing the premium concepts of university operation and talent training of world famous universities; “seeking the truth while upholding morality” lays emphasis on the spirit of the pursuit for truth and kindheartedness, meaning that universities shall accept the cultivation of virtue and the tempering of personality while pursuing for truth; “being brave enough to keep exploring” reflects the spirit of reform and innovation, including innovation in knowledge and science and technology, as well as reform, development and innovation; “building our country”stresses the spirit of patriotism and dedication, meaning that universities shall always share the glory and disgrace with the destiny of the country.

translation.zh: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
translation.en: These spiritual ethos and the pursuit of values are the soul of Zhejiang University in its 120 years of university running.
translation.source: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
translation.medium: This series of spiritual philosophies and value pursuits is precisely the soul of Zhejiang University's 120 years of education.
translation.reference: These spiritual ethos and the pursuit of values are the soul of Zhejiang University in its 120 years of university running.

translation.zh: “聪者听于无声，明者见于未形 ” 。
translation.en: “Wise people can hear when there is only silence and see before things are formed.”
translation.source: “聪者听于无声，明者见于未形 ” 。
translation.medium: "The wise hear things in silence, the enlightened perceive things before they take shape."
translation.reference: “Wise people can hear when there is only silence and see before things are formed.”

translation.zh: 中国高校当进一步立足中国特色社会主义事业全局，深刻把握高等教育事业所处的时代方位和肩负的历史使命，加快建设成为世界一流大学。
translation.en: Universities and colleges in China shall further master the direction of the times and the historical mission of higher education based on the overall situation of the socialism with Chinese characteristics, and accelerate the construction of top universities in the world.
translation.source: 中国高校当进一步立足中国特色社会主义事业全局，深刻把握高等教育事业所处的时代方位和肩负的历史使命，加快建设成为世界一流大学。
translation.medium: Chinese universities should further anchor themselves in the overall cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics, profoundly understand the epochal position and historical mission of higher education, and accelerate their development into world-class universities.
translation.reference: Universities and colleges in China shall further master the direction of the times and the historical mission of higher education based on the overall situation of the socialism with Chinese characteristics, and accelerate the construction of top universities in the world.

translation.zh: 同时，坚守人文关怀和独立自由，让大学精神与时代精神、民族精神互相激荡，从而为实现国家富强和民族振兴，实现人类的共同理想提供不竭的动力。
translation.en: At the same time, hold fast to humanistic care, independence and freedom, to make university spirit, spirit of the times and national spirit promote each other, so as to provide infinite power for realizing state prosperity, national rejuvenation and the common ideal of all human beings.
translation.source: 同时，坚守人文关怀和独立自由，让大学精神与时代精神、民族精神互相激荡，从而为实现国家富强和民族振兴，实现人类的共同理想提供不竭的动力。
translation.medium: At the same time, by adhering to humanistic care and independence and freedom, we allow the spirit of the university to interact with the spirit of the times and the national spirit, thereby providing an inexhaustible impetus for the realization of national prosperity and national rejuvenation, and for achieving the common ideals of mankind.
translation.reference: At the same time, hold fast to humanistic care, independence and freedom, to make university spirit, spirit of the times and national spirit promote each other, so as to provide infinite power for realizing state prosperity, national rejuvenation and the common ideal of all human beings.

translation.reference: I ordered a set meal and two of the delivered items were wrong.

translation.zh: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网
translation.en: President of Iran: an agreement may be reached after talks on Iran nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran are lifted - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网
translation.medium: Iran President: If sanctions on Iran are lifted, there is hope for an agreement in the nuclear talks - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: President of Iran: an agreement may be reached after talks on Iran nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran are lifted - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社德黑兰12月11日电（记者高文成 王守宝）伊朗总统莱希11日在伊朗首都德黑兰说，如果美国解除对伊制裁，伊朗核问题全面协议谈判就可以达成“良好协议 ” 。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Teheran on December 11 (Journalists: Gao Wencheng and Wang Shoubao): Lahey, president of Iran, said in Teheran, the capital of Iran, on December 11 that a “satisfactory agreement” might be reached after the comprehensive talks about Iran’s nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran were lifted by the US.
translation.source: 新华社德黑兰12月11日电（记者高文成 王守宝）伊朗总统莱希11日在伊朗首都德黑兰说，如果美国解除对伊制裁，伊朗核问题全面协议谈判就可以达成“良好协议 ” 。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Tehran, December 11th (reporters Gao Wencheng, Wang Shoubao) — Iranian President Raisi said in Tehran, the capital of Iran, on the 11th that a "good agreement" could be reached in the negotiations on the comprehensive agreement on the Iranian nuclear issue if the United States lifted sanctions against Iran.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Teheran on December 11 (Journalists: Gao Wencheng and Wang Shoubao): Lahey, president of Iran, said in Teheran, the capital of Iran, on December 11 that a “satisfactory agreement” might be reached after the comprehensive talks about Iran’s nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran were lifted by the US.

translation.zh: 据伊朗总统网站发布的消息，莱希当天在与伊朗驻周边国家使节开会时说，通过向伊核协议其他相关方提交提案，伊朗已经证明了自己的谈判诚意。
translation.en: According to information published by the website of the president of Iran, Lahey said in a meeting with envoys of Iran in surrounding countries that Iran had proved its sincerity in the talks by submitting proposals to other related parties of the agreement of Iran nuclear issue.
translation.source: 据伊朗总统网站发布的消息，莱希当天在与伊朗驻周边国家使节开会时说，通过向伊核协议其他相关方提交提案，伊朗已经证明了自己的谈判诚意。
translation.medium: According to the information released on the Iranian President's website, Raisi stated during the meeting with the Iranian envoys to the neighboring countries that Iran has demonstrated its sincerity in negotiations by submitting proposals to the other relevant parties of the Iran nuclear deal.
translation.reference: According to information published by the website of the president of Iran, Lahey said in a meeting with envoys of Iran in surrounding countries that Iran had proved its sincerity in the talks by submitting proposals to other related parties of the agreement of Iran nuclear issue.

translation.zh: 如果美方下定决心 ， “ 达成协议的道路就将畅通 ” 。
translation.en: If the US is determined, “it will be easy to reach the agreement”.
translation.source: 如果美方下定决心 ， “ 达成协议的道路就将畅通 ” 。
translation.medium: If the U.S. side is determined, "the path to reaching an agreement will be open."
translation.reference: If the US is determined, “it will be easy to reach the agreement”.

translation.zh: 伊核协议相关方今年4月开始在奥地利首都维也纳举行会谈，讨论美伊两国恢复履约问题。
translation.en: Related parties of the Iran nuclear agreement started hosting talks in Vienna, the capital of Austria, since this April, to discuss the problem of restoring honoring the agreement by the US and Iran.
translation.source: 伊核协议相关方今年4月开始在奥地利首都维也纳举行会谈，讨论美伊两国恢复履约问题。
translation.medium: The parties involved in the Iran nuclear deal began talks in Vienna, the capital of Austria, this April to discuss the issue of the United States and Iran returning to compliance with the agreement.
translation.reference: Related parties of the Iran nuclear agreement started hosting talks in Vienna, the capital of Austria, since this April, to discuss the problem of restoring honoring the agreement by the US and Iran.

translation.zh: 新一轮会谈11月29日在维也纳开始举行，12月3日暂时休会，9日继续举行。
translation.en: A new round of talks started in Vienna on November 29, which was adjourned on December 3, and will resume on December 9.
translation.source: 新一轮会谈11月29日在维也纳开始举行，12月3日暂时休会，9日继续举行。
translation.medium: The new round of talks began in Vienna on November 29, paused temporarily on December 3, and continued on the 9th.
translation.reference: A new round of talks started in Vienna on November 29, which was adjourned on December 3, and will resume on December 9.

translation.reference: Please contact the delivery person.

translation.zh: 习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信-新华网
translation.en: Xi Jinping sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum - Xinhua News
translation.source: 习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信-新华网
translation.medium: Xi Jinping Sends Congratulatory Letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum - Xinhua News Agency
translation.reference: Xi Jinping sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum - Xinhua News

translation.zh: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
translation.en: Xinhua News Beijing December 11th, on December 11th, Chinese president, Xi Jinping, sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum.
translation.source: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 11 - On December 11, President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum.
translation.reference: Xinhua News Beijing December 11th, on December 11th, Chinese president, Xi Jinping, sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum.

translation.zh: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
translation.en: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing major changes rarely seen in a century; global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period; the latest round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial reform have exerted a profound impact on the global economic structure.
translation.source: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
translation.medium: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing a great change that has not been seen in a century, global technological innovation has entered a period of intense activity, and the new round of technological revolution and industrial transformation has had a profound impact on the global economic structure.
translation.reference: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing major changes rarely seen in a century; global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period; the latest round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial reform have exerted a profound impact on the global economic structure.

translation.zh: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
translation.en: The Greater Bay Area of Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau should center on the strategic positioning of building an international scientific and technological innovation center, strive to build a highland of global scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.
translation.source: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
translation.medium: The Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area should focus on the strategic positioning of building an international science and technology innovation center, strive to build a global high ground for science and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.
translation.reference: The Greater Bay Area of Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau should center on the strategic positioning of building an international scientific and technological innovation center, strive to build a highland of global scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.

translation.zh: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
translation.en: China is willing to work with scientists, international scientific and technological organizations around the globe to carry out close international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the cracking of common scientific technologies, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, jointly promote the development of science on a global scale and better benefit mankind.
translation.source: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
translation.medium: China is willing to work with scientists from all countries and international scientific and technological organizations to enhance international exchange and cooperation in science and technology, strengthen research on major scientific issues, promote the resolution of common scientific and technological challenges, deepen collaboration on key scientific projects, and jointly advance the development of global scientific endeavors for the greater benefit of humanity.
translation.reference: China is willing to work with scientists, international scientific and technological organizations around the globe to carry out close international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the cracking of common scientific technologies, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, jointly promote the development of science on a global scale and better benefit mankind.

translation.zh: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
translation.en: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum hosted by Guangdong Province People’s Government opened that day in Guangzhou, Guangdong with theme “discover the future, share science”。
translation.source: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
translation.medium: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum opened today in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, with the theme "Exploring the Future, Sharing Science," hosted by the People's Government of Guangdong Province.
translation.reference: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum hosted by Guangdong Province People’s Government opened that day in Guangzhou, Guangdong with theme “discover the future, share science”。

translation.zh: 对的，订单是接受状态
translation.en: Yes, the order status is accepted.
translation.source: 对的，订单是接受状态
translation.medium: Yes, the order is in accepted status.
translation.reference: Yes, the order status is accepted.

translation.zh: 但餐厅打电话说由于骑手不运送骨头，所以餐厅需要将肉和骨头切开，骨头弃掉
translation.en: But the restaurant called saying the delivery person did not deliver bones, and so the restaurant needed to separate the bones and meat and discard the bones.
translation.source: 但餐厅打电话说由于骑手不运送骨头，所以餐厅需要将肉和骨头切开，骨头弃掉
translation.medium: The restaurant called and said that since the delivery person won't transport bones, the restaurant needs to cut the meat from the bone and discard the bone.
translation.reference: But the restaurant called saying the delivery person did not deliver bones, and so the restaurant needed to separate the bones and meat and discard the bones.

translation.zh: 是否明白我的问题
translation.en: Do you understand my question?
translation.source: 是否明白我的问题
translation.medium: Do you understand my question?
translation.reference: Do you understand my question?

translation.zh: 不是订单延迟
translation.en: It’s not that the order was delayed.
translation.source: 不是订单延迟
translation.medium: It's not an order delay.
translation.reference: It’s not that the order was delayed.

translation.zh: 或者你可以直接打电话给我
translation.en: Or you can just call me.
translation.source: 或者你可以直接打电话给我
translation.medium: Or you can call me directly.
translation.reference: Or you can just call me.

translation.zh: 是否在跟进？
translation.en: Are you following up on it?
translation.source: 是否在跟进？
translation.medium: Are you following up?
translation.reference: Are you following up on it?

translation.zh: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
translation.en: University students in Guangxi can suspend schooling to start their own business for as long as 5 years - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
translation.medium: Guangxi university students' entrepreneurship leave can last up to 5 years - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: University students in Guangxi can suspend schooling to start their own business for as long as 5 years - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, universities and colleges in Guangxi will implement flexible education system and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education.
translation.source: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Nanning, May 19 (Special Correspondent Zhang Ying) - Reporters recently learned from the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Education Department that, in the future, universities in Guangxi will implement a flexible educational system and relax the limit on the number of years that college students can take a leave of absence. The duration for current students to suspend their studies for entrepreneurship can be extended by 2 to 5 years beyond their original educational system, and the time taken off for business creation can be considered as practical education time.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, universities and colleges in Guangxi will implement flexible education system and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education.

translation.zh: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
translation.en: In order to promote the capabilities of entrepreneurship and innovation of university students, Departments of Education and Human Resource and Social Security of Guangxi worked together to establish the an entrepreneurship platform, set up more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, entrepreneurship parks for university students and business incubation bases, which provide external support for the entrepreneurship of university students.
translation.source: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
translation.medium: To foster the enhancement of entrepreneurship and innovation abilities among university students, departments such as education and human resources in Guangxi have collaborated to build entrepreneurial platforms, establishing more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, university student entrepreneurship parks, and entrepreneurship incubation bases, to provide external support for college students' entrepreneurial efforts.
translation.reference: In order to promote the capabilities of entrepreneurship and innovation of university students, Departments of Education and Human Resource and Social Security of Guangxi worked together to establish the an entrepreneurship platform, set up more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, entrepreneurship parks for university students and business incubation bases, which provide external support for the entrepreneurship of university students.

translation.zh: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
translation.en: According to related regulations, up until 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice base of undergraduate universities shall be at least 3,000 square meters and that of vocational schools shall be at least 2,000 square meters.
translation.source: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
translation.medium: According to the requirements, by 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice bases in universities should reach over 3,000 square meters for undergraduate institutions and over 2,000 square meters for higher vocational colleges.
translation.reference: According to related regulations, up until 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice base of undergraduate universities shall be at least 3,000 square meters and that of vocational schools shall be at least 2,000 square meters.

translation.zh: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
translation.en: Governments encourage universities to set up credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, to give priority in the transfer of major of students with outstanding performance in innovation and entrepreneurship.
translation.source: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
translation.medium: The government encourages universities to establish innovation and entrepreneurship credits, and gives priority support to students who excel in innovation and entrepreneurship practice to change their majors.
translation.reference: Governments encourage universities to set up credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, to give priority in the transfer of major of students with outstanding performance in innovation and entrepreneurship.

translation.zh: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
translation.en: Teachers in universities and colleges are required to take a temporary post in enterprises of related industries to train for at least two months every two years, so as to improve the awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education of the teachers.
translation.source: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
translation.medium: University teachers are required to take at least two months of temporary positions in industry enterprises every two years, in order to enhance their awareness and ability in innovation and entrepreneurship education.
translation.reference: Teachers in universities and colleges are required to take a temporary post in enterprises of related industries to train for at least two months every two years, so as to improve the awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education of the teachers.

translation.zh: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
translation.en: It is required by the Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region that universities and colleges shall thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for university students, and strive to make each student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in university.
translation.source: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
translation.medium: The Department of Education of the Autonomous Region requires universities in Guangxi to thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for college students, striving to ensure that every college student participates in an innovation and entrepreneurship training program during their time in school.
translation.reference: It is required by the Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region that universities and colleges shall thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for university students, and strive to make each student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in university.

translation.zh: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
translation.en: Universities and colleges shall actively organize students to participate in various types and levels of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.
translation.source: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
translation.medium: Universities should actively organize students to participate in innovative and entrepreneurial competitions of all levels and provide financial support.
translation.reference: Universities and colleges shall actively organize students to participate in various types and levels of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.

translation.zh: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
translation.en: NEWS GOV-MO: University of Macau awarded the degree of honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished people
translation.source: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
translation.medium: University of Macau Awards Honorary Doctorate to Seven Distinguished Individuals
translation.reference: NEWS GOV-MO: University of Macau awarded the degree of honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished people

translation.zh: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
translation.en: The “2021 Award-Giving Ceremony for Honorary Degree and Advanced Degree” was held in University of Macau today (the 11th day of this month) to award the degree of honorary doctorate of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Shuji Nakamura, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan and Jiang Zhaohui to commend their outstanding achievements and their major contributions to social and educational development.
translation.source: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
translation.medium: University of Macau today (11th) held the "2021 Honorary and Higher Degree Conferment Ceremony", awarding honorary doctorate degrees to Zengyi Liu, Kaixian Chen, Shuji Nakamura, Lanjuan Li, Xiaoliang Li, Lulan Zhu, and Zhaohui Jiang in recognition of their outstanding achievements and significant contributions to the development of society and education.
translation.reference: The “2021 Award-Giving Ceremony for Honorary Degree and Advanced Degree” was held in University of Macau today (the 11th day of this month) to award the degree of honorary doctorate of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Shuji Nakamura, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan and Jiang Zhaohui to commend their outstanding achievements and their major contributions to social and educational development.

translation.zh: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
translation.en: At the award-giving ceremony, Ouyang Yu, the chief executive, the representative of the university superintendent of University of Macau and the director of the Social and Cultural Department, awarded the degree of honorary doctorate accompanied by Lin Jincheng, chairman of the university board, and Song Yonghua, president of University of Macau.
translation.source: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
translation.medium: At the award ceremony, the Chief Executive and the Chancellor of the University of Macau, represented by the Secretary for Social Affairs and Culture, Ao Ieong U, conferred the honorary doctorate degree accompanied by the Chairman of the University Council of the University of Macau, Lam Kam Seng, and the President of the University of Macau, Song Yonghua.
translation.reference: At the award-giving ceremony, Ouyang Yu, the chief executive, the representative of the university superintendent of University of Macau and the director of the Social and Cultural Department, awarded the degree of honorary doctorate accompanied by Lin Jincheng, chairman of the university board, and Song Yonghua, president of University of Macau.

translation.zh: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
translation.en: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Education; Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Shuji Nakamura was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Business Administration; Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science.
translation.source: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
translation.medium: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded an honorary Doctor of Education degree, Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, Professor Nakamura Shuji was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded an honorary Doctor of Business Administration degree, Professor Zhu Lian was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree.
translation.reference: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Education; Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Shuji Nakamura was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Business Administration; Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science.

translation.zh: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
translation.en: In his speech, Ouyang Yu enthusiastically congratulated and expressed great respect to the seven distinguished people awarded with the honorary doctorate, who made outstanding achievements in different fields and excellent contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world; at the same time, Ouyang Yu expressed the most sincere wishes to the graduates and their parents, and showed sincere respect to the teachers who cherish their posts, stay devoted to their career, and have exquisite academic skills.
translation.source: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
translation.medium: During his address, Ouyang Yu began by extending warm congratulations and the highest respects to the seven distinguished individuals who were awarded honorary doctorate degrees for their extraordinary achievements in various fields, having made outstanding contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world. Additionally, Ouyang Yu expressed the sincerest blessings to the graduates and their parents, and also conveyed heartfelt respect to the dedicated and academically accomplished team of university faculty and staff.
translation.reference: In his speech, Ouyang Yu enthusiastically congratulated and expressed great respect to the seven distinguished people awarded with the honorary doctorate, who made outstanding achievements in different fields and excellent contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world; at the same time, Ouyang Yu expressed the most sincere wishes to the graduates and their parents, and showed sincere respect to the teachers who cherish their posts, stay devoted to their career, and have exquisite academic skills.

translation.zh: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Liu Zunyi, Sun Yifeng, a chair professor of the Faculty of Humanities of University of Macau, praised Professor Liu Zunyi as an economist famous across the world, who is famous for his excellent academic achievements and prospective educational ideas.
translation.source: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
translation.medium: During the lecture at the Faculty of Arts of Macao University, Professor Sun Yifeng, when reading the commendation for Professor Liu Zunyi, stated that Professor Liu Zunyi is a world-renowned economist, famous for his outstanding academic achievements and visionary educational philosophy.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Liu Zunyi, Sun Yifeng, a chair professor of the Faculty of Humanities of University of Macau, praised Professor Liu Zunyi as an economist famous across the world, who is famous for his excellent academic achievements and prospective educational ideas.

translation.zh: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
translation.en: Apart from achievements made in economic development and growth as well as in the economic industry in East Asia, he is also a visionary educational leader.
translation.source: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
translation.medium: In addition to his achievements in economic development, economic growth, and East Asian economy, he is also a visionary leader in education.
translation.reference: Apart from achievements made in economic development and growth as well as in the economic industry in East Asia, he is also a visionary educational leader.

translation.zh: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
translation.en: In short, he has made achievements in many fields.
translation.source: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
translation.medium: In short, he has made outstanding contributions in many fields.
translation.reference: In short, he has made achievements in many fields.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
translation.en: Sun Yifeng said while reading praises to Shuji Nakamura that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
translation.medium: When Sun Yifeng was reading the eulogy for Shuji Nakamura, he stated that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.
translation.reference: Sun Yifeng said while reading praises to Shuji Nakamura that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.

translation.zh: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
translation.en: He became one of the three prize winners of 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics with his invention of blue LED.
translation.source: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
translation.medium: He became one of the three laureates of the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics for inventing the blue light-emitting diode (LED).
translation.reference: He became one of the three prize winners of 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics with his invention of blue LED.

translation.zh: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
translation.en: The invention of Professor Shuji Nakamura has utterly changed the lighting industry and led to the creation of the white LED, which is widely applied in daily life and industrial production today, making great contributions to welfare of human beings.
translation.source: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
translation.medium: Professor Nakamura's invention not only completely transformed the lighting industry, but also led to the development of white light-emitting diodes, which are now widely used in daily life and industrial production, making a significant contribution to human welfare.
translation.reference: The invention of Professor Shuji Nakamura has utterly changed the lighting industry and led to the creation of the white LED, which is widely applied in daily life and industrial production today, making great contributions to welfare of human beings.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Li Lanjuan, Sun Yifeng praised her as the pioneer of the artificial liver industry in China, who has created the unique and effective Li’s artificial liver system, made great breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and hepatic failure, and significantly reduced the fatality rate of hepatic failure.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
translation.medium: When Sun Yifeng read the commendation for Li Lanjuan, it was noted that Professor Li Lanjuan, as the pioneer of China's artificial liver project, established the unique and effective Li’s Artificial Liver System, achieving a significant breakthrough in the treatment of severe hepatitis and liver failure, and substantially reducing the mortality rate of liver failure.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Li Lanjuan, Sun Yifeng praised her as the pioneer of the artificial liver industry in China, who has created the unique and effective Li’s artificial liver system, made great breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and hepatic failure, and significantly reduced the fatality rate of hepatic failure.

translation.zh: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
translation.en: In the fight against the COVID-19, the “four-against and two-balance” scheme proposed by her and her team and the three technologies including artificial liver, micro-ecology and stem cells have significantly improved the treatment and cure rate of severe cases.
translation.source: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
translation.medium: During the battle against the COVID-19 pneumonia, the "four resistances and two balances" approach proposed by her and her team, along with the three major technologies brought about, artificial liver, microbiota, and stem cells, significantly improved the treatment success rate for severe cases.
translation.reference: In the fight against the COVID-19, the “four-against and two-balance” scheme proposed by her and her team and the three technologies including artificial liver, micro-ecology and stem cells have significantly improved the treatment and cure rate of severe cases.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Li Xiaoliang, Sun Yifeng said that he laid a foundation for creative research on operation management, shaped the way of thinking for the theory and practice of supply chain and thoroughly changed the commercial mode all over the world.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
translation.medium: When Sun Yifeng recited the accolades of Li Xiaoliang, he indicated that Professor Li Xiaoliang laid the foundation for innovative research in operations management, shaped the mindset for supply chain theory and practice, and completely transformed business models around the world.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Li Xiaoliang, Sun Yifeng said that he laid a foundation for creative research on operation management, shaped the way of thinking for the theory and practice of supply chain and thoroughly changed the commercial mode all over the world.

translation.zh: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
translation.en: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in operation management, and he has explored the measures to cope with this phenomenon.
translation.source: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
translation.medium: Lee Xiao Liang is known for popularizing the concept of the bullwhip effect in operations management and has explored measures to address this phenomenon.
translation.reference: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in operation management, and he has explored the measures to cope with this phenomenon.

translation.zh: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
translation.en: Now, all countries are facing the epidemic and the intense situations in economics, and the bullwhip effect has been increasingly prominent, leading to serious destruction in the supply chain.
translation.source: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
translation.medium: Today, under the pandemic and tense economic conditions, the bullwhip effect has become increasingly prominent, leading to severe disruption of supply chains.
translation.reference: Now, all countries are facing the epidemic and the intense situations in economics, and the bullwhip effect has been increasingly prominent, leading to serious destruction in the supply chain.

translation.zh: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
translation.en: The prospective research conducted by Li Xiaoliang is like offering fuel in snowy weather, helping the industries to cope with the difficulties and bringing about huge social values.
translation.source: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
translation.medium: Li Xiaoliang's visionary research is like timely help in a snowstorm, aiding the industry to face challenges and thus yielding immense social value.
translation.reference: The prospective research conducted by Li Xiaoliang is like offering fuel in snowy weather, helping the industries to cope with the difficulties and bringing about huge social values.

translation.zh: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Li Zhu Lilan, Sun Yifeng said that Zhu Lilan found a groundbreaking and creative staining technique during scientific research and applied it in preparing samples, and she enjoyed great reputation among counterparts in science and technology at home and abroad.
translation.source: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
translation.medium: When Sun Yifeng read the commendation for Zhu Lian, she stated that in her scientific research work, she discovered a breakthrough and innovative staining technique for sample preparation that enjoys a high reputation among domestic and international scientific and technological peers.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Li Zhu Lilan, Sun Yifeng said that Zhu Lilan found a groundbreaking and creative staining technique during scientific research and applied it in preparing samples, and she enjoyed great reputation among counterparts in science and technology at home and abroad.

translation.zh: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
translation.en: She was awarded with honorary titles such as an academician of International Eurasian Academy of Sciences with her outstanding scientific achievements, and won the lofty position in the temple of science and technology of the world with her splendid achievements.
translation.source: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
translation.medium: She was honored with prestigious titles such as being an academician of the International Eurasian Academy of Sciences for her extraordinary technological achievements, and her splendid accomplishments have earned her a rightful exalted status in the world's pantheon of science and technology.
translation.reference: She was awarded with honorary titles such as an academician of International Eurasian Academy of Sciences with her outstanding scientific achievements, and won the lofty position in the temple of science and technology of the world with her splendid achievements.

translation.zh: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences of University of Macau, said that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in research and development of medicine for more than 40 years, and has won lofty international status and reputation due to his excellent scientific achievements as well as his great contributions the country, Macau, University of Macau and national key laboratories.
translation.source: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
translation.medium: During the reading of the tribute to Professor Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of the Australia-China Institute for Chinese Medicine Research, stated that having been engaged in drug research and development for over 40 years, Professor Chen Kaixian's outstanding scientific achievements and significant contributions to the nation, Macao, the University of Macau, and the national key laboratories have earned him a lofty international status and reputation.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences of University of Macau, said that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in research and development of medicine for more than 40 years, and has won lofty international status and reputation due to his excellent scientific achievements as well as his great contributions the country, Macau, University of Macau and national key laboratories.

translation.zh: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
translation.en: His active promotion of the development of Traditional Chinese Medicine to Macau and the Greater Bay Area has sufficiently reflected his sense of mission in his contribution to medical development strategy in our country.
translation.source: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
translation.medium: His active role in promoting the development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Macao and the Greater Bay Area fully reflects his sense of mission to contribute to the national medical and pharmaceutical development strategy.
translation.reference: His active promotion of the development of Traditional Chinese Medicine to Macau and the Greater Bay Area has sufficiently reflected his sense of mission in his contribution to medical development strategy in our country.

translation.zh: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
translation.en: When reading the praises to Jiang Zhaohui, Xu Chengzhong, dean of the Institute of Technology of University of Macau, said that 15 significant inventions and patients developed with the participation of Ms. Jiang Zhaohui are related to storage virtualization, navigation, document system and power management, which are all highly practical, widely applied and improved the convenience of life.
translation.source: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
translation.medium: During the reading of the commendation for Ms. Jiang Zhaohui, the Dean of the Australia Institute of Science and Technology, Xu Chengzhong, stated that the significant inventions and patents Ms. Jiang Zhaohui has participated in developing to date number over 15. These relate to storage virtualization, navigation, file systems, and power management. All of them are highly practical, widely used, and enhance the convenience of human life.
translation.reference: When reading the praises to Jiang Zhaohui, Xu Chengzhong, dean of the Institute of Technology of University of Macau, said that 15 significant inventions and patients developed with the participation of Ms. Jiang Zhaohui are related to storage virtualization, navigation, document system and power management, which are all highly practical, widely applied and improved the convenience of life.

translation.zh: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
translation.en: As an inventor with outstanding achievements, Ms. Jiang can turn sophisticated technology and theories into simple concepts and popularize them to the public.
translation.source: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
translation.medium: As an accomplished inventor, Ms. Jiang often manages to simplify complex technology and theories, making them accessible to the general public.
translation.reference: As an inventor with outstanding achievements, Ms. Jiang can turn sophisticated technology and theories into simple concepts and popularize them to the public.

translation.zh: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
translation.en: At last, Chen Kaixian delivered the thank-you speech as the representative of honorary doctorates.
translation.source: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
translation.medium: Finally, Chen Kaixian, as the representative of the honorary doctorates, delivered a vote of thanks.
translation.reference: At last, Chen Kaixian delivered the thank-you speech as the representative of honorary doctorates.

translation.zh: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
translation.en: He was happy to see that the industry of medicine in Macau and Greater Bay Area has set a good example: from the University of Macau establishing the first National Key Laboratory of Traditional Chinese Medicine Quality Research to the prosperous development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a major role in integrating outstanding talents of traditional Chinese medicine.
translation.source: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
translation.medium: He is pleased to see that Macau and the Greater Bay Area have established a commendable example in the pharmaceutical industry: from the first national key laboratory for Chinese medicine quality research established by the University of Macau to the flourishing development of traditional Chinese medicine in the Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a significant role in integrating outstanding talents in the field of traditional Chinese medicine in the region.
translation.reference: He was happy to see that the industry of medicine in Macau and Greater Bay Area has set a good example: from the University of Macau establishing the first National Key Laboratory of Traditional Chinese Medicine Quality Research to the prosperous development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a major role in integrating outstanding talents of traditional Chinese medicine.

translation.zh: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
