translation.en: In addition, he thinks the management team of the University of Macau is far-sighted, who not only provide students with abundant resources of research, but also send a lot of responsible talents to society.
translation.source: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
translation.medium: In addition, he believes that the management team of the University of Macau has far-sightedness and vision, not only providing students with fertile ground for scientific research academically, but also delivering many responsible talents to society.
translation.reference: In addition, he thinks the management team of the University of Macau is far-sighted, who not only provide students with abundant resources of research, but also send a lot of responsible talents to society.

translation.zh: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
translation.en: He was honored to carry out exchanges and communication with University of Macau and congratulated University of Macau on the achievements it achieved in recent years.
translation.source: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
translation.medium: He feels honored to engage in exchanges and cooperation with the University of Macau, and expresses his sincere congratulations on the achievements the university has made in recent years.
translation.reference: He was honored to carry out exchanges and communication with University of Macau and congratulated University of Macau on the achievements it achieved in recent years.

translation.zh: 他有没有正确的地址？
translation.en: Does he have the correct address?
translation.source: 他有没有正确的地址？
translation.medium: Does he have the correct address?
translation.reference: Does he have the correct address?

translation.zh: 还没看到
translation.en: It was not seen yet.
translation.source: 还没看到
translation.medium: I haven't seen it yet.
translation.reference: It was not seen yet.

translation.zh: 那个骑手刚才去错了地方，所以我没有收到
translation.en: That delivery person went to the wrong place, so I didn’t receive it.
translation.source: 那个骑手刚才去错了地方，所以我没有收到
translation.medium: The rider went to the wrong place just now, so I didn't receive it.
translation.reference: That delivery person went to the wrong place, so I didn’t receive it.

translation.zh: 不过我#PRS_ORG#收到了
translation.en: But I #PRS_ORG# received it.
translation.source: 不过我#PRS_ORG#收到了
translation.medium: However, I received from #PRS_ORG#
translation.reference: But I #PRS_ORG# received it.

translation.zh: App 暂时未能联系到骑手
translation.en: App is not able to contact the delivery person for the time being.
translation.source: App 暂时未能联系到骑手
translation.medium: The app is temporarily unable to contact the rider.
translation.reference: App is not able to contact the delivery person for the time being.

translation.zh: 我家人以为没有
translation.en: My family thought there was none.
translation.source: 我家人以为没有
translation.medium: My family thought there was none
translation.reference: My family thought there was none.

translation.zh: 但是，已经过了 1 小时了
translation.en: But it has already been 1 hour.
translation.source: 但是，已经过了 1 小时了
translation.medium: However, an hour has already passed.
translation.reference: But it has already been 1 hour.

translation.zh: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
translation.en: As NFT went viral beyond its own circle, a new concept emerged in the encrypted community.
translation.source: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
translation.medium: During the rapid popularization of NFTs, the crypto community has come up with a new concept.
translation.reference: As NFT went viral beyond its own circle, a new concept emerged in the encrypted community.

translation.zh: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
translation.en: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.
translation.source: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
translation.medium: In 2021, a blockchain game called "Axie Infinity" had a huge impact in the Southeast Asia region, where some residents who lost their job opportunities due to the pandemic began to earn a steady income by playing this game.
translation.reference: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.

translation.zh: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
translation.en: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.
translation.source: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
translation.medium: Axie Infinity is a blockchain-based pet nurturing game that incorporates various gameplay elements including NFTs. It is currently the highest-grossing NFT project, with transactions exceeding 3 billion US dollars to date.
translation.reference: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.

translation.zh: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
translation.en: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.
translation.source: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
translation.medium: TokenTerminal data shows that Axie Infinity's daily revenue exceeds $8.2 million, closely competing with "Honor of Kings."
translation.reference: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.

translation.zh: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
translation.en: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.
translation.source: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
translation.medium: On August 6 this year, the official Axie Infinity announced that its daily active users had exceeded 1 million.
translation.reference: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.

translation.zh: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
translation.en: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.
translation.source: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
translation.medium: The popularity of "Axie Infinity" has introduced a new "play-to-earn" model to more people. With the help of blockchain and smart contracts, players are no longer just passive participants; they not only derive enjoyment and economic benefits from the game but can also take part in governing the game's ecosystem.
translation.reference: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.

translation.zh: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
translation.en: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.
translation.source: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
translation.medium: This kind of agency is not granted by the game producers, but rather, it is guaranteed by blockchain technology.
translation.reference: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.

translation.zh: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
translation.en: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.
translation.source: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
translation.medium: Upon seeing a piece of news about the stock price of a friend's company, my biggest takeaway is the selection of the "track" for enterprises, that is, the choice of the industry for investment targets. First and foremost, choose industries with a large growth potential, at least with a market size of over 100 billion. Next, select industries that are expected to have good growth in the future, considering those that will reach their optimal state of industry growth in the next 3-5 years. Lastly, opt for industries with policy support.
translation.reference: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.

translation.zh: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
translation.en: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.
translation.source: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
translation.medium: The width of the track refers to the market size, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is flat or rugged refers to the competitive landscape of the industry.
translation.reference: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.

translation.zh: 为对的赛道加油！
translation.en: Cheer for the right track!
translation.source: 为对的赛道加油！
translation.medium: Cheer for the right track!
translation.reference: Cheer for the right track!

translation.zh: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
translation.en: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.
translation.source: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
translation.medium: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the strategic layout for 2022.
translation.reference: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.

translation.zh: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
translation.en: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.
translation.source: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
translation.medium: Strategy is about "doing the right things," while tactics are about "doing things right."
translation.reference: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.

translation.zh: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
translation.en: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.
translation.source: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
translation.medium: And strategy is about "doing the right thing," which is to do the right thing.
translation.reference: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.

translation.zh: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
translation.en: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.
translation.source: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
translation.medium: Strategy is about finding direction, tactics are about implementation. Above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic contemplation.
translation.reference: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.

translation.zh: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
translation.en: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
translation.source: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
translation.medium: For instance, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), you can think about whether to continue deepening in the current field or to expand horizontally into other fields (strategic thinking); for example, beyond improving customer retention rates (tactical thinking), you can think about how to enhance the retention rates of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of increasing event participation (tactical thinking), you can consider how to set the correct event KPIs and achieve the right event goals, such as enhancing the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately acquiring new customers; when looking at increasing DAU (Daily Active Users) (tactical thinking), you can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
translation.reference: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.

translation.zh: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
translation.en: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.
translation.source: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
translation.medium: After 12 years of its creation, Bitcoin witnessed several milestone events in 2021.
translation.reference: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.

translation.zh: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
translation.en: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.
translation.source: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
translation.medium: On September 7, the small Central American nation of El Salvador made Bitcoin legal tender, marking the first time Bitcoin has been recognized as the official currency of a country or region.
translation.reference: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.

translation.zh: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
translation.en: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.
translation.source: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
translation.medium: October 12th, the US Securities and Exchange Commission approved for the first time in eight years the launch of a Bitcoin ETF by ProShares, which was listed on the New York Stock Exchange. This marks the arrival of the first compliant Bitcoin futures ETF on the US capital market, signifying a further expansion of exposure to cryptocurrency investments.
translation.reference: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.

translation.zh: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
translation.en: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.
translation.source: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
translation.medium: From the perspective of blockchain technology development, Bitcoin is not the lead actor.
translation.reference: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.

translation.zh: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
translation.en: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.
translation.source: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
translation.medium: On November 14, 2021, Bitcoin underwent a soft fork upgrade called "Taproot," which enhanced the anonymity of transactions on the Bitcoin network and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the structure of the data within the blocks themselves.
translation.reference: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.

translation.zh: 麦乐鸡，没有麦乐鸡酱
translation.en: McNuggets, without the McNuggets sauce.
translation.source: 麦乐鸡，没有麦乐鸡酱
translation.medium: McNuggets, no McNugget sauce
translation.reference: McNuggets, without the McNuggets sauce.

translation.zh: 那个麦乐鸡要是就干吃，会好难吃的
translation.en: The McNuggets would taste horrible without the sauce.
translation.source: 那个麦乐鸡要是就干吃，会好难吃的
translation.medium: If you just eat the Chicken McNuggets on their own, they’ll taste quite bad.
translation.reference: The McNuggets would taste horrible without the sauce.

translation.zh: 你的 $32 优惠代码是不是要买够多少钱才可以用
translation.en: Is your $32 discount code only applicable when your order reaches certain amount?
translation.source: 你的 $32 优惠代码是不是要买够多少钱才可以用
translation.medium: Your $32 discount code, does it require a minimum purchase amount in order to be used?
translation.reference: Is your $32 discount code only applicable when your order reaches certain amount?

translation.zh: 15 分钟不到的话是不是可以取消
translation.en: You can cancel it if it doesn’t arrive in 15 minutes.
translation.source: 15 分钟不到的话是不是可以取消
translation.medium: If it's less than 15 minutes, can it be canceled?
translation.reference: You can cancel it if it doesn’t arrive in 15 minutes.

translation.zh: 我正在输入 code，为什么变成确认订单
translation.en: I was entering the code, and why does it change to order confirmation?
translation.source: 我正在输入 code，为什么变成确认订单
translation.medium: I am entering code, why does it become confirm order
translation.reference: I was entering the code, and why does it change to order confirmation?

translation.zh: 好的
translation.en: OK.
translation.source: 好的
translation.medium: Okay
translation.reference: OK.

translation.zh: 那我没有了优惠？
translation.en: Then I won’t enjoy the discount?
translation.source: 那我没有了优惠？
translation.medium: So I don't get a discount anymore?
translation.reference: Then I won’t enjoy the discount?

translation.zh: 你好
translation.en: Hello,
translation.source: 你好
translation.medium: Hello
translation.reference: Hello,

translation.zh: 订的餐未送到
translation.en: the ordered food was not delivered.
translation.source: 订的餐未送到
translation.medium: The ordered meal has not been delivered.
translation.reference: the ordered food was not delivered.

translation.zh: 骑手已经送到
translation.en: the delivery person has made the delivery.
translation.source: 骑手已经送到
translation.medium: The rider has already delivered it.
translation.reference: the delivery person has made the delivery.

translation.zh: 我希望你们能准时，不是想要你们的优惠券！！
translation.en: I hope you can be on time, and it’s not that I want your coupons! !
translation.source: 我希望你们能准时，不是想要你们的优惠券！！
translation.medium: I hope you can be on time, I don't want your coupons!!
translation.reference: I hope you can be on time, and it’s not that I want your coupons! !

translation.zh: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
translation.en: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?
translation.source: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
translation.medium: Have you encountered any issues with the continuing education hours for the initial registration of a primary level cost engineer?
translation.reference: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?

translation.zh: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
translation.en: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.
translation.source: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
translation.medium: Individuals who have not provided proof of continuing education for late registration must provide proof of at least 30 hours of continuing education in the past year for late registration. Re-registration requires proof of at least 120 hours of continuing education over the past four years. For each full year, re-registration requires proof of at least 30 hours of continuing education.
translation.reference: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.

translation.zh: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
translation.en: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer
translation.source: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
translation.medium: Cost Engineer Continuing Education Fee Standards
translation.reference: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer

translation.zh: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
translation.en: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);
translation.source: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
translation.medium: Cost engineers participating in online continuing education must pay the learning fees to the respective management organizations at the time of registration, with the general standard being: the cost for 30 hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan per person-year (including unified continuing education materials).
translation.reference: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);

translation.zh: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
translation.en: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
translation.source: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
translation.medium: The tuition fee for a 30-hour elective course is 300 yuan per person per year.
translation.reference: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.

translation.zh: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
translation.en: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
translation.source: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
translation.medium: 30 credit hours of required courses and 30 credit hours of elective courses cost 600 yuan per person per year (including uniform continuing education materials).
translation.reference: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).

translation.zh: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
translation.en: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
translation.source: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
translation.medium: (I) Participate in the network continuing education for registered cost engineers organized by China Engineering Cost Association (CECA), or various provincial and departmental management institutions, with credit hours calculated based on the recorded time of the online learning courseware;
translation.reference: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;

translation.zh: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
translation.en: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
translation.source: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
translation.medium: (II) Participation in centralized face-to-face training for registered cost engineers organized by the China Engineering Cost Association or various provincial and departmental management organizations, as well as various types of training classes, seminars, etc., is recognized as 4 learning hours per half-day.
translation.reference: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;

translation.zh: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
translation.en: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
translation.source: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
translation.medium: (III) Participating in training sessions held by the China Association of Pricing, various provincial and departmental cost engineering and cost technician continuing education programs, may be accredited with 10 learning hours for each half-day session;
translation.reference: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;

translation.zh: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
translation.en: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
translation.source: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
translation.medium: (IV) Participation in research on central pricing association and provincial-level projects, industry standard compilation, and textbook writing, each item is recognized for 30 study hours per year;
translation.reference: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;

translation.zh: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
translation.en: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
translation.source: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
translation.medium: (6) Participation in the compilation of teaching materials for the National Certified Cost Engineer Qualification Exam, as well as question design, review, and grading can be recognized for 30 learning hours per year.
translation.reference: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;

translation.zh: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
translation.en: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
translation.source: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
translation.medium: (7) Professional papers and works on engineering cost that are published publicly under personal authorship (based on official publication numbers).
translation.reference: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).

translation.zh: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
translation.en: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
translation.source: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
translation.medium: Published works are recognized as 12 academic hours per 10,000 words.
translation.reference: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;

translation.zh: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
translation.en: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
translation.source: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
translation.medium: Publishing papers in national journals grants 8 credit hours per thousand words; in provincial journals, it is 5 credit hours per thousand words; and in municipal journals, it is 3 credit hours per thousand words.
translation.reference: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;

translation.zh: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
translation.en: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
translation.source: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
translation.medium: (IX) Participation in public training sessions open to the society organized by engineering cost consulting enterprises authorized or approved by the Central Price Association, provincial-level administrative organizations, or provincial-level cost engineering associations (excluding general management and skill training for enterprises), can be recognized as 4 hours of study for every half-day session, with a maximum of 30 hours of study recognized per year.
translation.reference: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.

translation.zh: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
translation.en: Process of cost engineer online further education
translation.source: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
translation.medium: Cost Engineer Online Continuing Education Learning Process
translation.reference: Process of cost engineer online further education

translation.zh: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
translation.en: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
translation.source: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
translation.medium: Upon receipt of the fee by the registration organization, the student identity will be activated immediately, and the cost engineer can enter the online education classroom for learning with the username and password.
translation.reference: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.

translation.zh: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
translation.en: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.
translation.source: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
translation.medium: Students learn through methods such as on-demand courseware, asking questions, and online discussions.
translation.reference: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.

translation.zh: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
translation.en: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
translation.source: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
translation.medium: If you forget your password and encounter an incorrect username or password error during login, preventing you from accessing the learning platform, please contact your registering institution. The registering institution can help you to reset your password (but cannot change your username), so you can log in again with the new password.
translation.reference: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.

translation.reference: What is important in shooting wedding dress photos is the aesthetics of photographer and makeup artist, and luckily I met such people.

translation.reference: After seeing my wedding dress photos, I found that I could also have flattering photos.

translation.zh: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
translation.en: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
translation.medium: Asian-American Groups Complain of Admission Discrimination by Yale and Other Two Ivy League Schools - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.
translation.source: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
translation.medium: Xinhua News Agency, Washington, May 23 (Reporter Xu Jianmei) - Over 130 Asian American groups submitted complaints to the U.S. Department of Education and the Department of Justice on the 23rd, protesting against Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College, three Ivy League institutions, for discriminating against Asian applicants in their admissions processes.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

translation.zh: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
translation.en: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.
translation.source: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
translation.medium: The Asian American Education Alliance, which initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington that day.
translation.reference: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.

translation.zh: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
translation.en: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.
translation.source: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
translation.medium: During a press conference, the group's chairman, Zhao Yukong, stated that over the past decade, the number of Asian applicants meeting the admission criteria of prestigious American universities has doubled. However, within these three top American schools, the proportion of Asians has remained essentially the same.
translation.reference: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.

translation.zh: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
translation.en: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.
translation.source: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
translation.medium: Many studies have shown that these institutions of higher education, during the so-called "holistic review" admissions process, "persistently and systematically discriminate against Asian applicants."
translation.reference: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.

translation.zh: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
translation.en: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.
translation.source: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
translation.medium: Zhao Yukong explained that studies by Sanders and other scholars in 2014 showed that, in these three universities, Asians had the lowest admission rates compared to their application numbers among all ethnic groups.
translation.reference: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.

translation.zh: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
translation.en: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.
translation.source: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
translation.medium: Data from the U.S. Department of Education also show that among all Ivy League institutions, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students, and Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas on Asian applicants for over 20 years.
translation.reference: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.

translation.zh: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
translation.en: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.
translation.source: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
translation.medium: Zhao Yukong told Xinhua News agency reporters that after filing the complaint, they hope that the U.S. Department of Education and Department of Justice would initiate an investigation, and upon establishing the facts, take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian applicants in their admissions process.
translation.reference: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.

translation.zh: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
translation.en: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.
translation.source: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
translation.medium: They also hope that the universities being complained about will take the initiative to pay attention to this issue and change their admission policies for Asian applicants.
translation.reference: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.

translation.zh: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
translation.en: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.
translation.source: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
translation.medium: Currently, the three universities that were complained about have not yet responded.
translation.reference: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.

translation.zh: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
translation.en: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.
translation.source: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
translation.medium: The Asian American Educational Alliance was established in 2015, at which time it filed a complaint against Harvard University for admissions discrimination, but the U.S. Department of Education did not accept the complaint due to procedural reasons.
translation.reference: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.

translation.zh: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
translation.en: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.
translation.source: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
translation.medium: In addition to the Chinese-American groups, those participating in the appeal also include American Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani heritage educational organizations.
translation.reference: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.

translation.zh: 需要餐具
translation.en: I need tableware.
translation.source: 需要餐具
translation.medium: Need cutlery.
translation.reference: I need tableware.

translation.zh: 刚刚取消了订单
translation.en: I just canceled the order.
translation.source: 刚刚取消了订单
translation.medium: Just cancelled the order
translation.reference: I just canceled the order.

translation.zh: 为什么还是执行中
translation.en: Why is it still in progress?
translation.source: 为什么还是执行中
translation.medium: Why is it still executing?
translation.reference: Why is it still in progress?

translation.zh: 可以帮我查看有没有取消吗
translation.en: Can you check for me if it has been canceled?
translation.source: 可以帮我查看有没有取消吗
translation.medium: Can you help me check if there's any cancellation?
translation.reference: Can you check for me if it has been canceled?

translation.zh: 但我早上 5 点 9 分就已经下单啦
translation.en: But I placed the order at 5:9 in the morning.
translation.source: 但我早上 5 点 9 分就已经下单啦
translation.medium: But I already placed the order at 5:09 AM.
translation.reference: But I placed the order at 5:9 in the morning.

translation.zh: 那边是订餐热线，他们说什么都不知道
translation.en: That was the order hotline, and they said they didn’t know anything.
translation.source: 那边是订餐热线，他们说什么都不知道
translation.medium: That's the ordering hotline, they say they don't know anything.
translation.reference: That was the order hotline, and they said they didn’t know anything.

translation.zh: 有电话可以直接跟他们联系吗
translation.en: Is there a number I can call to contact them directly?
translation.source: 有电话可以直接跟他们联系吗
translation.medium: Is there a phone number I can use to contact them directly?
translation.reference: Is there a number I can call to contact them directly?

translation.zh: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
translation.en: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
translation.source: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
translation.medium: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory building located in Zhangting Town, Yuyao, Zhejiang from a real estate agent. After visiting the site several times, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory building.
translation.reference: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.

translation.zh: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
translation.en: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
translation.source: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
translation.medium: In December of the same year, after negotiating the details of the factory purchase with the property owner's family member, Mr. Lin, Mr. Lu made a down payment of 200,000 yuan via bank transfer on the same day.
translation.reference: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.

translation.zh: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
translation.en: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
translation.source: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
translation.medium: Lin, as the payee, signed on the "Factory Purchase Deposit Receipt," which stated, "If the buyer no longer wishes to purchase the factory, the deposit shall belong to the seller. If the seller is unwilling to sell the factory, the deposit shall be returned double to the buyer. Both parties agreed to sign the factory purchase contract within a week."
translation.reference: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”

translation.zh: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
translation.en: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
translation.source: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
translation.medium: However, afterward, both parties were unable to form a consensus on the major terms of the contract, such as the scope of the factory sale and the method of payment, resulting in the housing sale contract not being signed for a long time.
translation.reference: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.

translation.zh: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
translation.en: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
translation.source: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
translation.medium: Considering that both parties failed to reach a consensus on the contract content, a few days later, Mr. Lin returned the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu.
translation.reference: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.

translation.zh: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
translation.en: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
translation.source: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
translation.medium: Mr. Lu is helpless and angry that the seller backed out just before signing the contract for the house he had finally chosen, after he had paid the deposit and prepared the full payment.
translation.reference: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.

translation.zh: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
translation.en: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
translation.source: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
translation.medium: In light of this, Mr. Lu brought Mr. Lin to court at the Yuyao People's Court.
translation.reference: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.

translation.zh: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
translation.en: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
translation.source: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
translation.medium: The court believes after the hearing that the failure of both parties to sign a formal contract cannot be solely attributed to the defendant. It should be reasonably presumed that the negotiations were unsuccessful. Therefore, the stipulations for earnest money penalties are not applicable in this case, and the defendant is not required to assume the liability for returning the earnest money in double.
translation.reference: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.

translation.zh: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
translation.en: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
translation.source: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
translation.medium: After the first trial verdict, the plaintiff filed an appeal.
translation.reference: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.

translation.zh: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
translation.en: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
translation.source: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
translation.medium: Recently, the appellate court upheld the original verdict.
translation.reference: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.

translation.zh: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
translation.en: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
translation.source: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
translation.medium: [Legal Reminder] In the transaction process, it is necessary to exercise due diligence and attention.
translation.reference: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.

translation.zh: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
translation.en: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
translation.source: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
translation.medium: When signing a contract, as the buyer, it is necessary to exercise due diligence, such as verifying the property owner's information and whether the house is occupied by others, etc., and to specify the exact time and location of delivery in the contract to prevent disputes between both parties when fulfilling the contract.
translation.reference: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.

translation.zh: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
translation.en: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.
translation.source: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
translation.medium: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) After the "Summit for Democracy" ended on Friday, a spokesperson for the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs spoke on Saturday (December 11th), stating that the United States' hosting of the "Summit for Democracy" represents "drawing lines based on ideology, instrumentalizing and weaponizing democracy, practicing anti-democracy under the guise of democracy, inciting division and confrontation, and diverting domestic contradictions."
translation.reference: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.

translation.zh: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
translation.en: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.
translation.source: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
translation.medium: The Chinese government believes that for a long time, the United States has imposed its political system and ideological values on others, promoting 'democratic transformation', recklessly applying unilateral sanctions, and instigating 'color revolutions', resulting in disastrous consequences.
translation.reference: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.

translation.zh: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
translation.en: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.
translation.source: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
translation.medium: "Democracy" has long become the "weapon of mass destruction" that the United States uses to interfere in other countries.
translation.reference: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.

translation.zh: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
translation.en: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.
translation.source: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
translation.medium: This summit is an action for Biden to fulfill his campaign promise.
translation.reference: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.

translation.zh: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
translation.en: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.
translation.source: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
translation.medium: The two-day conference was held via video link, with leaders from 111 countries around the world invited to attend, including the leader of Taiwan, but China and Russia were not invited.
translation.reference: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.

translation.zh: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
translation.en: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.
translation.source: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
translation.medium: On the eve of the summit, China and Russia criticized the United States for issues with its own democracy, stating that the United States is not qualified to host such a summit.
translation.reference: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.

translation.zh: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
translation.en: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.
translation.source: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
translation.medium: There have been voices of skepticism both internationally and domestically in the United States, such as critiques of the invitations extended to leaders with authoritarian tendencies, including those from the Philippines, Poland, and Brazil. Some doubt that the true intention behind the Biden administration's organization of this summit is for democracy, rather than for geopolitical purposes.
translation.reference: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.

translation.zh: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
translation.en: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.
translation.source: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
translation.medium: The newly inaugurated German Chancellor Scholz also participated in the virtual Democracy Summit.
translation.reference: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.

translation.zh: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
translation.en: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.
translation.source: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
translation.medium: The statement from the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Saturday said, "Today's American-style democracy is fully exhibiting its pathological conditions, with issues such as money politics, identity politics, partisan opposition, political polarization, social division, racial tensions, and widening wealth gap becoming increasingly severe," and that democracy in the United States is a "rich man's game" founded on capital.
translation.reference: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.

translation.zh: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
translation.en: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”
translation.source: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
translation.medium: In his speech, U.S. President Biden stated, "As government leaders, we have a responsibility to listen to our citizens, reinforce the bulwarks of democracy, promote reform, and achieve transparent accountable governance, which is more capable of withstanding the buffering and impact of despotism, as well as those who blatantly pursue power before the public interest."
translation.reference: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”

translation.zh: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
translation.en: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”
translation.source: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
translation.medium: He emphasized that democracy is not to be taken for granted, "We must constantly renew it within each generation, which, in my view, is the decisive challenge of our era."
translation.reference: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”

translation.zh: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
translation.en: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.
translation.source: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
translation.medium: Biden also said that as global democracy and human rights "face persistent and worrisome challenges, democracy needs fighters to defend it."
translation.reference: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.

translation.zh: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
translation.en: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.
translation.source: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
translation.medium: The U.S. side has pledged that, following this Democracy Summit, they will launch a year-long campaign, including an initiative worth $424.4 million, to strengthen democracy around the world and provide support to independent news media.
translation.reference: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.

translation.zh: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
translation.en: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.
translation.source: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
translation.medium: The United States hopes that all countries will make specific and public commitments to improve their democratic systems before the in-person Democracy Summit planned for the end of 2022.
translation.reference: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.

translation.zh: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
translation.en: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.
translation.source: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
translation.medium: Biden said, "Let all of our nations implement our commitments and report on our progress next year."
translation.reference: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.

translation.zh: 好的，我只怕他送错了地址
translation.en: OK, I just worry that he will deliver it to the wrong address.
translation.source: 好的，我只怕他送错了地址
translation.medium: Okay, I'm just afraid he sent it to the wrong address.
translation.reference: OK, I just worry that he will deliver it to the wrong address.

translation.zh: 好久没来日昌了，水果捞还是那么好喝&真材实料足，第一次点叉烧包，就是我爱的松软面粉的南方口感！

translation.source: 好久没来日昌了，水果捞还是那么好喝&真材实料足，第一次点叉烧包，就是我爱的松软面粉的南方口感！

translation.reference: I haven’t been to Richang for a long time, and the Fruit Mix is still delicious and has a lot of real stuff in it, it was the first time for me to order Cha Siu Bao, and it has the Southern taste with fluffy flour which I enjoyed!

translation.en: The wetness of the clay pot rice was just right, and the portion was generous, the special tinfoil chicken wings were great as always, the soup was nice as well, the cabbage mustard was also...
translation.source: 煲仔饭干湿成程度正好，份量非常足，招牌锡纸鸡翅一如既往赞，例汤也不错，芥兰处理得也比较...
translation.medium: The clay pot rice has just the right level of moisture, the portion is very generous, the signature foil-wrapped chicken wings are as good as always, and the soup of the day is also quite good. The Chinese broccoli is also relatively well-prepared...
translation.reference: The wetness of the clay pot rice was just right, and the portion was generous, the special tinfoil chicken wings were great as always, the soup was nice as well, the cabbage mustard was also...

translation.reference: You have to wait a long time at the door to have the clay pot rice, and the clay pot cracked...

translation.en: I haven’t been to Richang for a few years as emerging little Cantonese restaurants scattered the customers.

translation.reference: I haven’t been to Richang for a few years as emerging little Cantonese restaurants scattered the customers.

translation.medium: It's rare to get a seat as soon as you arrive at the restaurant, and the quality of the dishes is undeniable; as always, they are good.
translation.reference: It was rare to have seats available as soon as I arrived, and the dishes were great as always.
