translation.en: It was mainly because the flavor was a little off, the base was not salty enough and the sweetness was exaggerated, you can imagine sweetness + various spice and garnish...
translation.source: 主要调的这个味道有点偏差，底味的咸不够，就凸显了甜味了，大家可以脑补一下甜+各种香料配菜...
translation.medium: The primary flavor of this dish is a bit off; the base flavor isn't salty enough, which accentuates the sweetness. Everyone can imagine a combination of sweet with various spices and side dishes...
translation.reference: It was mainly because the flavor was a little off, the base was not salty enough and the sweetness was exaggerated, you can imagine sweetness + various spice and garnish...

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
translation.en: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
translation.source: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
translation.medium: What's the way to drink Red Label Whisky?
translation.reference: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?

translation.zh: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
translation.en: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
translation.source: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
translation.medium: Different people have different hobbies; some like collecting, some enjoy gourmet food, and of course, some like tasting wine. Red Label Whisky is currently one of the best-selling Scotch whiskies across various countries, and it has also won a gold medal at the International Spirits Competition.
translation.reference: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.

translation.zh: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
translation.en: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
translation.source: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
translation.medium: Each bottle of Red Label whiskey has a unique flavor, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, isn't it a waste of its richness?
translation.reference: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.

translation.zh: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
translation.en: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
translation.source: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
translation.medium: So how do you drink Red Label whiskey?
translation.reference: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?

translation.zh: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
translation.en: I’ll introduce for you now.
translation.source: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
translation.medium: The editor will give a brief introduction for everyone.
translation.reference: I’ll introduce for you now.

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌喝法：
translation.en: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:
translation.source: 红牌威士忌喝法：
translation.medium: Red Card Whisky Drinking Method:
translation.reference: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:

translation.zh: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
translation.en: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
translation.source: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
translation.medium: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended from around 35 different Scotch whiskies, possessing a rich aroma and the traditional characteristics of Scotch whisky, with a rich fragrance that has a sweet and smoky scent.
translation.reference: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.

translation.zh: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
translation.en: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.
translation.source: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
translation.medium: The entrance is rich and fresh, with a hint of vanilla and a strong smoky malt flavor.
translation.reference: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.

translation.zh: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
translation.en: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.
translation.source: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
translation.medium: This wine can be drunk directly with ice added, or mixed with your favorite beverage.
translation.reference: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
translation.en: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
translation.source: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
translation.medium: Red Label Whisky enters the domestic market, and to cater to the taste of the locals, Red Label Whisky mixed with cola, Sprite, or Sunkist and other carbonated drinks has become an enduring trend.
translation.reference: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.

translation.zh: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
translation.en: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
translation.source: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
translation.medium: These sweet-tasting drinks not only neutralize the sourness but also bring visual pleasure and, when added to beverages, dilute the alcohol taste and change the mouthfeel.
translation.reference: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.

translation.zh: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
translation.en: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
translation.source: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
translation.medium: Red Label Whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also fine) is the most authentic and traditional way to drink it.
translation.reference: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.

translation.zh: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
translation.en: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.
translation.source: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
translation.medium: The authentic taste of red vermouth is somewhat tangy, adding sugar can neutralize the acidity, and lemon will bring a refreshing aroma to the wine. Of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences.
translation.reference: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.

translation.zh: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
translation.en: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.
translation.source: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
translation.medium: The above three methods are the best ways to enjoy Red Label whisky. Everyone can try them out as a reference. I hope my introduction can be of help to everyone.
translation.reference: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.

translation.zh: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
translation.en: Thought on Education: How do examinations in college allow straight A students and slack students both get what they deserve - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
translation.medium: Educational Reflection: How University Exams Allow "Top Students" and "Underachievers" to Find Their Place - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Thought on Education: How do examinations in college allow straight A students and slack students both get what they deserve - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
translation.en: Three students in Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to leaders of the university to reflect their confusion on examinations in university, and raised the ideas to increase the difficulty of examinations, change types of questions and let the examinations reflect the real learning level of students.
translation.source: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
translation.medium: Three students from Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote to the school leaders reflecting their confusion about the university exams, and proposed to increase the difficulty of exams, change the types of exam questions, so that the exams would truly reflect the actual abilities of students.
translation.reference: Three students in Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to leaders of the university to reflect their confusion on examinations in university, and raised the ideas to increase the difficulty of examinations, change types of questions and let the examinations reflect the real learning level of students.

translation.zh: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
translation.en: Indeed, examinations in universities have been a “heated topic“ for a long time.
translation.source: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
translation.medium: Indeed, for a long time, university exams have been a "hot topic."
translation.reference: Indeed, examinations in universities have been a “heated topic“ for a long time.

translation.zh: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
translation.en: Students on campus come from all corners of the country, with varied abilities and levels; due to different efforts spent in study, their situations of study vary significantly.
translation.source: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
translation.medium: In the university campus, students come from all corners of the country, with different levels of ability, and varying degrees of learning, making their learning situations vastly different.
translation.reference: Students on campus come from all corners of the country, with varied abilities and levels; due to different efforts spent in study, their situations of study vary significantly.

translation.zh: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
translation.en: It is inevitable for different feelings about the examinations to exist in such a diversified group.
translation.source: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
translation.medium: Assessing a group with such diverse characteristics, it's inevitable that there will be different perceptions.
translation.reference: It is inevitable for different feelings about the examinations to exist in such a diversified group.

translation.zh: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
translation.en: Certainly, it will cause a completely different experience if there are few types of questions, the questions are repetitive or too simple.
translation.source: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
translation.medium: Of course, if the types of exam questions are monotonous, have a high repetition rate, and the questions are too simple, it will inevitably create a completely different sensation.
translation.reference: Certainly, it will cause a completely different experience if there are few types of questions, the questions are repetitive or too simple.

translation.zh: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
translation.en: Students who do not study hard can pass the exam after cramming before the exam; if they think of other ways, they may half the work with double results.
translation.source: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
translation.medium: Students who do not study diligently might be able to pass by cramming just before the exam. If they look for other methods, they might achieve better results with half the effort.
translation.reference: Students who do not study hard can pass the exam after cramming before the exam; if they think of other ways, they may half the work with double results.

translation.zh: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
translation.en: As such, there will be a “strange phenomenon where “slack students” who don’t ordinarily study pass the exam and even getting high scores; “straight A” students who never miss any class, take notes, do assignments get scores that are not much higher.
translation.source: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
translation.medium: Thus, a "strange phenomenon" arises where the "slacker students" can pass or even score high without much effort; while the "top students" never miss a class, have excellent homework and notes, but don't score much higher in exams.
translation.reference: As such, there will be a “strange phenomenon where “slack students” who don’t ordinarily study pass the exam and even getting high scores; “straight A” students who never miss any class, take notes, do assignments get scores that are not much higher.

translation.zh: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
translation.en: In this way, the problems in college exams reflected by students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University are not groundless; it is believed that such situations do not exist only in Lanzhou Jiaotong University.
translation.source: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
translation.medium: This suggests that the concerns raised by the students at Lanzhou Jiaotong University about the problems in university examinations are not without cause, and it is believed that such situations exist not only at Lanzhou Jiaotong University.
translation.reference: In this way, the problems in college exams reflected by students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University are not groundless; it is believed that such situations do not exist only in Lanzhou Jiaotong University.

translation.zh: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
translation.en: In this sense, we should applaud for the three students who wrote the letter to reflect the problem directly.
translation.source: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
translation.medium: In this sense, a round of applause is deserved for these three students who expressed their concerns candidly in writing.
translation.reference: In this sense, we should applaud for the three students who wrote the letter to reflect the problem directly.

translation.zh: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
translation.en: In fact, people who have been to colleges know that the phenomena of cramming for an exam, “trying to winkle” exam questions from teachers, trying to get the scope of the questions and acquiring “key tutoring” before exam are not rare; further, bringing notes to exams or begging teachers to give higher marks after exams are not rare, either.
translation.source: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
translation.medium: In fact, those who have attended college are well aware that it is not uncommon for students to cram for exams, try various means to "extract" test questions from teachers, strive to narrow down the scope of the test, and seek “focused tutoring” before the exam. Even carrying cheat sheets during the test and pleading with teachers for leniency after the test are not unheard of.
translation.reference: In fact, people who have been to colleges know that the phenomena of cramming for an exam, “trying to winkle” exam questions from teachers, trying to get the scope of the questions and acquiring “key tutoring” before exam are not rare; further, bringing notes to exams or begging teachers to give higher marks after exams are not rare, either.

translation.zh: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
translation.en: In the view of the author, as a guidance for teaching quality evaluation, judging if the exams in a college are qualified or not relies more on the comprehensive mastering on teaching and learning by teachers, as well as the setting questions scientifically on this basis.
translation.source: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
translation.medium: In my view, as an assessment orientation for evaluating teaching quality, determining whether a university's examination is passable depends more on the teacher's comprehensive grasp of teaching and learning, and the scientific question setting based on this understanding.
translation.reference: In the view of the author, as a guidance for teaching quality evaluation, judging if the exams in a college are qualified or not relies more on the comprehensive mastering on teaching and learning by teachers, as well as the setting questions scientifically on this basis.

translation.zh: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
translation.en: Majors are segmented after entering the undergraduate study, and many specialized courses are carried out with basic knowledge as the main content.
translation.source: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
translation.medium: Entering the undergraduate stage of university, majors begin to become more specialized, with many professional courses focusing primarily on foundational knowledge.
translation.reference: Majors are segmented after entering the undergraduate study, and many specialized courses are carried out with basic knowledge as the main content.

translation.zh: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
translation.en: Undoubtedly, whether the students have mastered the basic knowledge is a content to be inspected in the exams in college.
translation.source: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
translation.medium: Undoubtedly, whether to fully grasp the basic knowledge points of a discipline is the content that university examinations aim to assess.
translation.reference: Undoubtedly, whether the students have mastered the basic knowledge is a content to be inspected in the exams in college.

translation.zh: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
translation.en: Knowledge during the undergraduate study is mainly basic theories and common sense of the subject, and in terms of knowledge points, they are basically unchanged and there is not much room for variation.
translation.source: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
translation.medium: Undergraduate knowledge is essentially the fundamental theories and basic knowledge of the discipline. In terms of knowledge points, there is not much room for change; it is essentially fixed.
translation.reference: Knowledge during the undergraduate study is mainly basic theories and common sense of the subject, and in terms of knowledge points, they are basically unchanged and there is not much room for variation.

translation.zh: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
translation.en: As some teachers have said, “the mathematical basic knowledge in college twenty years ago is still being taught today and it is still a key content.”
translation.source: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
translation.medium: As a teacher said, "The basic knowledge of college mathematics that was learned 20 years ago is still being studied today, and it remains a focus."
translation.reference: As some teachers have said, “the mathematical basic knowledge in college twenty years ago is still being taught today and it is still a key content.”

translation.zh: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
translation.en: However, the unchanging basic knowledge points do not mean there can be single type or repetitive questions.
translation.source: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
translation.medium: But the fact that knowledge points remain essentially unchanged does not mean that the exam question types are monotonous or that questions are repeated.
translation.reference: However, the unchanging basic knowledge points do not mean there can be single type or repetitive questions.

translation.zh: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
translation.en: There will usually be a group working on setting test questions for the exams, and senior teachers of the subject will coordinate and compile a test paper; marking test papers will be undertaken by all teachers of the subject; this can in a sense overcome the situation of repetitive questions.
translation.source: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
translation.medium: In many universities, exams typically involve the formation of a question-setting team, and the test papers are coordinated by senior teachers of the subject. The grading of the exams is also undertaken by all the teachers responsible for that subject, which can to some extent overcome the issue of question repetition.
translation.reference: There will usually be a group working on setting test questions for the exams, and senior teachers of the subject will coordinate and compile a test paper; marking test papers will be undertaken by all teachers of the subject; this can in a sense overcome the situation of repetitive questions.

translation.zh: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
translation.en: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.
translation.source: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
translation.medium: To devise a set of test questions suitable for the reality of teaching and learning, the difficulty of the questions should follow a normal distribution based on the overall learning situation of the students. It also requires a comprehensive mastery of the teaching context and a thorough analysis of the students' learning level. Thus, the examination design should dynamically manage the difficulty and question types. It should highlight the inspection of basic knowledge while also taking into account the assessment of abilities, and simultaneously carry out innovative design for question types.
translation.reference: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.

translation.zh: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
translation.en: College exam is the baton of college education, and students prepare for college exam according to the exam types; for this reason, college exams will influence the effect of college education in the long run.
translation.source: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
translation.medium: Examinations are the baton of university education; whatever the nature of the examinations, students will have corresponding study plans. Over time, this will affect the effectiveness of university education.
translation.reference: College exam is the baton of college education, and students prepare for college exam according to the exam types; for this reason, college exams will influence the effect of college education in the long run.

translation.zh: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
translation.en: Lanzhou Jiaotong University pays special attention to the letter of advise from the students; it has deployed the scheme for rectification in the university.
translation.source: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
translation.medium: Regarding the suggestion letter from the students, the administration of Lanzhou Jiaotong University highly values it and has deployed a rectification plan throughout the school.
translation.reference: Lanzhou Jiaotong University pays special attention to the letter of advise from the students; it has deployed the scheme for rectification in the university.

translation.zh: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
translation.en: It requires all teaching units to organize teachers to deliberate and conduct self-inspection on exams at the end of a course, formulate systems about question setting for exam paper, strengthen supervision and inspection on question setting and review, specify grade evaluation work, and strengthen comprehensive inspection on various links of course teaching.
translation.source: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
translation.medium: Each teaching unit is required to organize teachers to carry out discussions and a self-examination comparison for the final course examination, to formulate examination paper setting and relevant policies, while also strengthening the supervision and inspection of the examination paper setting and review process, refine the grading evaluation, and enhance the comprehensive assessment of all aspects of course instruction.
translation.reference: It requires all teaching units to organize teachers to deliberate and conduct self-inspection on exams at the end of a course, formulate systems about question setting for exam paper, strengthen supervision and inspection on question setting and review, specify grade evaluation work, and strengthen comprehensive inspection on various links of course teaching.

translation.zh: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
translation.en: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.
translation.source: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
translation.medium: Addressing issues like the lack of diversity in exam questions and repeated problems from a systemic perspective is an issue that university exam administration must confront. Of course, corresponding systems must be implemented, but the key is in daily efforts. Teachers need to have a comprehensive understanding of the teaching situation. They must not only have a deep understanding of the content taught but also a profound grasp of the students' learning conditions. With a thorough understanding at both ends, teaching and learning will align better, fostering a positive interaction. Exams will then be more practical, allowing both the "straight-A students" and the "underachievers" to find their rightful places.
translation.reference: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.

translation.zh: 如果无法为我变更分店位置，可以改为外送吗？
translation.en: If you cannot change the location of the branch store for me, can I change it to delivery?
translation.source: 如果无法为我变更分店位置，可以改为外送吗？
translation.medium: If it's not possible to change the location of the branch for me, can it be changed to delivery instead?
translation.reference: If you cannot change the location of the branch store for me, can I change it to delivery?

translation.zh: 那我不必再多给次钱吧？
translation.en: Then I don’t need to pay again, right?
translation.source: 那我不必再多给次钱吧？
translation.medium: So I don't have to pay any more money, right?
translation.reference: Then I don’t need to pay again, right?

translation.zh: 同事的订单已经送完了
translation.en: My colleague has delivered all the orders.
translation.source: 同事的订单已经送完了
translation.medium: The colleague's order has already been delivered.
translation.reference: My colleague has delivered all the orders.

translation.zh: 拉不到完成呀
translation.en: I can’t pull it to complete.
translation.source: 拉不到完成呀
translation.medium: I can't finish pulling it.
translation.reference: I can’t pull it to complete.

translation.zh: GPS 呢？到没到呀
translation.en: Where is GPS? Has it arrived yet?
translation.source: GPS 呢？到没到呀
translation.medium: GPS? Has it arrived yet?
translation.reference: Where is GPS? Has it arrived yet?

translation.zh: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
translation.en: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.
translation.source: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
translation.medium: Mrs. Jin's Bridal Photography (South Street Store) currently does not have any branches.
translation.reference: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.

translation.zh: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
translation.en: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.
translation.source: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
translation.medium: Before the photoshoot, because we didn't schedule our time well, we changed the time twice. Consultant Lan Lan patiently helped us arrange the schedule.
translation.reference: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.

translation.zh: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
translation.en: Later we chose a weekend with nice weather to shoot it.
translation.source: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
translation.medium: I later chose a weekend with good weather to take the photos.
translation.reference: Later we chose a weekend with nice weather to shoot it.

translation.zh: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。
translation.en: The staff at Mrs. Gold, no matter it’s consultant or makeup artist, are fantastic.
translation.source: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。
translation.medium: Mrs. Jin's staff, whether they are consultants, makeup artists, or photographers, are all superb.
translation.reference: The staff at Mrs. Gold, no matter it’s consultant or makeup artist, are fantastic.

translation.zh: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。
translation.en: That was the first time that I had officially put on makeup and wow, I couldn’t even believe that I could be so pretty one day, haha.
translation.source: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。
translation.medium: That was the first time I ever put on makeup formally in my life, wow~ I can't believe that one day I would become so pretty, haha.
translation.reference: That was the first time that I had officially put on makeup and wow, I couldn’t even believe that I could be so pretty one day, haha.

translation.zh: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。
translation.en: Xiaojie and the other girl (sorry, I forgot her name) were super patient while doing my makeup and the makeup was natural.
translation.source: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。
translation.medium: Xiaojie and another girl (I'm sorry, I can't remember her name) are super patient with makeup, and the makeup looks very natural.
translation.reference: Xiaojie and the other girl (sorry, I forgot her name) were super patient while doing my makeup and the makeup was natural.

translation.zh: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
translation.en: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.
translation.source: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
translation.medium: The outdoor scenes were filmed in Jiangwan City, luckily the weather was very good that day, I didn't feel very cold. During the photoshoot, the makeup artist would intermittently pay attention to our clothes and headpieces and would immediately tidy them up if anything was slightly amiss.
translation.reference: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.

translation.zh: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
translation.en: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.
translation.source: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
translation.medium: The photographer is also very humorous; I felt very happy after a whole day of taking photos.
translation.reference: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.

translation.zh: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
translation.en: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).
translation.source: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
translation.medium: While choosing photos, because I saw many examples online, I was reluctant to let customers delete too many photos. But when we were selecting them, honestly, there wasn't even a hint of an intention to let us add more photos. We just went with the 24 photos included in the package without adding any (I heard that my cousin, who took wedding photos around the same time as me, added over 10,000 photos to her package that was already more than 7,000, which really shocked me, and I was also very afraid that I would choose too many).
translation.reference: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).

translation.zh: 今天照片修好了，兰兰发给我，我看了有两张觉得不太好，他们立刻就帮我重新修了。
translation.en: The editing was finished today and Lanlan sent it to me; I felt two were not good enough and they immediately re-edited them for me.
translation.source: 今天照片修好了，兰兰发给我，我看了有两张觉得不太好，他们立刻就帮我重新修了。
translation.medium: Today, the photos were fixed and Lan Lan sent them to me. I found two that I didn't think were very good, and they immediately helped me fix them again.
translation.reference: The editing was finished today and Lanlan sent it to me; I felt two were not good enough and they immediately re-edited them for me.

translation.zh: 把妹妹以前拍的照片翻出来对比，我觉得我们的照片我真的太满意了，简约清新，就是我想要的风格。
translation.en: I found the old photos of my sister to make comparison, and I felt that our photos were really satisfying, simple and fresh, exactly what I wanted.
translation.source: 把妹妹以前拍的照片翻出来对比，我觉得我们的照片我真的太满意了，简约清新，就是我想要的风格。
translation.medium: Looking back at the photos my sister took before and comparing them, I am truly satisfied with our pictures; they are simple and fresh, just the style I wanted.
translation.reference: I found the old photos of my sister to make comparison, and I felt that our photos were really satisfying, simple and fresh, exactly what I wanted.

translation.zh: 真心推荐大家去宣汉金夫人拍婚纱照！
translation.en: I sincerely recommend choosing Xuanhan Mrs. Gold to take your wedding dress photoshoot!
translation.source: 真心推荐大家去宣汉金夫人拍婚纱照！
translation.medium: I sincerely recommend everyone to go to Xuanhan Jin Furen for wedding photos!
translation.reference: I sincerely recommend choosing Xuanhan Mrs. Gold to take your wedding dress photoshoot!

translation.reference: Mrs. Gold is grateful for you and sincerely wishes you a happy life and a promising future!
