translation.en: Shen Shixi, King of Animal Novel, Book Collection: Tiger Baby Gold Leaves [Please contact customer service if you need group purchase]
translation.source: 动物小说大王沈石溪品藏书系:虎娃金叶子 [如需团购请联系客服]
translation.medium: King of Animal Novels Shen Shixi's Collection: Tiger Baby Gold Leaf [For group purchases, please contact customer service]
translation.reference: Shen Shixi, King of Animal Novel, Book Collection: Tiger Baby Gold Leaves [Please contact customer service if you need group purchase]

translation.zh: 图书信息由软件采集上传 如信息有误差，以收到实物为准，介意者勿拍！
translation.en: Book information was collected and uploaded by software, and if there is any error in the information, please refer to the physical copy you received, and please do not buy it if you mind it!
translation.source: 图书信息由软件采集上传 如信息有误差，以收到实物为准，介意者勿拍！
translation.medium: The book information is collected and uploaded by the software. If there is any discrepancy in the information, please refer to the actual item received. Those who mind, please do not purchase!
translation.reference: Book information was collected and uploaded by software, and if there is any error in the information, please refer to the physical copy you received, and please do not buy it if you mind it!

translation.zh: 如有问题请联系在线客服！
translation.en: Please contact online service if you have any questions!
translation.source: 如有问题请联系在线客服！
translation.medium: If you have any questions, please contact online customer service!
translation.reference: Please contact online service if you have any questions!

translation.zh: 餐厅只给我拿一袋，要装到袋中，天气冷
translation.en: The restaurant only gave me one bag of it, and it needs to be put in a bag because it’s cold.
translation.source: 餐厅只给我拿一袋，要装到袋中，天气冷
translation.medium: The restaurant only gave me one bag to pack everything into, and it's cold outside.
translation.reference: The restaurant only gave me one bag of it, and it needs to be put in a bag because it’s cold.

translation.zh: 想问一下，外卖是装在一个袋子中吗？
translation.en: May I ask if the food delivery was put in one bag?
translation.source: 想问一下，外卖是装在一个袋子中吗？
translation.medium: Is the takeout packed in one bag?
translation.reference: May I ask if the food delivery was put in one bag?

translation.zh: 我们只看到一个袋子
translation.en: We only see one bag.
translation.source: 我们只看到一个袋子
translation.medium: We only saw one bag.
translation.reference: We only see one bag.

translation.zh: 想知道是漏送了，还是我们有人拿走了，thanks
translation.en: I want to know if it was missed or someone took it, thanks.
translation.source: 想知道是漏送了，还是我们有人拿走了，thanks
translation.medium: I want to know if it was missed in delivery or if someone from us took it, thanks.
translation.reference: I want to know if it was missed or someone took it, thanks.

translation.zh: 已经 1 个小时了，都还没送到
translation.en: It has been 1 hour and it still has not been delivered yet.
translation.source: 已经 1 个小时了，都还没送到
translation.medium: It's already been 1 hour, and it still hasn't been delivered.
translation.reference: It has been 1 hour and it still has not been delivered yet.

translation.zh: 刚看到一篇写例假的文章，太长了。
translation.en: I just read an article about period, and it’s too long.
translation.source: 刚看到一篇写例假的文章，太长了。
translation.medium: I just read an article about menstrual periods, it was too long.
translation.reference: I just read an article about period, and it’s too long.

translation.zh: 给不知道的男性科普一下。
translation.en: I’ll introduce to men who don’t know about it.
translation.source: 给不知道的男性科普一下。
translation.medium: Educating the unknowing men.
translation.reference: I’ll introduce to men who don’t know about it.

translation.zh: 大部分女孩子会在13-15岁期间的某一天突然经历第一次例假，在50岁左右闭经。
translation.en: Most girls will get their first period between 13 to15 years old, and have amenorrhea around 50.
translation.source: 大部分女孩子会在13-15岁期间的某一天突然经历第一次例假，在50岁左右闭经。
translation.medium: Most girls will suddenly experience their first period sometime during the ages of 13 to 15, and will reach menopause around the age of 50.
translation.reference: Most girls will get their first period between 13 to15 years old, and have amenorrhea around 50.

translation.zh: 之后身体健康的前提下会比较规律地每个月来一次。
translation.en: Then they get period regularly once every month on the premise of good health.
translation.source: 之后身体健康的前提下会比较规律地每个月来一次。
translation.medium: Afterwards, assuming good health, it will come regularly once a month.
translation.reference: Then they get period regularly once every month on the premise of good health.

translation.zh: 但也不是规律到能精准预测，大概一周左右的公差，需要提前准备，有时候运气差也会翻车（突然提前好几天）。
translation.en: But it is not so regular that you can precisely predict it; there is a difference of around a week; you need to prepare early and sometimes you may get unlucky and it arrives several days earlier.
translation.source: 但也不是规律到能精准预测，大概一周左右的公差，需要提前准备，有时候运气差也会翻车（突然提前好几天）。
translation.medium: But it's not so regular that it can be predicted accurately; there's an approximate tolerance of about a week, so preparation in advance is necessary. Sometimes, if luck is bad, things can go awry (suddenly advancing by several days).
translation.reference: But it is not so regular that you can precisely predict it; there is a difference of around a week; you need to prepare early and sometimes you may get unlucky and it arrives several days earlier.

translation.zh: 时间长度、血量、痛经程度因人而异，有些人三天，有些人一周；有些人流的少，有些人大血崩；有些人没什么反应，有些人疼到救护车运走，痛经随着时间会改变，以前不痛不代表一辈子不痛。
translation.en: The length of time, blood volume and degree of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person; some people have it for three days and some people a week; some people have small flow and some people have way too much; some people don’t have any reaction, and some people feel so painful that they have to be taken away by the ambulance; dysmenorrhea will change over time, and not having it before doesn’t mean it won’t happen for a lifetime.
translation.source: 时间长度、血量、痛经程度因人而异，有些人三天，有些人一周；有些人流的少，有些人大血崩；有些人没什么反应，有些人疼到救护车运走，痛经随着时间会改变，以前不痛不代表一辈子不痛。
translation.medium: The duration of the period, blood volume, and severity of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person. Some experience it for three days, others for a week; some have light flow while others may have heavy bleeding. Some feel little to no discomfort, whereas others may have pain so severe that they require an ambulance. The experience of dysmenorrhea can change over time - the absence of pain in the past does not guarantee a lifetime free from pain.
translation.reference: The length of time, blood volume and degree of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person; some people have it for three days and some people a week; some people have small flow and some people have way too much; some people don’t have any reaction, and some people feel so painful that they have to be taken away by the ambulance; dysmenorrhea will change over time, and not having it before doesn’t mean it won’t happen for a lifetime.

translation.zh: 月经无法控制，开始到结束为止的几天内24小时流血，能做的只有用卫生巾或卫生棉条吸血防止流到衣服椅子上。
translation.en: You can’t control menstruation; you bleed 24 hours from the beginning to the end, and all you can do is absorb blood with pads or tampons to prevent it from getting onto clothes or chairs.
translation.source: 月经无法控制，开始到结束为止的几天内24小时流血，能做的只有用卫生巾或卫生棉条吸血防止流到衣服椅子上。
translation.medium: Menstruation is uncontrollable, with bleeding 24 hours a day for the several days from start to finish, and all that can be done is to use sanitary pads or tampons to absorb the blood to prevent it from getting onto clothes and chairs.
translation.reference: You can’t control menstruation; you bleed 24 hours from the beginning to the end, and all you can do is absorb blood with pads or tampons to prevent it from getting onto clothes or chairs.

translation.zh: 痛经主要是因为前列腺素的分泌，生理期刚开始还没来得及痛经时赶紧吃布洛芬可有效缓解当月疼痛，痛经开始后再吃没什么用。
translation.en: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins; Taking ibuprofen can effectively relieve the pain of dysmenorrhea that month before menstruation begins, but taking it is useless to after dysmenorrhea begins.
translation.source: 痛经主要是因为前列腺素的分泌，生理期刚开始还没来得及痛经时赶紧吃布洛芬可有效缓解当月疼痛，痛经开始后再吃没什么用。
translation.medium: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins. Taking ibuprofen promptly at the onset of the menstrual period before the pain starts can effectively alleviate the pain for that month. It is not very useful to take it after the pain has already started.
translation.reference: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins; Taking ibuprofen can effectively relieve the pain of dysmenorrhea that month before menstruation begins, but taking it is useless to after dysmenorrhea begins.

translation.zh: 生理期前由于子宫充血和前列腺素释放过多，容易拉肚子。
translation.en: It is easy to have diarrhea before the period due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release.
translation.source: 生理期前由于子宫充血和前列腺素释放过多，容易拉肚子。
translation.medium: Before menstruation, due to the congestion of the uterus and the excessive release of prostaglandins, it is easy to experience diarrhea.
translation.reference: It is easy to have diarrhea before the period due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release.

translation.zh: 如果大概到了周期，莫名其妙拉肚子，基本上两天内会来月经。
translation.en: If you are near the cycle and you have diarrhea for no reason at all, you will basically get your period within two days.
translation.source: 如果大概到了周期，莫名其妙拉肚子，基本上两天内会来月经。
translation.medium: If you suddenly experience diarrhea when your period is about to start, your menstruation will generally begin within two days.
translation.reference: If you are near the cycle and you have diarrhea for no reason at all, you will basically get your period within two days.

translation.zh: 卫生巾最好两三个小时更换一次，不然容易滋生细菌，除去睡眠时间，最坏的情况是一天更换6次，每月7天，那就是42片，如果加上提前准备的份可能有50片，并不是每个月用一片。
translation.en: It is best to replace sanitary pads every two or three hours, otherwise it is easy to breed bacteria; apart from sleep time, the worst case is to replace them six times a day, seven days a month, and that is 42 pieces; if you add the ones prepared in advance, there may be 50 pieces, not just one piece every month.
translation.source: 卫生巾最好两三个小时更换一次，不然容易滋生细菌，除去睡眠时间，最坏的情况是一天更换6次，每月7天，那就是42片，如果加上提前准备的份可能有50片，并不是每个月用一片。
translation.medium: It is best to change sanitary pads every two to three hours, otherwise it is easy for bacteria to breed. Excluding sleep time, the worst-case scenario is changing pads six times a day, for seven days a month, which totals 42 pads. If you include the extra pads prepared in advance, there might be about 50 pads. It is not the case that only one pad is used each month.
translation.reference: It is best to replace sanitary pads every two or three hours, otherwise it is easy to breed bacteria; apart from sleep time, the worst case is to replace them six times a day, seven days a month, and that is 42 pieces; if you add the ones prepared in advance, there may be 50 pieces, not just one piece every month.

translation.zh: （此处修改一下，卫生棉条不必常换，大概五六小时换一次就可以，最长八小时）
translation.en: (a little modification here, tampons do not need to be changed often; it can be changed every five or six hours, up to eight hours)
translation.source: （此处修改一下，卫生棉条不必常换，大概五六小时换一次就可以，最长八小时）
translation.medium: (Here's a revision, sanitary tampons don't need to be changed frequently, about every five to six hours is sufficient, with the maximum being eight hours.)
translation.reference: (a little modification here, tampons do not need to be changed often; it can be changed every five or six hours, up to eight hours)

translation.zh: 月经期荷尔蒙作祟可能会比较暴躁，排卵期也会因为体内激素变化情绪不稳定，就是很倒霉，身体给自己使绊子。
translation.en: Hormones during menstruation may make you irritable, and ovulation may also make you emotionally unstable due to hormone changes in the body, which is very troublesome; your body makes itself suffer.
translation.source: 月经期荷尔蒙作祟可能会比较暴躁，排卵期也会因为体内激素变化情绪不稳定，就是很倒霉，身体给自己使绊子。
translation.medium: Hormones during menstruation can cause irritability, and the ovulation period can also bring emotional instability due to changes in hormones within the body. It's quite unfortunate when your body trips you up like that.
translation.reference: Hormones during menstruation may make you irritable, and ovulation may also make you emotionally unstable due to hormone changes in the body, which is very troublesome; your body makes itself suffer.

translation.zh: 但官方犯罪率数据能看出女性控制情绪的能力还是很高的，也不会拿情绪问题找借口。
translation.en: However, you may see from the official crime rate data that women’s ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make excuses for emotional problems.
translation.source: 但官方犯罪率数据能看出女性控制情绪的能力还是很高的，也不会拿情绪问题找借口。
translation.medium: But official crime rate data indicate that women still have a high ability to control their emotions and do not use emotional issues as an excuse.
translation.reference: However, you may see from the official crime rate data that women’s ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make excuses for emotional problems.

translation.zh: 流的并不只是血，其中包含脱落的子宫内膜。
translation.en: It’s not just blood, but also endometrium that fall off.
translation.source: 流的并不只是血，其中包含脱落的子宫内膜。
translation.medium: Not only blood flows, but also the shed endometrium.
translation.reference: It’s not just blood, but also endometrium that fall off.

translation.zh: 月经结束后的子宫内膜最薄，之后慢慢变厚，可以理解为子宫是房子，每个月建房子（内膜变厚）准备迎接客人，客人没有来，全部拆掉（月经排出）下个月再建新房子，周而复始。
translation.en: After menstruation, the endometrium is the thinnest, and then it gradually thickens; you may think that the uterus is a house; you build a house every month (the endometrium thickens) to prepare for guests, and if the guests do not come, all of them are demolished (menstruation flows out) and a new house is built next month, which starts again and again.
translation.source: 月经结束后的子宫内膜最薄，之后慢慢变厚，可以理解为子宫是房子，每个月建房子（内膜变厚）准备迎接客人，客人没有来，全部拆掉（月经排出）下个月再建新房子，周而复始。
translation.medium: After menstruation, the endometrium is at its thinnest and gradually thickens. This can be understood as the uterus being a house, where each month the house (endometrium thickens) is prepared to welcome a guest. If the guest doesn't arrive, everything is taken down (menstrual shedding), and a new house is built the following month, in a recurring cycle.
translation.reference: After menstruation, the endometrium is the thinnest, and then it gradually thickens; you may think that the uterus is a house; you build a house every month (the endometrium thickens) to prepare for guests, and if the guests do not come, all of them are demolished (menstruation flows out) and a new house is built next month, which starts again and again.

translation.zh: 月经很不方便，连续几十年，每个月几天24小时流血，还会腹痛腰痛，谁愿意？
translation.en: Menstruation is very inconvenient; you bleed 24 hours a few days a month for dozens of years, and it also causes abdominal pain and lower back pain; who would want that?
translation.source: 月经很不方便，连续几十年，每个月几天24小时流血，还会腹痛腰痛，谁愿意？
translation.medium: Menstruation is very inconvenient, for several decades, a few days each month with 24 hours of bleeding, along with stomach and back pain, who would want that?
translation.reference: Menstruation is very inconvenient; you bleed 24 hours a few days a month for dozens of years, and it also causes abdominal pain and lower back pain; who would want that?

translation.zh: 但是人能出生是因为他的母亲来过月经，月经是为了准备你第一次来到这个世界时要住10个月的房子，大家要感谢自己的母亲规律健康的来过月经。
translation.en: But people are born because their mother has menstruation; menstruation exists to prepare for the house where you will live for 10 months before you come to this world; everyone should thank their mother for menstruating regularly and healthily.
translation.source: 但是人能出生是因为他的母亲来过月经，月经是为了准备你第一次来到这个世界时要住10个月的房子，大家要感谢自己的母亲规律健康的来过月经。
translation.medium: But a person is born because their mother has menstruated, and menstruation prepares the womb where you will live for the first 10 months when you come into this world. Everyone should be thankful for their mother's regular and healthy menstruation.
translation.reference: But people are born because their mother has menstruation; menstruation exists to prepare for the house where you will live for 10 months before you come to this world; everyone should thank their mother for menstruating regularly and healthily.

translation.zh: 以前女性的很多事情被打压，社会给女性洗脑说是肮脏的，羞耻的，大家以为就是那样了，但时代变了。
translation.en: In the past, many things about women were suppressed; society brainwashed women and told them it’s dirty and shameful, and everyone thought that it was like that; but times have changed.
translation.source: 以前女性的很多事情被打压，社会给女性洗脑说是肮脏的，羞耻的，大家以为就是那样了，但时代变了。
translation.medium: In the past, many aspects of women's lives were suppressed, and society brainwashed women into thinking they were dirty and shameful. Everyone assumed that was just how things were, but times have changed.
translation.reference: In the past, many things about women were suppressed; society brainwashed women and told them it’s dirty and shameful, and everyone thought that it was like that; but times have changed.

translation.zh: 如果有人觉得月经恶心，觉得女性的身体为孕育生命做出的准备行为恶心，不该在大庭广众之下说出来，女孩子们站起来，不要再这么想，从未经历过，这辈子也不会经历，也不怎么了解的男性们，不要那么忘恩负义不知好歹，这种态度怎么好意思面对自己的母亲，怎么好意思想要自己的孩子？
translation.en: If someone feels that menstruation is disgusting, the female body’s preparation for life is disgusting, and it shouldn’t be said in public; girls, stand up and don’t think this way; men who have never experienced it, won’t experience it in this life, and don’t know much about it, don’t be so ungrateful and unkind; how can you face your mother and children in this attitude?
translation.source: 如果有人觉得月经恶心，觉得女性的身体为孕育生命做出的准备行为恶心，不该在大庭广众之下说出来，女孩子们站起来，不要再这么想，从未经历过，这辈子也不会经历，也不怎么了解的男性们，不要那么忘恩负义不知好歹，这种态度怎么好意思面对自己的母亲，怎么好意思想要自己的孩子？
translation.medium: If someone finds menstruation disgusting, finding the female body's preparations for nurturing life repulsive, they shouldn't express such thoughts in public. Girls, stand up; don't think this way anymore. Men who have never and will never experience this, and don't understand it very well, should not be so ungrateful and insensitive. How can they face their own mothers with such an attitude, or even consider having their own children?
translation.reference: If someone feels that menstruation is disgusting, the female body’s preparation for life is disgusting, and it shouldn’t be said in public; girls, stand up and don’t think this way; men who have never experienced it, won’t experience it in this life, and don’t know much about it, don’t be so ungrateful and unkind; how can you face your mother and children in this attitude?

translation.zh: 最后，姐妹们试试卫生棉条吧，真的好用。
translation.en: Finally, sisters, try tampons; they are really easy to use.
translation.source: 最后，姐妹们试试卫生棉条吧，真的好用。
translation.medium: Finally, sisters, try using tampons, they are really handy.
translation.reference: Finally, sisters, try tampons; they are really easy to use.

translation.zh: 今天是冬至节日，送错比较让人失望
translation.en: Today is the Winter Solstice, and delivering the wrong thing is quite disappointing.
translation.source: 今天是冬至节日，送错比较让人失望
translation.medium: Today is the Winter Solstice festival, delivering the wrong gift is rather disappointing.
translation.reference: Today is the Winter Solstice, and delivering the wrong thing is quite disappointing.

translation.zh: 要另外订餐给小朋友吃
translation.en: Please place another order for the children.
translation.source: 要另外订餐给小朋友吃
translation.medium: Need to order an extra meal for the kids
translation.reference: Please place another order for the children.

translation.zh: 希望店铺百忙之中都要检查一下出品
translation.en: I hope the store can set aside some time out of its busy schedule to check the quality of the products.
translation.source: 希望店铺百忙之中都要检查一下出品
translation.medium: Please make sure to check the products even when the store is extremely busy.
translation.reference: I hope the store can set aside some time out of its busy schedule to check the quality of the products.

translation.zh: 足浴盆泡脚发麻是漏电了吗？
translation.en: Does it mean there is leakage of electricity if my feet feel numb in the feet bath basin?
translation.source: 足浴盆泡脚发麻是漏电了吗？
translation.medium: Is the numbness in my feet caused by the foot bath being electrified?
translation.reference: Does it mean there is leakage of electricity if my feet feel numb in the feet bath basin?

translation.zh: 选择合适的的足浴盆可以起到很好的足疗保健作用，今天国美小编将针对这个问题做出解答，希望对朋友们有所帮助。
translation.en: Choosing the right feet bath basin can provide good pedicure and healthcare, and today Gome will answer this question; hopefully it will be helpful to you.
translation.source: 选择合适的的足浴盆可以起到很好的足疗保健作用，今天国美小编将针对这个问题做出解答，希望对朋友们有所帮助。
translation.medium: Choosing the right foot bath can have a very good effect on foot therapy and health care. Today, the Guomei editor will answer this question, hoping to be helpful to friends.
translation.reference: Choosing the right feet bath basin can provide good pedicure and healthcare, and today Gome will answer this question; hopefully it will be helpful to you.

translation.zh: 随着人们保健意识的增强，足浴盆越来越受到消费者的喜爱，在市场上也涌现出一大批档次不同的产品，从一百多元到上千元的足浴盆琳琅满目，给了消费者很大的选择空间。
translation.en: As people care more about healthcare, feet bath basin has become more popular among the customers, and a large batch of products of different levels have emerged on the market, from a little more than 100 yuan up to a thousand yuan, giving the customers a lot of options.
translation.source: 随着人们保健意识的增强，足浴盆越来越受到消费者的喜爱，在市场上也涌现出一大批档次不同的产品，从一百多元到上千元的足浴盆琳琅满目，给了消费者很大的选择空间。
translation.medium: With the increase in people's health awareness, footbath basins are becoming more and more popular among consumers, and a large number of products of different grades have emerged in the market. From footbaths costing more than a hundred yuan to those costing thousands of yuan, there is a dazzling array, giving consumers a great deal of choice.
translation.reference: As people care more about healthcare, feet bath basin has become more popular among the customers, and a large batch of products of different levels have emerged on the market, from a little more than 100 yuan up to a thousand yuan, giving the customers a lot of options.

translation.zh: 在相关的数据表面，与传统家电相比，足浴盆等保健类家电销售火爆，但足浴盆并没有专门行业标准，因此存在一定的安全隐患。
translation.en: According to related statistics, compared with traditional home appliances, the sales of healthcare products such as feet bath basin was hot, but there is no specialized industry standard for feet bath basin and so there is potential safety risk.
translation.source: 在相关的数据表面，与传统家电相比，足浴盆等保健类家电销售火爆，但足浴盆并没有专门行业标准，因此存在一定的安全隐患。
translation.medium: In the relevant data, compared with traditional home appliances, the sales of health care appliances such as foot baths are booming. However, foot baths do not have specific industry standards, so there are certain safety risks.
translation.reference: According to related statistics, compared with traditional home appliances, the sales of healthcare products such as feet bath basin was hot, but there is no specialized industry standard for feet bath basin and so there is potential safety risk.

translation.zh: “在带电的水里泡脚，实在太危险了吧!”
translation.en: “Having a feet bath in the water with electricity is too dangerous!”
translation.source: “在带电的水里泡脚，实在太危险了吧!”
translation.medium: "Soaking feet in electrified water is really too dangerous!"
translation.reference: “Having a feet bath in the water with electricity is too dangerous!”

translation.zh: 李先生告诉记者，近日，他买了一个足浴盆送给父亲做生日礼物，可是父亲泡脚时却感觉脚底发麻。
translation.en: Mr. Li told reporter that he recently bought a feet bath basin for his father as a birthday present, but his father felt that the bottom of his feet were numb when using it.
translation.source: 李先生告诉记者，近日，他买了一个足浴盆送给父亲做生日礼物，可是父亲泡脚时却感觉脚底发麻。
translation.medium: Mr. Li told the reporter that he recently bought a foot bath as a birthday present for his father, but his father felt a tingling sensation in his feet while soaking them.
translation.reference: Mr. Li told reporter that he recently bought a feet bath basin for his father as a birthday present, but his father felt that the bottom of his feet were numb when using it.

translation.zh: 李先生一开始以为是足浴盆的振动功能引起的，没想到关了振动功能，父亲还是感觉到脚底麻麻的。
translation.en: Mr. Li first thought it was caused by the vibration function of the feet bath basin, and it was unexpected that his father still felt his feet were numb after turning off the vibration function.
translation.source: 李先生一开始以为是足浴盆的振动功能引起的，没想到关了振动功能，父亲还是感觉到脚底麻麻的。
translation.medium: Mr. Li initially thought that the vibration function of the foot bath was causing it, but unexpectedly, even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation in the soles of his feet.
translation.reference: Mr. Li first thought it was caused by the vibration function of the feet bath basin, and it was unexpected that his father still felt his feet were numb after turning off the vibration function.

translation.zh: 李先生用电笔一试，电笔居然亮了，李先生惊讶地发现足浴盆的水里居然带电。
translation.en: Mr. Li used a tester and the light on it was on; it was to Mr. Li’s surprise that the water in the feet bath basin was electrified.
translation.source: 李先生用电笔一试，电笔居然亮了，李先生惊讶地发现足浴盆的水里居然带电。
translation.medium: Mr. Li tested with a voltage pen and to his surprise, it lit up, indicating that the water in the foot bath was actually electrified.
translation.reference: Mr. Li used a tester and the light on it was on; it was to Mr. Li’s surprise that the water in the feet bath basin was electrified.

translation.zh: 后来他联络了商家，商家的态度还不错，尽管退掉了足浴盆，李先生依然感到不快。
translation.en: Then he contacted the seller, whose attitude was nice, but Mr. Li still felt upset although he had returned it.
translation.source: 后来他联络了商家，商家的态度还不错，尽管退掉了足浴盆，李先生依然感到不快。
translation.medium: Later, he contacted the merchant, and the merchant had a pretty good attitude. Despite having returned the foot bath, Mr. Li still felt displeased.
translation.reference: Then he contacted the seller, whose attitude was nice, but Mr. Li still felt upset although he had returned it.

translation.zh: 因为他发现这个已经流行已久的足浴盆如今在最高温度的设定、适用于何种人群、何种材料保证无害等方面都没有一个明确详细的行业规定。
translation.en: Because he found that feet bath basin, which has been popular for a long time, still has no explicit and detailed industry regulations on the setting of the maximum temperature, suitable crowd, what materials are safe to use, etc.
translation.source: 因为他发现这个已经流行已久的足浴盆如今在最高温度的设定、适用于何种人群、何种材料保证无害等方面都没有一个明确详细的行业规定。
translation.medium: Because he found that the long-popular footbath has no clear and detailed industry regulations regarding its highest temperature setting, the target audience it is suitable for, and the materials ensuring it is harmless.
translation.reference: Because he found that feet bath basin, which has been popular for a long time, still has no explicit and detailed industry regulations on the setting of the maximum temperature, suitable crowd, what materials are safe to use, etc.

translation.zh: 但是一般情况下足浴盆是不会有带电问题的，但也不排除少数产品在出厂时没有严格把关。
translation.en: But normally feet bath basin shouldn’t be electrified, however we can’t rule out the fact that a few products might not have been strictly checked before leaving the factory.
translation.source: 但是一般情况下足浴盆是不会有带电问题的，但也不排除少数产品在出厂时没有严格把关。
translation.medium: Under normal circumstances, foot baths do not have electrical issues, but it cannot be ruled out that a small number of products are not strictly checked when leaving the factory.
translation.reference: But normally feet bath basin shouldn’t be electrified, however we can’t rule out the fact that a few products might not have been strictly checked before leaving the factory.

translation.zh: 因此在在购买的时候选择分体式的足浴盆。
translation.en: Therefore, choose split type feet bath basin.
translation.source: 因此在在购买的时候选择分体式的足浴盆。
translation.medium: Therefore, choose a split-type footbath when purchasing.
translation.reference: Therefore, choose split type feet bath basin.

translation.zh: 水电分离，没有任何安全隐患。
translation.en: There is no safety risk when water and electricity are separated.
translation.source: 水电分离，没有任何安全隐患。
translation.medium: Electricity and water are separated, there is no safety hazard.
translation.reference: There is no safety risk when water and electricity are separated.

translation.zh: 同时你可以随便拿电笔测。
translation.en: Meanwhile, you can use a tester to test it.
translation.source: 同时你可以随便拿电笔测。
translation.medium: You can also casually use a test pen to measure.
translation.reference: Meanwhile, you can use a tester to test it.

translation.zh: 第十三届省茶博会开幕 - 视点头条 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
translation.en: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo opened - Headline of viewpoints - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online
translation.source: 第十三届省茶博会开幕 - 视点头条 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
translation.medium: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo Opens - Viewpoint Headlines - Hunan Daily Online - Hua Sheng Online
translation.reference: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo opened - Headline of viewpoints - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online

translation.zh: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 张尚武 胡盼盼 通讯员 刘晓玲 摄影 李健）今天上午，第十三届湖南茶业博览会暨新化红茶推介会在湖南国际会展中心举行，展示茶产业，创新茶科技，弘扬茶文化，加快冲刺千亿茶产业目标。
translation.en: Message from Hunan Daily on December 10 (all-media journalists: Zhang Shangwu and Hu Panpan, correspondent: Liu Xiaoling, photographer: Li Jian) The 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and Xinhua Black Tea Introduction and Marketing Event were held in Hunan International Expo Center this morning to exhibit tea industry, innovate tea science and technology, advocate tea culture and accelerate the process of realizing the industry objective of 100 billion.
translation.source: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 张尚武 胡盼盼 通讯员 刘晓玲 摄影 李健）今天上午，第十三届湖南茶业博览会暨新化红茶推介会在湖南国际会展中心举行，展示茶产业，创新茶科技，弘扬茶文化，加快冲刺千亿茶产业目标。
translation.medium: Hunan Daily, December 10th (All Media Reporter Zhang Shangwu, Hu Panpan, Correspondent Liu Xiaoling, Photographer Li Jian) - This morning, the 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and Xinhua Black Tea Promotion Conference were held at the Hunan International Convention and Exhibition Center to showcase the tea industry, innovate tea technology, promote tea culture, and accelerate towards the goal of achieving a hundred-billion-yuan tea industry.
translation.reference: Message from Hunan Daily on December 10 (all-media journalists: Zhang Shangwu and Hu Panpan, correspondent: Liu Xiaoling, photographer: Li Jian) The 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and Xinhua Black Tea Introduction and Marketing Event were held in Hunan International Expo Center this morning to exhibit tea industry, innovate tea science and technology, advocate tea culture and accelerate the process of realizing the industry objective of 100 billion.

translation.zh: 中华全国供销合作总社理事会副主任侯顺利、省人大常委会副主任叶红专出席开幕式。
translation.en: Hou Shunli, deputy director of the Council of China National Supply and Marketing Cooperative Head Office, and Ye Hongzhuan, deputy director of the Standing Committee of Provincial People’s Congress, attended the opening ceremony.
translation.source: 中华全国供销合作总社理事会副主任侯顺利、省人大常委会副主任叶红专出席开幕式。
translation.medium: Hou Shunli, Vice-Chairman of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives, and Ye Hongzhuan, Vice-Chairman of the Provincial People's Congress Standing Committee, attended the opening ceremony.
translation.reference: Hou Shunli, deputy director of the Council of China National Supply and Marketing Cooperative Head Office, and Ye Hongzhuan, deputy director of the Standing Committee of Provincial People’s Congress, attended the opening ceremony.

translation.zh: 中国工程院院士刘仲华教授在开幕式上隆重推介：湖红之源在新化，红茶崛起为“五彩湘茶”注入新动力。
translation.en: Professor Liu Zhonghua, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, introduced at the opening ceremony: Xinhua is the source of Hunan Black Tea, and the emerging of the black tea injects new energy into the “colorful Hunan tea”.
translation.source: 中国工程院院士刘仲华教授在开幕式上隆重推介：湖红之源在新化，红茶崛起为“五彩湘茶”注入新动力。
translation.medium: Chinese Academy of Engineering Academician Professor Liu Zhonghua heavily promoted at the opening ceremony: The origin of Lake Red is in Xinhua, and the rise of black tea injects new vitality into the "colorful Hunan tea."
translation.reference: Professor Liu Zhonghua, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, introduced at the opening ceremony: Xinhua is the source of Hunan Black Tea, and the emerging of the black tea injects new energy into the “colorful Hunan tea”.

translation.zh: 近年来，省委、省政府大力支持茶产业发展，推进千亿湘茶产业建设，形成“三湘四水五彩茶”的发展格局。
translation.en: In recent years, the provincial Party committee and the provincial government have vigorously supported the development of the tea industry, promoted the construction of the Hunan tea industry of 100 billion and formed the development pattern of “three Xiang, four rivers, and five colors of tea”.
translation.source: 近年来，省委、省政府大力支持茶产业发展，推进千亿湘茶产业建设，形成“三湘四水五彩茶”的发展格局。
translation.medium: In recent years, the provincial party committee and the provincial government have strongly supported the development of the tea industry, advanced the construction of the hundred-billion yuan Xiang tea industry, and formed a development pattern of "three Xiang regions, four waters, and colorful tea".
translation.reference: In recent years, the provincial Party committee and the provincial government have vigorously supported the development of the tea industry, promoted the construction of the Hunan tea industry of 100 billion and formed the development pattern of “three Xiang, four rivers, and five colors of tea”.

translation.zh: 省内茶界加大创新，绿茶、黑茶、红茶等主力茶类轮番发力，主产茶区推进茶旅融合，带动广大茶农增收。
translation.en: The tea industry of the province has been promoting innovation, and main tea types such as green tea and black tea take turns to generate power; tea-travel integration is promoted in main tea production areas to drive income increase of tea farmers.
translation.source: 省内茶界加大创新，绿茶、黑茶、红茶等主力茶类轮番发力，主产茶区推进茶旅融合，带动广大茶农增收。
translation.medium: The tea industry within the province is increasing innovation, with main types of tea such as green tea, dark tea, and black tea taking turns to exert their strengths. The major tea-producing areas are promoting the integration of tea and tourism, driving a substantial increase in income for numerous tea farmers.
translation.reference: The tea industry of the province has been promoting innovation, and main tea types such as green tea and black tea take turns to generate power; tea-travel integration is promoted in main tea production areas to drive income increase of tea farmers.

translation.zh: 风水轮流转，红茶又发力。
translation.en: Every type of tea takes turns to gain its spotlight, and now it is time for black tea.
translation.source: 风水轮流转，红茶又发力。
translation.medium: The wheel of fortune turns, and black tea gains momentum again.
translation.reference: Every type of tea takes turns to gain its spotlight, and now it is time for black tea.

translation.zh: 省内茶界专家称，采完绿茶采红茶、黑茶，茶农一年四季有收入，茶园产值直线上升。
translation.en: According to opinion of experts in the tea industry in the province, tea farmers pick black tea after green tea and have income in all four seasons, making the  production value of tea gardens soar.
translation.source: 省内茶界专家称，采完绿茶采红茶、黑茶，茶农一年四季有收入，茶园产值直线上升。
translation.medium: Experts within the provincial tea industry say that by harvesting green tea, then red and black teas, tea farmers have income throughout the four seasons, and the productivity of tea plantations has surged.
translation.reference: According to opinion of experts in the tea industry in the province, tea farmers pick black tea after green tea and have income in all four seasons, making the  production value of tea gardens soar.

translation.zh: 在开幕式上，省领导为第四批获权使用“湖南红茶”商标的企业进行授牌，新化喜捧“湖红之源 ” 。
translation.en: At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded plates to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the trademark of “Hunan black tea”, and Xinhua was awarded the title of “source of Hunan black tea”.
translation.source: 在开幕式上，省领导为第四批获权使用“湖南红茶”商标的企业进行授牌，新化喜捧“湖红之源 ” 。
translation.medium: At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders presented the award to enterprises authorized to use the "Hunan Red Tea" trademark in the fourth batch, with Xinhua happily bearing the title of "Source of Hunan Red".
translation.reference: At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded plates to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the trademark of “Hunan black tea”, and Xinhua was awarded the title of “source of Hunan black tea”.

translation.zh: 在新化红茶展馆，福建茶商看中一款名为“冰里春”的高山茶，当即下订单。
translation.en: In the exhibition hall of Xinhua black tea, a tea merchant from Fujian took a fancy to a high mountain tea named “spring in ice” and placed an order immediately.
translation.source: 在新化红茶展馆，福建茶商看中一款名为“冰里春”的高山茶，当即下订单。
translation.medium: At the Xinhua Black Tea Exhibition Hall, a Fujian tea merchant took a liking to a high-altitude tea named "Bing Li Chun" and placed an order on the spot.
translation.reference: In the exhibition hall of Xinhua black tea, a tea merchant from Fujian took a fancy to a high mountain tea named “spring in ice” and placed an order immediately.

translation.zh: 省茶业协会秘书长王准高兴地说，当前疫情等因素或多或少影响茶叶市场，但从茶博会现场看，亮点纷呈。
translation.en: Wang Zhun, secretary-general of provincial tea association, said happily that factors such as epidemic exert an impact on the tea market to a certain extent; however, based on the situations at the tea expo, there are various highlights.
translation.source: 省茶业协会秘书长王准高兴地说，当前疫情等因素或多或少影响茶叶市场，但从茶博会现场看，亮点纷呈。
translation.medium: Wang Zhun, the Secretary-General of the Provincial Tea Industry Association, said happily that although the current pandemic and other factors have more or less affected the tea market, the Tea Expo is full of highlights.
translation.reference: Wang Zhun, secretary-general of provincial tea association, said happily that factors such as epidemic exert an impact on the tea market to a certain extent; however, based on the situations at the tea expo, there are various highlights.

translation.zh: 新化红茶一抹红，注入了茶文化内涵，人气旺、交易火，湘茶产业喜迎新的春天。
translation.en: The red color of Xinhua black tea has instilled the essence of tea culture, and with its popularity and hot transactions, the Hunan tea industry is ushering in a new spring.
translation.source: 新化红茶一抹红，注入了茶文化内涵，人气旺、交易火，湘茶产业喜迎新的春天。
translation.medium: Xinhua black tea is a touch of red, infused with the cultural connotations of tea, enjoying great popularity and brisk trade, heralding a new spring for the Hunan tea industry.
translation.reference: The red color of Xinhua black tea has instilled the essence of tea culture, and with its popularity and hot transactions, the Hunan tea industry is ushering in a new spring.

translation.zh: 那如果这些食物不热的话，是不是可以取消？
translation.en: If the food is not warm, can I cancel it?
translation.source: 那如果这些食物不热的话，是不是可以取消？
translation.medium: Can I cancel if the food isn't hot?
translation.reference: If the food is not warm, can I cancel it?

translation.zh: 我不要了，由于下面没法停车，他未能送上来
translation.en: I don’t want it anymore, he didn’t come up and deliver it to me because parking was not allowed down there.
translation.source: 我不要了，由于下面没法停车，他未能送上来
translation.medium: I don't want it anymore because he couldn't deliver it since there was no parking available below.
translation.reference: I don’t want it anymore, he didn’t come up and deliver it to me because parking was not allowed down there.

translation.zh: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
translation.en: Metaphysics refers to the study of problems that cannot be answered directly through perception, but only through rational reasoning and logic.
translation.source: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
translation.medium: Metaphysics refers to the study of questions that cannot be directly answered through perception by means of rational reasoning and logic.
translation.reference: Metaphysics refers to the study of problems that cannot be answered directly through perception, but only through rational reasoning and logic.

translation.zh: 形而上学是哲学的基本法则，旨在解释存在和世界的基本性质。
translation.en: Metaphysics is the basic law of philosophy, which aims to explain the fundamental nature of existence and the world.
translation.source: 形而上学是哲学的基本法则，旨在解释存在和世界的基本性质。
translation.medium: Metaphysics is the fundamental principle of philosophy, aimed at explaining the fundamental nature of existence and the world.
translation.reference: Metaphysics is the basic law of philosophy, which aims to explain the fundamental nature of existence and the world.

translation.zh: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。
translation.en: The Chinese translation of Metaphysics originates from “the metaphysical is the Tao, and the physical is vessel” in the Book of Changes, Texts of Hexagrams, and was translated from metaphysic by Japanese Kajiro Inoue (Meiji era).
translation.source: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。
translation.medium: The Chinese term "形而上学" is derived from the phrase "形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器" in the "Commentary on the Attached Phrases" of the I Ching, and was translated by the Japanese scholar Inoue Tetsujiro (from the Meiji era) from the word "metaphysics".
translation.reference: The Chinese translation of Metaphysics originates from “the metaphysical is the Tao, and the physical is vessel” in the Book of Changes, Texts of Hexagrams, and was translated from metaphysic by Japanese Kajiro Inoue (Meiji era).

translation.zh: 形而上学分支包括本体论、自然神学及其延伸问题等。
translation.en: The branches of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology and its extended questions.
translation.source: 形而上学分支包括本体论、自然神学及其延伸问题等。
translation.medium: Metaphysics branches include ontology, natural theology, and its extended issues, etc.
translation.reference: The branches of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology and its extended questions.

translation.zh: 本体论就是“研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念”。
translation.en: Ontology is the “study of which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent a concept”.
translation.source: 本体论就是“研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念”。
translation.medium: Ontology is "the study of which nouns represent real existing entities and which nouns only represent a concept."
translation.reference: Ontology is the “study of which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent a concept”.

translation.zh: 形而上学自然主义，指否认上帝存在。
translation.en: Metaphysical naturalism denies the existence of God.
translation.source: 形而上学自然主义，指否认上帝存在。
translation.medium: Metaphysical naturalism, which denies the existence of God.
translation.reference: Metaphysical naturalism denies the existence of God.

translation.zh: 其理论基础认为所有现象皆可用自然理由的概念解释，由支持科学和演化论的哲学家提出。
translation.en: Its theoretical basis believes all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural reason, which was put forward by philosophers who support science and evolution theory.
translation.source: 其理论基础认为所有现象皆可用自然理由的概念解释，由支持科学和演化论的哲学家提出。
translation.medium: The theoretical foundation posits that all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural reasons, proposed by philosophers who support science and the theory of evolution.
translation.reference: Its theoretical basis believes all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural reason, which was put forward by philosophers who support science and evolution theory.

translation.zh: 而方法自然主义指对上帝不置一词的研究方法。
translation.en: Methodological naturalism refers to the research method of keeping silence about God.
translation.source: 而方法自然主义指对上帝不置一词的研究方法。
translation.medium: Methodological naturalism refers to the research method that does not mention God.
translation.reference: Methodological naturalism refers to the research method of keeping silence about God.

translation.zh: 精神哲学是研究意识以及它们与肉体（尤其是大脑）的关系的本质的哲学分支。
translation.en: Spiritual philosophy is a branch of philosophy that studies the essence of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain).
translation.source: 精神哲学是研究意识以及它们与肉体（尤其是大脑）的关系的本质的哲学分支。
translation.medium: Philosophical psychology is a branch of philosophy that studies the nature of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain).
translation.reference: Spiritual philosophy is a branch of philosophy that studies the essence of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain).

translation.zh: 二元论与一元论是讨论“心灵与肉体的关系”最主要的两派思想。
translation.en: Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought to discuss the relationship between “mind and body”.
translation.source: 二元论与一元论是讨论“心灵与肉体的关系”最主要的两派思想。
translation.medium: Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought discussing "the relationship between the mind and the body".
translation.reference: Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought to discuss the relationship between “mind and body”.

translation.zh: 知识论是探讨知识的本质、起源和范围的一个哲学分支。
translation.en: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that discusses the essence, origin and scope of knowledge.
translation.source: 知识论是探讨知识的本质、起源和范围的一个哲学分支。
translation.medium: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that investigates the nature, origin, and scope of knowledge.
translation.reference: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that discusses the essence, origin and scope of knowledge.

translation.zh: 伦理学是对人类道德生活进行系统性思考和研究的学科；在这里，道德定义为一群人或一种文化所认可的所有行为准则。
translation.en: Ethics is a discipline which carries out systematic thinking and research on human moral life; here, morality is defined as all the codes of conduct recognized by a group of people or a culture.
translation.source: 伦理学是对人类道德生活进行系统性思考和研究的学科；在这里，道德定义为一群人或一种文化所认可的所有行为准则。
translation.medium: Ethics is the discipline that systematically thinks about and researches human moral life; here, morality is defined as all behavioral norms recognized by a group of people or a culture.
translation.reference: Ethics is a discipline which carries out systematic thinking and research on human moral life; here, morality is defined as all the codes of conduct recognized by a group of people or a culture.

translation.zh: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。
translation.en: It is mainly divided into meta-ethics (study of the essence of ethical theory or criticism in an abstract way), normative ethics (judge different moral concepts, and to give moral code suggestions for correct or wrong behavior).
translation.source: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。
translation.medium: Metaphysics (abstractly studying the nature of ethical theory or critical nature), normative ethics (evaluating various moral views, and providing recommendations for moral standards regarding right or wrong actions).
translation.reference: It is mainly divided into meta-ethics (study of the essence of ethical theory or criticism in an abstract way), normative ethics (judge different moral concepts, and to give moral code suggestions for correct or wrong behavior).

translation.zh: 它研究人们应该遵守什么样式的道德行为准则）、应用伦理学（将伦理理论应用于实际生活状况的学术，包括生物伦理学、政治伦理学等）、描述伦理学（搜集关于人们怎样生活的信息，从观察到的样式来作总结。
translation.en: It studies what kind of moral code of conduct people should abide by), applied ethics (the research where ethical theory is applied to actual living conditions, including bioethics, political ethics), descriptive ethics (collect information about how people live, and summarize from the observed patterns.
translation.source: 它研究人们应该遵守什么样式的道德行为准则）、应用伦理学（将伦理理论应用于实际生活状况的学术，包括生物伦理学、政治伦理学等）、描述伦理学（搜集关于人们怎样生活的信息，从观察到的样式来作总结。
translation.medium: It explores what kind of moral conduct codes people should observe, applied ethics (the academic study of applying ethical theories to real-life situations, including bioethics, political ethics, etc.), descriptive ethics (gathering information about how people live and making generalizations from the observed patterns).
translation.reference: It studies what kind of moral code of conduct people should abide by), applied ethics (the research where ethical theory is applied to actual living conditions, including bioethics, political ethics), descriptive ethics (collect information about how people live, and summarize from the observed patterns.

translation.zh: 它对于伦理的检视不是从预想的理论出发，而是调查实际道德主体（moral agent）所做出、并且被观察到的真实抉择，促成了这决择的所有道德因素，它研讨社会族群所持有的伦理观）。
translation.en: Its examination on ethics does not originate from the expected theory, but it investigates the real choices made and observed by the actual moral agent, all the moral factors leading to this decision; it studies the ethics held by social groups).
translation.source: 它对于伦理的检视不是从预想的理论出发，而是调查实际道德主体（moral agent）所做出、并且被观察到的真实抉择，促成了这决择的所有道德因素，它研讨社会族群所持有的伦理观）。
translation.medium: It examines ethics not from the perspective of anticipated theories but investigates the actual choices made by moral agents and observed, as well as all the moral factors that brought about these decisions. It studies the ethical views held by social groups.
translation.reference: Its examination on ethics does not originate from the expected theory, but it investigates the real choices made and observed by the actual moral agent, all the moral factors leading to this decision; it studies the ethics held by social groups).

translation.zh: 伦理学历史包括希腊罗马伦理学、中世纪基督教伦理学。
translation.en: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics and medieval Christian ethics.
translation.source: 伦理学历史包括希腊罗马伦理学、中世纪基督教伦理学。
translation.medium: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics, and medieval Christian ethics.
translation.reference: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics and medieval Christian ethics.

translation.zh: 第一部分：人文主义的伦理思想，以瓦拉与蒙田等人为代表。
translation.en: Part I: the ethical thought of humanism, represented by Valla and Montaigne.
translation.source: 第一部分：人文主义的伦理思想，以瓦拉与蒙田等人为代表。
translation.medium: Part One: The ethical thought of humanism, represented by people like Valla and Montaigne.
translation.reference: Part I: the ethical thought of humanism, represented by Valla and Montaigne.

translation.zh: 第二部分：宗教改革的伦理思想，以加尔文为代表。
translation.en: Part II: the ethical thought of religious reform, represented by Calvin.
translation.source: 第二部分：宗教改革的伦理思想，以加尔文为代表。
translation.medium: Part Two: The Ethical Thoughts of the Reformation, Represented by Calvin.
translation.reference: Part II: the ethical thought of religious reform, represented by Calvin.

translation.zh: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔泰等，18-19世纪，德国学院派伦理学，代表人物：康德与黑格尔等，18-19世纪，英国功利主义伦理学，代表人物：边沁与西基维克等，19世纪，英国进化论伦理学，代表人物：史宾塞与赫胥黎等，19世纪后期，德国新康德主义伦理学，代表人物：李凯儿等，19世纪后期，新黑格尔主义伦理学，代表人物：托马斯·希尔·格林等）、过渡时期伦理学（非理性主义伦理学，代表人物：克尔凯郭儿、叔本华与尼采等）。
translation.en: Part III: political ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others; modern ethics (17th-18th century, British empirical ethics, representatives: Hume et al., 17th-18th century, European rationalist ethics, representatives: Spinoza et al., 18th century, French enlightenment ethics, representatives: Voltaire et al., 18th-19th century, German academic ethics, representatives: Kant, Hegel et al., 18th-19th century, British utilitarian ethics, representatives: Bentham, Sikivik et al., 19th century, Britain National evolutionary ethics, representatives: Spencer, Huxley, et al., late 19th century, German Neo Kantian ethics, representatives: Li Kaier et al., late 19th century, Neo Hegelian ethics, representatives: Thomas Hill Green et al.), transitional Ethics (irrational ethics, representatives: Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, Nietzsche et al.).
translation.source: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔泰等，18-19世纪，德国学院派伦理学，代表人物：康德与黑格尔等，18-19世纪，英国功利主义伦理学，代表人物：边沁与西基维克等，19世纪，英国进化论伦理学，代表人物：史宾塞与赫胥黎等，19世纪后期，德国新康德主义伦理学，代表人物：李凯儿等，19世纪后期，新黑格尔主义伦理学，代表人物：托马斯·希尔·格林等）、过渡时期伦理学（非理性主义伦理学，代表人物：克尔凯郭儿、叔本华与尼采等）。
translation.medium: Part Three: The Ethics of Politics, represented by thinkers such as Machiavelli, modern ethics (17th-18th century British Empiricism Ethics, with key figures like Hume; 17th-18th century Continental Rationalism Ethics, with philosophers like Spinoza; 18th century French Enlightenment Ethics, with figures such as Voltaire; 18th-19th century German Idealism Ethics, with Kant and Hegel among others; 18th-19th century British Utilitarian Ethics, with Bentham and Sidgwick, etc.; 19th century British Evolutionary Ethics, with representatives like Spencer and Huxley; late 19th century German Neo-Kantian Ethics, with figures like Rickert; late 19th century Neo-Hegelian Ethics, with philosophers like Thomas Hill Green, etc.), and the transitional period ethics (Non-Rationalism Ethics, with key figures like Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, and Nietzsche, etc.).
translation.reference: Part III: political ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others; modern ethics (17th-18th century, British empirical ethics, representatives: Hume et al., 17th-18th century, European rationalist ethics, representatives: Spinoza et al., 18th century, French enlightenment ethics, representatives: Voltaire et al., 18th-19th century, German academic ethics, representatives: Kant, Hegel et al., 18th-19th century, British utilitarian ethics, representatives: Bentham, Sikivik et al., 19th century, Britain National evolutionary ethics, representatives: Spencer, Huxley, et al., late 19th century, German Neo Kantian ethics, representatives: Li Kaier et al., late 19th century, Neo Hegelian ethics, representatives: Thomas Hill Green et al.), transitional Ethics (irrational ethics, representatives: Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, Nietzsche et al.).

translation.zh: 逻辑学是研究“有效推论和证明的原则与标准”的一门学科。
translation.en: Logic is a discipline which studies “the principles and standards of valid argument and proof”.
translation.source: 逻辑学是研究“有效推论和证明的原则与标准”的一门学科。
translation.medium: Logic is a discipline that studies "the principles and criteria of valid inference and proof."
translation.reference: Logic is a discipline which studies “the principles and standards of valid argument and proof”.

translation.zh: 逻辑通常包括三个部份：归纳推理、溯因推理和演绎推理，可分为形式逻辑和非形式逻辑。
translation.en: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning and deductive reasoning, which can be divided into formal logic and informal logic.
translation.source: 逻辑通常包括三个部份：归纳推理、溯因推理和演绎推理，可分为形式逻辑和非形式逻辑。
translation.medium: Logic usually consists of three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning, and deductive reasoning, which can be categorized into formal logic and informal logic.
translation.reference: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning and deductive reasoning, which can be divided into formal logic and informal logic.

translation.zh: 美学是以对美的本质及其意义的研究为主题的学科。
translation.en: Aesthetics is a discipline which studies the essence and significance of beauty.
translation.source: 美学是以对美的本质及其意义的研究为主题的学科。
translation.medium: Aesthetics is a discipline that focuses on the study of the nature and significance of beauty.
translation.reference: Aesthetics is a discipline which studies the essence and significance of beauty.

translation.zh: #NUMBER# 元已收到，是漏送的食物
translation.en: #NUMBER# yuan has been received, and it was for the missed food.
translation.source: #NUMBER# 元已收到，是漏送的食物
translation.medium: The #NUMBER# yuan has been received, it was the missing food.
translation.reference: #NUMBER# yuan has been received, and it was for the missed food.

translation.zh: 羊行屮（chè），本名姜波，生于羊年羊月，羊行草上，适得其所，是为羊行屮，人称“羊叔”。
translation.en: Yang Xingche, real name Jiang Bo, was born in the month of the sheep in the year of the sheep; the name Yang Xingche means the sheep feel most comfortable when they are on grass; people call him Uncle Yang (Sheep in Chinese).
translation.source: 羊行屮（chè），本名姜波，生于羊年羊月，羊行草上，适得其所，是为羊行屮，人称“羊叔”。
translation.medium: Sheep Walk Chè, originally named Jiang Bo, was born in the Year of the Sheep, the Month of the Sheep, and in the land of sheep; thus, finding his place among them, he came to be known as Sheep Walk Chè, and people nicknamed him "Uncle Sheep."
translation.reference: Yang Xingche, real name Jiang Bo, was born in the month of the sheep in the year of the sheep; the name Yang Xingche means the sheep feel most comfortable when they are on grass; people call him Uncle Yang (Sheep in Chinese).

translation.zh: 因出版“异域密码”系列的《泰国异闻录》《印度异闻录》《日本异闻录》《韩国异闻录》等作品，在业内有“悬疑怪才”之称，自称“擅长一本正经地胡说八道”
translation.en: He is called “thriller genius” in the industry due to the publication of his “Foreign Password” series including Strange Stories in Thailand, Strange Stories in India, Strange Stories in Japan and Strange Stories in Korea, and he said that he’s “good at talking serious nonsense”
translation.source: 因出版“异域密码”系列的《泰国异闻录》《印度异闻录》《日本异闻录》《韩国异闻录》等作品，在业内有“悬疑怪才”之称，自称“擅长一本正经地胡说八道”
translation.medium: Due to publishing the "Exotic Codes" series including "Records of the Strange in Thailand," "Records of the Strange in India," "Records of the Strange in Japan," "Records of the Strange in Korea," etc., he is known in the industry as a "mystery prodigy" and claims to be "good at talking nonsense with a straight face."
translation.reference: He is called “thriller genius” in the industry due to the publication of his “Foreign Password” series including Strange Stories in Thailand, Strange Stories in India, Strange Stories in Japan and Strange Stories in Korea, and he said that he’s “good at talking serious nonsense”

translation.zh: 《灯下黑》，又名《中国异闻录》，“悬疑怪才”羊行屮用全新作品《灯下黑》带你深入领略中国民俗的骨髓，那些流传至今的传说，背后有怎样凄美、动人的爱恨绝唱？
translation.en: Darkness under the Light, also known as Strange Stories in China, a brand new work from the “thriller genius”, allows you to experience the essence of Chinese folk customs; what are the sad, beautiful and moving stories behind the legends passed down until now?
translation.source: 《灯下黑》，又名《中国异闻录》，“悬疑怪才”羊行屮用全新作品《灯下黑》带你深入领略中国民俗的骨髓，那些流传至今的传说，背后有怎样凄美、动人的爱恨绝唱？
translation.medium: "Darkness Under the Lamp," also known as "Tales of the Unusual from China," "Master of Mystery" Yang Xing invites you to delve deep into the marrow of Chinese folklore with his new work "Darkness Under the Lamp." How poignant and touching are the passions of love and hate behind those legends that have been passed down to this day?
translation.reference: Darkness under the Light, also known as Strange Stories in China, a brand new work from the “thriller genius”, allows you to experience the essence of Chinese folk customs; what are the sad, beautiful and moving stories behind the legends passed down until now?

translation.zh: “异途行者”南晓楼、月无华再次开启作死的探秘之旅，他们的身世即将揭晓。
translation.en: Nan Xiaolou and Yue Wuhua, the “travelers of a different journey”, start the risky travel of secrets exploration, and their life stories will be revealed soon.
translation.source: “异途行者”南晓楼、月无华再次开启作死的探秘之旅，他们的身世即将揭晓。
translation.medium: The "Different Path Travelers" Nan Xiaolou and Yue Wuhua once again embark on a deadly adventure, and their identities are about to be revealed.
translation.reference: Nan Xiaolou and Yue Wuhua, the “travelers of a different journey”, start the risky travel of secrets exploration, and their life stories will be revealed soon.

translation.zh: “悬疑怪才”羊行屮熬白了头发，累积百万册畅销书奉献！
translation.en: Yang Xingche, the “thriller genius”, worked until his hair turned gray to contribute a million bestselling books!
translation.source: “悬疑怪才”羊行屮熬白了头发，累积百万册畅销书奉献！
translation.medium: "Suspense Genius" Yang Xingche has gone grey from hard work, dedicating millions of best-selling books!
translation.reference: Yang Xingche, the “thriller genius”, worked until his hair turned gray to contribute a million bestselling books!

translation.zh: 正版《中国异闻录》，“异域密码”之后的全新作品，同样的作者，同样的主角，延续《泰国异闻录》《印度异闻录》未完的故事！
translation.en: The authentic Strange Stories in China, a brand new work after the “Foreign Password” series, has the same author and the same leading actors; it extends the unfinished stories of Strange Stories in Thailand and Strange Stories in India!
translation.source: 正版《中国异闻录》，“异域密码”之后的全新作品，同样的作者，同样的主角，延续《泰国异闻录》《印度异闻录》未完的故事！
translation.medium: "The Authentic Annals of Strange Tales from China," a brand-new work following "Exotic Cryptograms," by the same author and featuring the same protagonist, continues the unfinished stories from "Annals of Strange Tales from Thailand" and "Annals of Strange Tales from India!"
translation.reference: The authentic Strange Stories in China, a brand new work after the “Foreign Password” series, has the same author and the same leading actors; it extends the unfinished stories of Strange Stories in Thailand and Strange Stories in India!

translation.zh: 那少给了一样，你一个麦乐鸡酱都要钱
translation.en: One thing was missing, and even the McNuggets was charged.
translation.source: 那少给了一样，你一个麦乐鸡酱都要钱
translation.medium: You are missing an item, you even charge for a McChicken sauce.
translation.reference: One thing was missing, and even the McNuggets was charged.

translation.zh: 你叫餐厅送上来
translation.en: Ask the restaurant to send it up here.
translation.source: 你叫餐厅送上来
translation.medium: You ask the restaurant to deliver it.
translation.reference: Ask the restaurant to send it up here.

translation.zh: 我就是不想下楼去买东西，才会花这么多钱叫外卖
translation.en: I don’t want to go downstairs to shop, which is why I spend so much in delivery.
translation.source: 我就是不想下楼去买东西，才会花这么多钱叫外卖
translation.medium: I just don't want to go downstairs to buy things, so I spend so much money on takeout.
translation.reference: I don’t want to go downstairs to shop, which is why I spend so much in delivery.

translation.zh: 丁子霖：致友人。
translation.en: Ding Zilin: to friends.
translation.source: 丁子霖：致友人。
translation.medium: Ding Zilin: To a friend.
translation.reference: Ding Zilin: to friends.

translation.zh: 本人在此衷心感谢各位朋友在我们亲人遇难后的30多年漫长期间内所给予的人道救助，尤其是在我1994年初曾以个人名义向国内外友人发出过人道救助呼吁以来，迄今为止未曾中断的救助。
translation.en: I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to all my friends for their humanitarian assistance for more than 30 years after the death of our family, especially the uninterrupted assistance since I made an appeal for humanitarian assistance to friends at home and abroad in my own name at the beginning of 1994.
translation.source: 本人在此衷心感谢各位朋友在我们亲人遇难后的30多年漫长期间内所给予的人道救助，尤其是在我1994年初曾以个人名义向国内外友人发出过人道救助呼吁以来，迄今为止未曾中断的救助。
translation.medium: I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to all friends for the humanitarian aid that you have provided over more than 30 years since our loved one's disaster. Especially since the beginning of 1994, when I personally issued a plea for humanitarian assistance to friends at home and abroad, the aid has continued without interruption to this day.
translation.reference: I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to all my friends for their humanitarian assistance for more than 30 years after the death of our family, especially the uninterrupted assistance since I made an appeal for humanitarian assistance to friends at home and abroad in my own name at the beginning of 1994.

translation.zh: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已谢世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。
translation.en: Now the old parents of the vast majority of the victims have passed away, and the orphans have also grown up, started working and got married.
translation.source: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已谢世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。
translation.medium: Most of the victims' elderly parents have now passed away, and the orphans have also grown up and started their own families and careers.
translation.reference: Now the old parents of the vast majority of the victims have passed away, and the orphans have also grown up, started working and got married.

translation.zh: 是你们的义举帮助我们这些蒙难家庭度过了最为艰难的时刻。
translation.en: It is your chivalrous deeds that have helped these families in distress pass the most difficult time.
translation.source: 是你们的义举帮助我们这些蒙难家庭度过了最为艰难的时刻。
translation.medium: Your acts of righteousness have helped our afflicted families through the most difficult moments.
translation.reference: It is your chivalrous deeds that have helped these families in distress pass the most difficult time.

translation.zh: 目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。
translation.en: At present, COVID-19 is raging around the world, and most donors have retired.
translation.source: 目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。
translation.medium: Currently, the COVID-19 pandemic is wreaking havoc across the globe, and most donors have already reached retirement age.
translation.reference: At present, COVID-19 is raging around the world, and most donors have retired.

translation.zh: 因此，我恳切地请求你们中止给我们难属——天安门母亲群体人道捐款，这项人道救助活动早就应该画上完美的句号了。
translation.en: Therefore, I sincerely ask you to stop making humanitarian donations to the family of victims, Tiananmen Mothers group; this humanitarian relief event should have come to a perfect end long ago.
translation.source: 因此，我恳切地请求你们中止给我们难属——天安门母亲群体人道捐款，这项人道救助活动早就应该画上完美的句号了。
translation.medium: Therefore, I earnestly request that you cease your humanitarian donations to our troubled group—Tiananmen Mothers. This humanitarian aid activity should have already come to a perfect end.
translation.reference: Therefore, I sincerely ask you to stop making humanitarian donations to the family of victims, Tiananmen Mothers group; this humanitarian relief event should have come to a perfect end long ago.

translation.zh: 我将永远铭记你们的爱心，并坚信你们的义举必将为历史铭记。
translation.en: I will remember your kindness forever and firmly believe your chivalrous deeds will be remembered by history forever.
translation.source: 我将永远铭记你们的爱心，并坚信你们的义举必将为历史铭记。
translation.medium: I will forever remember your kindness, and firmly believe that your righteous acts will be remembered by history.
translation.reference: I will remember your kindness forever and firmly believe your chivalrous deeds will be remembered by history forever.

translation.zh: 由于种种原因，我只能以此方式表达自己的意愿，请朋友们谅解！
translation.en: For various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way; please understand!
translation.source: 由于种种原因，我只能以此方式表达自己的意愿，请朋友们谅解！
translation.medium: Due to various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way, please understand, my friends!
translation.reference: For various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way; please understand!

translation.zh: 请接受我诚挚的祝福。
translation.en: Please accept my sincere wishes.
translation.source: 请接受我诚挚的祝福。
translation.medium: Please accept my sincere wishes.
translation.reference: Please accept my sincere wishes.

translation.zh: 陶业按：请允许我借此机会，对全美学自联（IFCSS）和明尼苏达中国民主基金会（MCDF）从事人道主义救助32年的历史作一个简单介绍。
translation.en: Tao Yean: please allow me to take this opportunity to make a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian assistance of IFCSS and MCDF.
translation.source: 陶业按：请允许我借此机会，对全美学自联（IFCSS）和明尼苏达中国民主基金会（MCDF）从事人道主义救助32年的历史作一个简单介绍。
translation.medium: Please allow me to take this opportunity to offer a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian aid work undertaken by the Independent Federation of Chinese Students and Scholars (IFCSS) and the Minnesota China Democracy Foundation (MCDF).
translation.reference: Tao Yean: please allow me to take this opportunity to make a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian assistance of IFCSS and MCDF.

translation.zh: 在从事人道主义救助的过程中，全美学自联与明尼苏达中国民主基金会是平行的两个组织，项目的执行者常有交叉。
translation.en: In the process of humanitarian relief, IFCSS and MCDF are parallel organizations, and there are often intersections between the project executors.
translation.source: 在从事人道主义救助的过程中，全美学自联与明尼苏达中国民主基金会是平行的两个组织，项目的执行者常有交叉。
translation.medium: In the process of engaging in humanitarian relief, the Independent Federation of Chinese Students and Scholars in USA (IFCSS) and the Minnesota China Democracy Foundation are two parallel organizations, with frequent crossover among the implementers of their projects.
translation.reference: In the process of humanitarian relief, IFCSS and MCDF are parallel organizations, and there are often intersections between the project executors.

translation.zh: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。
translation.en: The relief funds often fail to reach the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement successfully.
translation.source: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。
translation.medium: Financial aid often cannot be successfully delivered to the hands of the families affected by the June Fourth Incident.
translation.reference: The relief funds often fail to reach the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement successfully.

translation.zh: 1994年，经丁老师建议，由“天安门母亲”成立专门小组，统筹和负责人道救助款的接收与分发。
translation.en: In 1994, Ding advised that the “Tiananmen Mother” set up a special group to coordinate and take charge of the receipt and distribution of humanitarian relief funds.
translation.source: 1994年，经丁老师建议，由“天安门母亲”成立专门小组，统筹和负责人道救助款的接收与分发。
translation.medium: In 1994, on the suggestion of Teacher Ding, a special group was formed by the "Tiananmen Mothers" to coordinate and take charge of receiving and distributing humanitarian aid funds.
translation.reference: In 1994, Ding advised that the “Tiananmen Mother” set up a special group to coordinate and take charge of the receipt and distribution of humanitarian relief funds.

translation.zh: 1998年，MCDF设立《六四孤儿教育基金》，执行11年后，于2009年，在所有六四孤儿都大学毕业后，MCDF继而设立《六四孤苦老人特困户救助基金》，并一直执行至今。
translation.en: In 1998, MCDF established the “June 4th Orphan Education Fund”; after 11 years of implementation, in 2009, after all the June 4th orphans graduated from University, MCDF then established the “June 4th Elderly with No Family Destitute Poverty Relief Fund”, which has been implemented until now.
translation.source: 1998年，MCDF设立《六四孤儿教育基金》，执行11年后，于2009年，在所有六四孤儿都大学毕业后，MCDF继而设立《六四孤苦老人特困户救助基金》，并一直执行至今。
translation.medium: In 1998, MCDF established the "June 4th Orphans Education Fund," which, after being executed for 11 years, was succeeded by the creation of the "June 4th Impoverished Elderly Assistance Fund" in 2009, after all the June 4th orphans had graduated from college. The fund has been in operation ever since.
translation.reference: In 1998, MCDF established the “June 4th Orphan Education Fund”; after 11 years of implementation, in 2009, after all the June 4th orphans graduated from University, MCDF then established the “June 4th Elderly with No Family Destitute Poverty Relief Fund”, which has been implemented until now.

translation.zh: 这些项目的资金，主要来自六四当年的校园和社会捐款，来自个人的慷慨捐助，并受到兄弟大学民主基金会的支持。
translation.en: The funds for these projects mainly came from campus and social donations of generous individual donations in the year of June 4th event, and were supported by the democracy foundation of brother universities.
translation.source: 这些项目的资金，主要来自六四当年的校园和社会捐款，来自个人的慷慨捐助，并受到兄弟大学民主基金会的支持。
translation.medium: These projects are primarily funded by campus and social donations from the year of June Fourth, generous contributions from individuals, and are supported by the Brother Universities Democracy Foundation.
translation.reference: The funds for these projects mainly came from campus and social donations of generous individual donations in the year of June 4th event, and were supported by the democracy foundation of brother universities.

translation.zh: 自2018年起，还得到了劳改研究基金会的支持。
translation.en: Since 2018, it has also been supported by the Reform through Labor Research Foundation.
translation.source: 自2018年起，还得到了劳改研究基金会的支持。
translation.medium: Since 2018, it has also received support from the Laogai Research Foundation.
translation.reference: Since 2018, it has also been supported by the Reform through Labor Research Foundation.

translation.zh: 直到去年，时隔31年后，六四难属们终于收到了一笔来自香港的当年以六四的名义募捐来的部分捐款。
translation.en: Last year, after 31 years, the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement finally received a part of the donation made by Hong Kong in the name of the June 4th Movement.
translation.source: 直到去年，时隔31年后，六四难属们终于收到了一笔来自香港的当年以六四的名义募捐来的部分捐款。
translation.medium: Last year, after 31 years, the families of the June Fourth victims finally received a portion of the donations that were collected in Hong Kong in the name of the June Fourth incident.
translation.reference: Last year, after 31 years, the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement finally received a part of the donation made by Hong Kong in the name of the June 4th Movement.

translation.zh: 在此期间，《中国人权》也在独立地执行它们的人道救助项目。
translation.en: During this period, China Human Rights is also independently implementing their humanitarian relief project.
translation.source: 在此期间，《中国人权》也在独立地执行它们的人道救助项目。
translation.medium: During this period, "China Human Rights" was also independently carrying out their humanitarian aid projects.
translation.reference: During this period, China Human Rights is also independently implementing their humanitarian relief project.

translation.zh: 我们理解，丁老师叫停六四捐助，是为捐款人考虑，我们也确实都是一些退休老人，收入并非如退休前充裕，特此对丁老师的“致友人”一信表示感谢。
translation.en: We understand that Ding called a stop to the June 4th donation for the consideration of the donors; we are indeed retired elderly, and our income is not as much as before; we hereby thank teacher Ding for his “Letter to Friends”.
translation.source: 我们理解，丁老师叫停六四捐助，是为捐款人考虑，我们也确实都是一些退休老人，收入并非如退休前充裕，特此对丁老师的“致友人”一信表示感谢。
translation.medium: We understand that Mr. Ding called a halt to the June Fourth donations out of consideration for the donors, who are indeed all retired elderly with incomes not as ample as before retirement. We hereby express our gratitude for Mr. Ding's "Letter to Friends."
translation.reference: We understand that Ding called a stop to the June 4th donation for the consideration of the donors; we are indeed retired elderly, and our income is not as much as before; we hereby thank teacher Ding for his “Letter to Friends”.

translation.zh: 我们会尊重难属们的决定，在两年内终止这一项目，并在需要时，立即恢复。
translation.en: We will respect the decision of the family of the victims and terminate this project within two years and resume it immediately when necessary.
translation.source: 我们会尊重难属们的决定，在两年内终止这一项目，并在需要时，立即恢复。
translation.medium: We will respect the decisions of the family members and terminate the project within two years, resuming immediately when necessary.
translation.reference: We will respect the decision of the family of the victims and terminate this project within two years and resume it immediately when necessary.

translation.zh: 对于那些多年来一直坚持慷慨解囊，冒着风险递送人道救助款的那些侠肝义胆的同道们，一并表示感谢和敬意。
translation.en: I would like to express my gratitude and respect to those chivalrous fellows who have been giving generously and taking risks to deliver humanitarian relief funds for many years.
translation.source: 对于那些多年来一直坚持慷慨解囊，冒着风险递送人道救助款的那些侠肝义胆的同道们，一并表示感谢和敬意。
translation.medium: For those who have persisted over the years in generously donating and taking risks to deliver humanitarian aid, we express our gratitude and respect to all those gallant souls.
translation.reference: I would like to express my gratitude and respect to those chivalrous fellows who have been giving generously and taking risks to deliver humanitarian relief funds for many years.
